Title: Human Design Gate 1 – Gene Key 1 – The Divine Creative
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 1 isThe Gate of Self-Expression. But I call itThe Divine Creativebecause its primary action is to connect with and honor one’s natural creative cycles.

## About Human Design Gate 1 – Gene Key 1

Archetypal Name:The Divine Creative

In Action:connect with your natural creative cycles

Keywords:creativity, surrendering to the highs and lows of creativity, and making marks

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Self-Expression

Human Design Definition:Creation as a primal force. The energy potential to manifest inspiration without limitation.

Core Theme:Capacity for creativity.

Bodygraph Center:G center and connects to the Throat center viahuman design gate 8.

Tropical Sign:Scorpio

Gene Keys Shadow:Entropy

Gene Keys Gift:Freshness

Gene Keys Siddhi:Beauty

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 1

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On one end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 1 is the energy for Creativity. It leads by example and knows that it’s greatest impact on the world happens when you stay true to your creative process.

On the other end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 1 is the energy for believing that you should be able to be creative all the time or that being depressed or low means that something is wrong with you. It Resists your creative ebbs and flows.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling anxious, needy or moody but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 1 (Gene Key 1)

Gate 1 is the G Center side of the 1-8 Channel of Inspiration.

(I do a deep dive on all channels inside the Human Design Map portal.Get yours here.)

And while gate 1 is undefined in my chart, I do haveHuman Design Gate 8defined in my unconscious Jupiter. And, since both the 1 and the 8 areprojected gates,  some have said that gate 8 is like the PR team for gate 1.

The other interesting thing to note is that according to theGene Keys, the unconscious Jupiter is the “culture” sphere inthe pearl sequence. The pearl sequence is how prosperity is activated in our charts. And the “culture” sphere is like the thing that the people in your orbit value the most.

Which means that in my business, the thing that my people value the most is making a contribution by being their authentic selves (gate 8).

((You’ll learn even more about what your Human Design tells you about marketing and business inside theHuman Design Mapportal.)

So, with the full picture of Gate 8 being like the PR team and Gate 1 being the creativity, I tend to draw in highly creative people who really want to make a contribution in the world. They want to make marks that make a difference.

And one of the things I’ve noticed is that people with Gate 1 defined in their chart have a tendency to hold the story that if they aren’t at the top Creative game, that something is wrong with them.

They often expect to be on a creative high 24/7 and start to question themselves and their purpose (human design gate 28) when they are feeling low. Those low feelings roll in, and, all of a sudden, t

hey start telling themselves that the Universe is punishing them for being human. They tell themselves that if they were better at managing their emotions or could just stay “high vibe,” they would be Creative all the time.

I’ve been there myself more times than I could even count.

What I’ve come to understand, in both helping people who have gate 1 defined and in my own experience of creativity, is that it is so important to trust the natural ebbs and flows of creaticity. And that it doesn’t actually mean anything has gone wrong when you aren’t banging away at a creative project.

And the story that you are somehow unworthy because of the “negitive vibes” actually hinders the process of creativity. The low feelings are a critical part of the creative process.

As we stay present with the lows and allow ourselves to alchemize them in a natural way, rather than trying to push them away, they become creative fuel. They become a part of the story of our art and craft.

(I’ll show you the ropes of how true alchemy works inside theHuman Design Mapportal. If you are already one of mymapclients, go to your portal dashboard and start at the beginning of the Deconditioning Toolbox.)

The only thing the “low vibes” prove is your humanity. You cannot make beautiful art (literal or metaphorical) without them. It is the full spectrum of what it means to be human that is most beautiful.

Up and down it goes like a great wave across my own homeAll the questions of the mind trying to find a way to showThat I got darkness I got light I got everything in betweenDon’t deny any sideI don’t cut branches off my treeGreat storm clouds holding rainIt’s part of nature to hold a bit of painAll in all, that rain falls, and then we watch a new thing growTrevor Hall, In and Through the Body, ​Great Storm Clouds

Human Design Gate 1 shows us that “the low” is just as important as “the high” in your most authentic self-expression. Its energy. In motion.

I’ll show you how to embody that inside theHuman Design Mapportal.

In the meantime, be present with yourself. Let the “low vibes” be a part of your process and you will make even more profound art.

It can only be that way.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 1

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 1:

I honor my natural creative cycles.

I am a creative powerhouse.

I surrender to the highs and lows of creativity.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 1

When you stand in the Truth that your lows don’t mean anything about your Creative potential…

What does Creativity mean to you?

Are you connected to your Creativity?

Do you make your low feelings mean something about your Creativity and your worthiness? Why do you think that is?

How can you honor your Creative highs more often? And what do you need to take care of yourself when you are in a Creative low?

Who are your biggest allies who can remind you of your Creative genius?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 1.

And, if you have gate 1 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 2 – Gene Key 2 – The Receptive Feminine
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 2 isThe Gate of The Direction of Self. But I call itThe Receptive Femininebecause its primary action is to receive the abundance of life.

## About Human Design Gate 2 – Gene Key 2

Archetypal Name:The Receptive Feminine

In Action:remain receptive to the abundance of life

Keywords:receiving, abundance, and authentic direction

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:The Direction of Self

Human Design Definition:Receptivity as the primal base through which any response is determined. The root of action.

Core Theme:Receptivity, Direction, and Vision (especially for resources)

Bodygraph Center:G center and connects to the sacral center viahuman design gate 14.

Tropical Sign:Taurus

Gene Keys Shadow:Dislocation

Gene Keys Gift:Orientation

Gene Keys Siddhi:Unity

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 2

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 2 is the energy for receiving the abundance of life. Gate 2 knows that life is a balance of feminine and masculine and that receiving the gifts of life is true abundance.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 2 is the energy for spending resources (time, money, energy) recklessly. It doubts, worries, and feels anxious about its needs being met and has no faith in their ability to receive abundance.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are spending recklessly, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 2 (Gene Key 2)

When I was in the second grade, I wrote a story that was published in the local newspaper. And my teacher was way more excited about it than I was. She kept telling me how proud she was that I’d had something published at such a young age.

Now, of course, we weren’t talking about the New York Times, here. But to the adults around me, it seemed like a big deal and I was completely confused.

Truth be told, I was very uncomfortable with the praise.

The thing is, writing has always come naturally to me. I’d even go so far as to say that it’s easy.

Myhead,ajna,throat,spleen, andGare all defined. My throat alone has six defined gates (62, 16, 20, 31, 8, and 56), three of which are full channels (16-48, 57-20, and 31-7).

Gate 62is in theunconscious sunof myincarnation cross—known for communicating complex ideas with clarity and precision.

And I have a Gemini Moon conjunct Jupiter in the second house.

So you might say it was written in the stars for me to be a wordsmith.

But at the time, my ability to write felt… ordinary.

My brain and nervous system didn’t have the capacity to believe that something so easy for me could be worthy of praise. I didn’t have the ability to let it in.

Learning that Gate 2 is undefined in my chart helped that experience click into place.

In Human Design,the undefined places in our chartare where we’re here to grow, to observe with compassion, and eventually to gain deep wisdom. But that wisdom doesn’t arrive overnight. It unfolds through lived experience—and that is exactly what is happening with my capacity to receive.

Looking back, I can see that moment for what it was: a key moment in learning to receive.

In time, I’ve come to recognize that writing is one of my gifts. I have a unique way of thinking, ordering, and playing with words that others appreciate. And it’s teaching me how to receive on so many levels.

Writing isn’t just a thing I do or the way I deliver value with the​Human Design Map & Portal​. It is a spiritual practice. Where I understand myself, the world around me, and that thing that some call God.

There is a mercurial kind of magick that happens when I put my fingers on the keyboard (or pen to paper!) that often leaves me in awe.

And that is exactly what happened in the early days of creating my signature energy healing method (now taught inside the​Human Design Map & Portal​as the MAP Method for Deconditioning).

Back then, it was called something different. But the essence hasn’t changed at all.

Its structure and flow are based on alchemical magick. It walks you through the seven healing phases that underpin all transformation. It works no matter what you’re trying to change because it gets to the heart of why we ignore our inner wisdom and reveals how to leverage our natural energy in fully aligned ways.

Each phase of the process has an energetic objective that lets you know exactly where you are in the healing arc—and signals when you’re ready to move into the next phase.(I walk you through this entire process step-by-step inside the MAP Method, which is included in the​Human Design Map & Portal​.)

The last phase of the alchemical process is what I call “The Promised Land.” And when writing it, I had a realization so simple and clarifying that I could hardly believe what my fingers were typing:

Receiving is feeling. It is allowing your body to fully experience the sensations of fulfillment.

Maybe you call those sensations success, satisfaction, peace, delightful surprise… or even abundance, affirmation, or alignment.

Whatever you call it, though, they are alive in your body and the process is the same:

You locate the sensation in your body. You stay with the feeling. You let it vibrate through you.

No analyzing. No pretending to be humble. No pushing it away with confusion. No minimizing what you’ve created. No writing it off as a fluke.

But instead—opening to it. Softening into it. Letting it enter your being.

Letting yourselfbecomethe vibration in real-time.

Letting yourself know, in your bones, what it feels like for your heart to expand.

What it feels like for your aura to hum at that frequency.

What it feels like when joy, reverence, gratitude, abundance, bliss, and pleasurewash through your entire being.

To receive is to surrender to the full spectrum of “positive” emotions that are available to you as a human being.

What a revelation.

Since that moment, I’ve coached hundreds—if not thousands—of people through the practice of receiving. Watching the light bulb go off is always miraculous.

And on a personal level, it has healed so much.

When I bring something to fruition in my life, I now understand that my work—completing the cycle of alchemy—is to be present in my body. To let the feelings of success move through me.

Every time I remember and practice that, my capacity for more success expands. It clears out the “blocks” that prevent me from receiving more love, abundance, and magick.

And writing?

It’s still one of the most natural things in the world for me.

But now, when someone tells me that my words moved them…

When a client says my work changed their life…

When I’m acknowledged for the clarity, precision, or depth I bring…

I can feel it. I canlet it in.

I notice when I want to deflect, downplay, or disappear in the moment. And make the conscious choice to breathe it in. To let it move me. To receive it.

It’s as simple and as profound as that.

And what once felt confusing now feels like truth.

The energy of Gate 2 has shown me that receiving isn’t passive—it’s presence. If you’re ready to open to your own capacity for alignment, abundance, and purpose, the​Human Design Map & Portal​will show you the way.

​👉 Click here to get your Human Design Map & Portal​.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 2

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 2:

I choose to receive everything life offers me.

I am a magnet for abundance.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. ### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 2

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 2 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Are you open to actually feeling the feelings of fruition? Why or why not?

What does gratitude feel like in your body? What about Joy? Appreciation? Reverence? Respect? Affirmation? Abundance? Prosperity? Bliss? Ecstasy?

Are you willing to feel even more of those things? Why or why not?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 2.

And, if you have gate 2 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 3 – Gene Key 3 – The Sacred Fool
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 3 isThe Gate of Ordering. But I call itThe Sacred Foolbecause its primary action is to Have Fun While Transforming The Chaos Of A New Beginning Into Order.

## About Human Design Gate 3 – Gene Key 3

Archetypal Name:The Sacred Fool

In Action:playfully create order out of chaos

Keywords:taking leaps of faith, play, and transformation

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Ordering

Human Design Definition:The fundamental challenge of initiation is to transcend confusion and establish order.

Core Theme:Bringing order to the constantly changing circumstances.

Bodygraph Center:Sacral center and connects to the Root center viahuman design gate 60.

Tropical Sign:Aries/Taurus

Gene Keys Shadow:Chaos

Gene Keys Gift:Innovation

Gene Keys Siddhi:Innocence

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 3

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 3 is the energy for bringing order to the chaos. Gate 3 knows that the beginning of change is the hardest part and loves to create innovative ways to overcome obstacles and face them with a light-hearted touch.

On the other end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 3 is the energy for feeling disempowered, disordered, or out of control, and can experience a lot of frustration with God about living in a chaotic world.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling bored, unimaginative or don’t feel like finishing something but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

## My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 3 (Gene Key 3)

Gate 3.4 is defined in my conscious and unconscious Chiron (often called the wounded healer) and directly conjunct my Rising. Meaning my identity (rising) is inseparable from (conjunct) helping others heal what I cannot heal in myself (chiron).

Neither our Rising nor Chiron create definition in the bodygraph. However, when it comes to Chiron, Ra Uru Hu was adamant about its significance as we age. In fact, for 6th lineprofiles, the Chiron Return marks coming “off the roof” and stepping into the role model identity.

(Want a deep dive on your profile? You’ll love the detail and support in theHuman Design Map & Portal.)

Becoming wise over the course of one’s life isn’t limited to sixth lines, though; it is the heart of the human story. And Chiron was an example of that.

In Greek mythology, Chiron was a wise and immortal centaur—teacher, guide, and healer to the gods. Hercules accidentally shot Chiron with a deadly poisoned arrow. But because Chiron was immortal, the arrow created an un-healable wound and he was forced to suffer for eternity.

Meanwhile, something else was happening in the mythic realm.

Another god—Prometheus—had defied Zeus by stealing fire from the heavens and giving it to humanity. That fire wasn’t just warmth or light; it was the divine spark of consciousness, creativity, and transformation.

For this rebellion, Zeus chained Prometheus to a rock, where an eagle came each day to eat his liver. Every night, the liver regenerated, and the suffering continued—an eternal punishment for giving humans the power of fire.

Seeing the deep need for humans to be bestowed with creative fire, Chiron gave up his immortality to free Prometheus.

We could rabbit-hole on the golden threads of symbolism there all day. But what really moves me is how it lives inside my own chart—and how it’s shaped my actual life.

In the IChing, Gate 3 is called “Difficulty at the Beginning.” It comes with the kind of chaos that can make you question every choice you ever made—your plan, your path, your purpose, and yourself.

And while facing chaos in my own beginnings has always been a struggle, helping others transmute chaos into power and magic? That’s always come easily.

When I first started my business in 2009—long before I found Human Design—I was working as a health coach. I helped women with food and body image healing and I immediately noticed a powerful pattern:

People would decide to change, and like clockwork, everything would fall apart. Not just slip-ups or doubts—real chaos. Things got worse instead of better. They blamed themselves. Called themselves weak. Spun in shame.

Today, I see the same thing inside theHuman Design Map Portal.

As humans, we tend to believe that chaos means that we are doing something wrong.

But, when I am helping someone navigate the brave work of making new, purposeful, and aligned choices, it is always crystal clear to me that nothing is going wrong.

Their intentions are working. They are walking the path. They are more powerful than they ever realized.

Chaos is the sign of that deep truth. It is an invitation to look with fresh eyes.

Because the thing is this—the first stage of alchemy is FIRE.

You throw the symbolic lead into the symbolic flames, and it burns away anything that isn’t aligned with your gold.

So when the shit hits the fan at the beginning? That’s not failure. That’s alchemy coming in hot. Literally.

The problem is that if we’re spinning in shame, we miss the message. We think the chaos means we’re broken or off track, when it’s actually evidence that magick is afoot.

This has been a core part of my message for well over a decade now. Chaos is expected and necessary.

And when that clicks for someone, like really in their bones clicks, it is like watching a light bulb turn on.

Shame transforms into curiosity. Resistance softens into presence. Shadows become light.

As if it were Divinely written, it’s exactly what I teach inside theHuman Design Map & Portal. And with each person I guide, it’s a moment of remembering for me, too. When their shame transforms, so does mine. It brings me back to my own humanity and the knowing that I am not alone.

Knowing that my Rising and Chiron sit together in 3.4 helps, too. I can see the threads and the invitation—to allow my creative fire to lead, and to sacrifice my shame in order to do it.

Truth be told, I still sometimes catch myself being hard on myself when things don’t flow right out of the gate. I have to remind myself that chaos is not a failure—chaos is themap. And, paradoxically, it’s a natural part of order.

None of us get to skip the reality of being human. The 3-60 format channel teaches us that the mystery of chaos (3) and magick (60) is just part of what it means to be alive.

And what I know for sure is this:

Making art…transformation…giving birth to a new identity… is messy.

Difficulty at the beginning is not a problem. It’s part of the story—and embracing it is how magick is made.

When we approach that chaos with our eyes and hearts wide open, surrendering our shame to the fire, it all turns to gold in the end.

It can only be that way.

If you’re standing in the middle of your own new beginning and everything feels chaotic, please know that you’re not doing it wrong.

You’re in the fire. And it is indeed making gold.

TheHuman Design Map & Portalis where I’ll help you embrace the fire and find your way through it. You’ll learn the mechanics of your unique design—but even more than that, you’ll learn how to work with your patterns gently, wisely, and without shame.

​👉 Click here to get your Map & Portal.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate3

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 3 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with chaos?Do you see chaos as a “bad” thing?What if you saw chaos as a sign that magic was afoot?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 3.

Title: Human Design Gate 4 – Gene Key 4 – The Forgiveness Decoder
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 4 isThe Gate of Formulization. But I call it TheForgiveness Decoderbecause its primary action is to allow forgiveness to be the ultimate solution..

## About Human Design Gate 4 – Gene Key 4

Archetypal Name:The Forgiveness Decoder

In Action:to harness the healing power of forgiveness

Keywords:logic, forgiveness, solutions, possibility

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Formulization

Human Design Definition:The energy to beguile and succeed despite ignorance. Freedom from retribution.

Core Theme:Fear of never-ending chaos.

Bodygraph Center:Ajna center and connects to the Head center viahuman design gate 63.

Tropical Sign:Leo

Gene Keys Shadow:Intolerance

Gene Keys Gift:Understanding

Gene Keys Siddhi:Forgiveness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 4

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 4 is the energy for harnessing the healing power of forgiveness through objective logic.

Gate 4 has a deep inner knowing that forgiving isn’t the same as forgetting or permitting “bad” behavior. Forgiveness is letting go of the idea that the past should have unfolded differently.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling obsessed, pessimistic or having impossible standards but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 4 (Gene Key 4)

The way life works is such a beautiful mystery to me (says myHuman Design Gate 61).

When I originally wrote this contemplation (2022), I had been writing theHuman Design Gates Libraryfor many months. I’d written it in the order of the suntransitsand only had a small number of gates left to go.

There were many layers of work that went into getting the library published. My part was to write these personal contemplations and my due date was a couple months before the transit itself. This allowed plenty of time and space for my team to do their part.

And one thing I found quite magical was how the timing of writing the contemplation seemed to be perfectly aligned with something happening in my life at that time. It didn’t matter that the transit itself was 2 months away.

Which, side note, because the Human Design gates are symbols of human archetypes, they arealwaysrelevant. You could pick any gate at random and find the benefit of contemplating it right then and there. The transits simply shine specific light onto them and give us the opportunity to see them through that specific lens.

Anyway, back to the 4.

For whatever reason, when the due date for the 4 originally came up, I put it off for over a week. I had no energy for it.

I’d been in a deep hole of unprocessed anger and the idea of writing about forgiveness felt like a cosmic joke.

As you may already know, I’m a 5/2 profile and my aura is surrounded by the “double projection field.” Which essentially means that my karmic role is to clean up karma by being on the receiving end of two different types of projection.

(You’ll learn more about your profile and karmic role in theHuman Design Map.)

Learning about my 5/2 profile was the thing that got me hooked on Human Design. Coming to understand the double projection field shifted my entire perspective. In an instant, I saw myself, my life, and my relationships with crystalline clarity.

Lifetimes of shame and anger melted and my heart cracked wide open.

Richard Rudd, the creator ofthe Gene Keys, says the fifth line’s main inner work is forgiveness. It took me some time to really understand why he said that. It is because of the mechanics of the projection field.

The 5th line is on the receiving end of projection to be the hero, the savior, the one who can fix all that ails someone. Other people, often at their rock bottom, are looking for a savior and hang their hope onto the 5th line. And the 5th line will be none the wiser – it will all be projection.

And anyone in a projection field (the 5 or the 2), cannot stop the projection from happening. Just as the one who is doing the projection can’t stop it.

It is mechanical, not personal. It’s all part of the karmic web we weave in this game called life.

The only thing those in a projection field can do is to be clear about what is theirs to own/do and let the rest go. And when they do that, it creates a cascade of events that have the potential to rapidly transmute disempowered patterns of karma.

And, whether we are conscious of it or not, letting go of what we think others should have done is what forgiveness is.

But it isn’t a process we can force. It is a process of leaning into what is real and alive in any given moment. And loving ourselves through it. Even when it hurts like hell.

This is particularly important with the 5th line because, sometimes, being projected upon in “incorrect” ways cuts down to the soul. The fantasy breaks that you are being seen for who you really are and you discover that the other person only had what you could do for them in mind.

And that is exactly where I was, back in 2022, when the original version of this contemplation came due.

I’d been on the receiving end of an incredibly painful and wildly incorrect projection. I was devastated, confused, and questioning the foundations of a long lasting relationship.

But, something about this felt different.

In the past, especially before I understood my human design profile,  I would take these projections on by making them about me.

As a result, I became the world’s biggest people pleaser. I would just accept anything ever said about me and call it fact. I let people blame me for crazy shit that had nothing to do with me and everything to do with their inability to process their own shame. I took on other people’s shame, despair, and hopelessness and made it my own. I bent myself into a million different pretzels trying to make sure that no one ever felt disappointed on my watch.

Over the years with HD, though, I have learned to really deeply question “the roots” of what other people think, feel, and do in response to my energy.

Just like I recommend my 5th linemapclients, I operate on the assumption thateverythingis a projection. And I’ve put it in the realm of mechanical and karmic, rather than personal.

And this really magical thing happens where, from that perspective, I can see what actually is mine and what is theirs. When something is mine, I take full responsibility for it and I let the rest go.

It has taken conscious effort and a metric fuck ton ofdeconditioning. And it doesn’t always happen in an instant.

But this particular instant, just as Gate 4 was coming due, I crossed an important turning point.

It stung like a mother fucker. But I could also see the ridiculous nature of the projection. There was no hemming and hawing. No wondering what I’d done to deserve it. And no taking on bullshit.

My feelings of anger came in strong and hot, showing me where my boundaries are and how to reconcile them.

I don’t take on the burden of other people’s projections. I let them bounce off of me and will no longer spend hours, days, weeks, months, years ruminating on them.

In those moments, everything I had been practicing came to life in a whole new way. I just let the anger be there. I felt it, in my body, and allowed it to bring focus to what belongs to me and what doesn’t.

I leaned into what was real and alive.

Suddenly, there was no part of me that believed the other person should have behaved differently.

And I began to feel grateful for the incorrect projection. I reveled in the opportunity to gain deeper clarity about myself, my boundaries, and what I will and will not do.

I felt compassionate gratitude that this person had zero capacity to take responsibility for themselves and their decisions. I felt grateful that they poured their disappointment onto me like hot honey.

I returned it to sender and acted with a level of integrity that I am proud of.

By processing my anger and embodying its wisdom, I naturally moved into forgiveness.

I literally cannot control what other people see in me and trying to doesn’t just hurt me, it hurts them, too. It steals their opportunity to own and heal their shit, and my karma isn’t having any of that.

In those moments, it was obvious. Forgiveness was the only logical thing left to do.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 4

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 4:

I am open to seeing all sides of a situation.

All humans are worthy of forgiveness.

I navigate matters of the heart with ease and Grace.

In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 4

When you stand in the truth that you are worthy of receiving the gifts of gate 4 (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with forgiveness? Do you see it as the only logical solution sometimes?

What “bad” experiences have you become grateful for?

In what ways have you used logic against yourself and others? And are you willing to forgive yourself for that?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 4.

Title: Human Design Gate 5 – Gene Key 5 – The Time Alchemist
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 5 isThe Gate of Fixed Patterns. But I call it TheTime Alchemistbecause its primary action is to stay true to the natural rhythms, patterns, and behaviors that keep you healthy.

## About Human Design Gate 5 – Gene Key 5

Archetypal Name:The Time Alchemist

In Action:create healthy habits, rhythms, and rituals

Keywords:habits, routines, and expanding time

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Fixed Patterns

Human Design Definition:The fundamental attunement to natural rhythms. Waiting as an active state of awareness.

Core Theme:The energy to set and repeat patterns and rituals to ensure consistency.

Bodygraph Center:Sacral center and connects to the G center viahuman design gate 15.

Tropical Sign:Sagittarius

Gene Keys Shadow:Impatience

Gene Keys Gift:Patience

Gene Keys Siddhi:Timelessness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 5

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 5 is the energy forconsistency. Gate 5 trusts in the rhythm of life and, in that trust, is empowered to create habits, routines, and rituals that truly work.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 5 is the energy for becoming so obsessed with establishing perfect habits and routines that you never take any action. This is especially likely when you feel overwhelmed by too many opportunities and choices for how to invest your time.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling stuck, inconsistent or not flexible enough but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 5 (Gene Key 5)

Gate 5 isdefinedin my conscious and unconscious Neptune.

I call the Neptune placement your “maya.”

In the East, maya is a term that describes the illusion of being separate from the Divine. Maya is like a web that we tangle in and struggle to get out.

The maya is an essential part of the Divine game of Hide and Seek.

“God likes to play hide-and-seek, but because there is nothing outside of God, he has no one but himself to play with! But he gets over this difficulty by pretending that he is not himself. This is his way of hiding from himself. He pretends that he is you and I and all the people in the world, all the animals, plants, all the rocks, and all the stars. In this way he has strange and wonderful adventures, some of which are terrible and frightening. But these are just like bad dreams, for when he wakes up they will disappear.”Alan Watts,The Book: On The Taboo Against Knowing Who You Are

If you’ve been in my world for more than a minute or have yourHuman Design Map, you have undoubtedly seen my references to “forgetting and remembering.”

“We forget and remember. And we forget again.”Trevor Hall, Kala, Bowl of Light

As I mention in themap, in this game of Divine Hide and Seek, we aren’t supposed to stop forgetting. The real journey is in remembering. And remembering to remember.

Being human means to forget.

Neptune is the place where we forget who we really are. Neptune makes this illusory game fun.

For me, with gate 5 in both of my Neptune placements, habits, routines, and rituals have been a key in playing the game.

I’ve fought hard to overcome a number of destructive habits.

I’ve stopped binge eating and drinking, drugs, sex with strangers, and people-pleasing.

BTW, if you want to learn my process, step-by-step, for using spiritual alchemy to overcome habits that prevent you from remembering, I teach it in the Deconditioning Toolbox, which is included when you purchase yourHuman Design Map.

All of those habits were how I hid from myself. As I mentioned in my post aboutHuman Design Gate 24, they were all ways to escape the intense mystery of silence (24).

And when we hide from ourselves, we step further and further away from who we really are.In keeping with gate 5 in both Neptunes, for me, it has really been a process of coming back to myself, again and again.

Eating, drinking, drugs, and sex have all been places where I transform illusion into clarity of my Divine I AM.At this point, I’ve given up the idea that I will never engage in “bad” habits or struggle with creating supportive rituals and routines. I’m trying to never say never, tbh.

Because even after quitting drugs, drinking, binging, and sex with strangers, I’ve come to understand that habits, routines, and rituals will likely always be a gateway into transforming the maya.

I’m not supposed to stop forgetting. I’m supposed to keep remembering.

So, I will keep using the energy of Gate 5 to help me discover more about myself, what I need to feel supported, and what helps me remember.

If you want support as you remember to remember, get yourmapand go on the journey inside themapportal.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 5

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 5:

I flow through life.

Life is happening for me.

My life unfolds in Divine Timing.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 5

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 5 are available to you, whether you have it in your chart or not…

What are your deepest intentions in your life?

What habits are preventing you from living from those intentions?

What habits would support your intentions?

What are the clues in your life that your habits, routines, and rituals are actually working for you?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 5.

And, if you have gate 5 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 6 – Gene Key 6 – The Peacemaker
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 6 isThe Gate of Friction. But I call it ThePeacemakerbecause its primary action is to use conflict as a doorway into inner peace.

## About Human Design Gate 6 – Gene Key 6

Archetype Name:The Peacemaker

In Action:use conflict as a gateway into peace

Keywords:creating inner peace, conflict resolution, and emotional empowerment

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Friction

Human Design Definition:The fundamental design component of progress. The law that growth cannot exist without friction.

Core Theme:Fear of intimacy.

Bodygraph Center:Emotional Solar Plexus center and connects to the Sacral center viahuman design gate 59.

Tropical Sign:Virgo

Gene Keys Shadow:Conflict

Gene Keys Gift:Diplomacy

Gene Keys Siddhi:Peace

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 6

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 6 is the energy for using conflict as a doorway into inner peace. Gate 6 understands that individual emotional stability and clarity create stability and clarity in relationships. With this knowing, it takes full responsibility for its emotions before “confronting” others and doesn’t engage in needless confrontation.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 6 is the energy for emotional volatility or reactivity that creates chaos in the outer world. Gate 6 can tend towards fighting for things that don’t matter or projecting unresolved emotions onto others. This all contributes to unnecessary conflict in relationships.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling defensive, chaotic or like you are hiding your true self but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 6 (Gene Key 6)

A while back, in my post aboutHuman Design Gate 4and forgiveness, I wrote about how contemplating the gates for these posts always arrives in such Divine timing. It is like it doesn’t matter that I’m updating the post a couple months before the upcoming sun transit. They land in divine timing, no matter when I’m doing the writing.

Gate 6 is one of the gates that my “due date” (to get the contemplation into my team for scheduling) comes at the perfect time.

One of my habits for these posts has been to review the material I have already written about the gate for theHuman Design Map.

One of the things that stands out for the “high frequency”  expression of Gate 6 is this:

Using your emotional clarity to know which conflicts are worth resolving and which ones aren’t.

It seems so resonant because I havegate 59, line 5, defined and hanging in my unconscious mars. I go into a bit more detail about mars in thegate 59post  but, in essence, our unconscious mars is one of our core relational wounds. And it eventually becomes our “vocation.”

(I talk about that more in depth about vocation in the “Human Design and Business Messaging” guide inside theHuman Design Mapportal. If you are a client, you can read that guidehere.)

Gate 59 is all about vulnerability and breaking down walls to intimacy; it is the harmonic gate to gate 6 and together, they create the channel of mating.

For a long time, as I mentioned in the gate 59 post, my primary mode of operation has been to be more and more vulnerable in the hopes of breaking down walls. And I’ve done so to my detriment.

I’ve had countless relationships where vulnerability was not a two-way street, and, in some cases, my vulnerability was even used as a weapon against me.

I started to realize that, as Brene Brown says, all people hadn’t “earned the right” to my vulnerability. And I’ve made it a conscious practice to be more discerning about who, where, and why I am vulnerable with others.

What never dawned on me, though, until the original contemplation of gate, was the people who “earn the right” to my vulnerability are the people who have the capacity to take responsibility for their emotions.

They don’t make it a regular habit of blaming others for their inner state of being. They are able to work through relationships chaos caused by their unconscious projections. And, they don’t try to “force me” to hold space for them while they process their projections of me.

In other words, they are more actively embodied in the “high frequency” of gate 6 (or are at least attempting to be!).

When I look at the relationships where I thrive, this is true every single time, and any time it isn’t, the relationship goes south. I don’t stay in relationships with people who aren’t capable of emotional maturity on that level.

And it has taken me a long time to accept that about myself. My undefined solar plexus is no longer willing to be the sponge and savior of other people’s emotional baggage.

A while back, I ended a relationship with someone because of this very thing.

My spleen said NO to further contact and I finally listened. After decades, I walked away. I was no longer going to be the villain in their emotional drama.

Truth be told though, it was a hard decision, mentally, I was also holding onto the story that only horrible people end such prominent relationships. I’ve thought maybe I should be even more vulnerable and open. And I’ve questioned if I’m really the crazy one here or if I have a right to such strong boundaries.

But, now, a year has passed since the original writing of this post and it is even clearer that my spleen really did know. It was not good for my well-being to stay in that relationship. I don’t have the energy to maintain relationships with people who are in the “low frequency” of gate 6 and I am no longer willing to try and cultivate that energy.

It doesn’t mean they are “bad” people. They are just humans, too.

But, I don’t need to hang on, either. I’ve let the guilt trip go.

As is so often said in traditional Human Design, it isn’t personal – it’s mechanical.

Some conflicts are worth resolving. And others aren’t.

Good to know.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 6

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 6:

I create clarity and stability by honoring my emotions.

I take full responsibility for my emotions and this paves the way for peaceful relationships.

I am not available to take on emotional projection from others.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 6

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 6 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What patterns have you noticed in the conflicts you experience in relationships?

Do you depend on others to change before you can achieve emotional peace? How is that working for you?

What would taking full responsibility for your emotions look like in your relationships right now? And how might that heal conflicts?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 6.And, if you have gate 6 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 7 – Gene Key 7 – The Wise Shepherd￼
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 7 isThe Gate of The Role of Self in Interaction. But I call itThe Shepardbecause its primary action is to inspire transformation by showing people how to access their inner strength and power.

## About Human Design Gate 7 – Gene Key 7

Archetype Name:The Wise Shephard

In Action:to stay true to the highest vision for the collective

Keywords:offering guidance, empowerment, and mindful watching

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:The Role of Self in Interaction

Human Design Definition:The point of convergence. By design, the need for leadership to guide and order society.

Core Theme:Directional leadership and influence.

Bodygraph Center:G center and connects to the Throat center viahuman design gate 31.

Tropical Sign:Leo

Gene Keys Shadow:Division

Gene Keys Gift:Guidance

Gene Keys Siddhi:Virtue

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 7

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 7 is the energy for offering empowering wisdom, guidance, and advice to others.  Gate 7 has an innate understanding that forceful leadership is the mask one wears when one does not understand their true power. They “lead from behind” by showing others that accessing their own inner power is how magic and transformation occur.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 7 is the energy for being on a power trip and insisting others bend to your will. It may try to rally people around its personal beliefs rather than what is best for the collective or boss others around without their consent.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling bossy, arrogant, or controlling but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 7 (Gene Key 7)

A couple of years into my coaching career, I worked with a coach that was helping me create the vision of what I wanted my business to be.

This was over a decade ago – long before I knew anything about Human Design or even what my true talents were.

But I vividly remember a conversation we had because it was like a tiny light in a dark sea of confusion.

She asked me to name a celebrity that I wanted to be like and started listing out names.

She said many of her clients wanted to be like Oprah.

And, before I knew what was happening, I said:

I don’t want to be like Oprah. I want to be like Oprah’s mentor.

Because I didn’t know anything about Human Design, I didn’t know that I have the full 31/7 channel in my design. And I certainly hadn’t fully owned my natural abilities to guide and lead.

But I did know that I didn’t want to be the star of the show.

I wanted to be behind the scenes empowering others with the truth of their being – helping them to own their gifts, talents, and sovereign power – and making their unique contribution to the world (Human Design Gate 8).

Since that sacred conversation with that coach, I’ve gone on to coach, guide, and mentor people who are doing amazing things in the world.

And nothing has delighted me more than watching someone go out into the world – taking a tiny nugget I offered them – and make pure magic with it.

Today, it looks completely different than it used to because I don’t do one-to-one coaching anymore. I only offer theHuman Design Map.

But I still get to witness the power of showing others how to access their innate power. Whether it is seeing a post on social media, a quick DM, or an email exchange, it is one of my greatest honors, and it will never, ever get old.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 7

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 7:

I stay true to the highest vision and guide from that place.

I show others have to access their power and magic happens.

I lead by empowering others.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 7

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 7 are always available to you, (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Do you enjoy empowering others?

What has been your experience with being guided into your innate power?

In what ways do you lead from behind? Are you able to fully own the ripple effect of that?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 7.

And, if you have gate 7 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 8 – Gene Key 8 – The Rebel With A Cause
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 8 isThe Gate of Contribution. But I call it TheRebel with a Causebecause its primary action is to make a contribution in the world by being one’s authentic self.

## About Human Design Gate 8 – Gene Key 8

Archetypal Name:The Rebel with a Cause

In Action:make a contribution by being radically authentic

Keywords:contribution, authenticity, and self-expression

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Contribution

Human Design Definition:The basic worth realized in contributing individual efforts to group goals.

Core Theme:Unique self expression.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the G center viahuman design gate 1.

Tropical Sign:Taurus/Gemini

Gene Keys Shadow:Mediocrity

Gene Keys Gift:Style

Gene Keys Siddhi:Exquisiteness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 8

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 8 is the energy for authenticity and self-expression. Gate 8 makes the most difference in the world by staying true to itself and empowering others to do the same.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 8 is the energy for worrying about how individual expressions will impact relationships. It can feel purposeless under the weight of external conditioning and pressure.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are being inauthentic but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 8 (Gene Key 8)

Gate 8 is defined in my Unconscious Jupiter.  And, true to the nature of the unconscious side of the chart, Gate 8 has been a really powerful gateway into shadow for me.

On the conscious side, Jupiter is our path to expanding into abundance, prosperity, miracles, and healing. And on the unconscious side, it reveals the primary shadows and “blocks” that stop the flow.

(Jupiter’s placements are also important in the big picture of prosperity and can be very important for business owners to understand. I have a guide insidethe map portalthat tells you what Jupiter means through that lens.)

My conscious Jupiter is inHuman Design Gate 20, which is all about being present in the now, contemplation, and expressing truth when it arises.

In other words, I create abundance, healing, and miracles in my life by being in the present moment, making space for contemplation, and sharing my intuitive wisdom when it arrives.

With Gate 8 in my unconscious Jupiter, my biggest “block” to stepping into that source of abundance is misdirected rebellion and inauthenticity.

The more I can transform rebellion into authenticity, the more present I am in my life. The more present I am, sharing what I know when I know it, the more abundance I create.

These are some of my core practices for abundance and Wild Success.

I’ve reached a point in my life where being inauthentic creates so much bitterness that I can’t do it anymore. I’m done with people-pleasing, masking, and trying to make everybody and their brother happy. I want my contribution to this world to be as authentic as humanly possible and that requires me to….be authentic!That is why I practice what I preach insidethe map portal. My practice is showing up authentically, rallying my inner resources and wholeness, even when other people don’t like it, have some bullshit thoughts about it, or want me to play small.

Otherwise, I become a rebelwithouta cause, destroying myself and everything in my path. That way of being doesn’t lead to more authenticity — it leads to less. And it wastes a metric fuck ton of energy.

When I waste energy on false rebellions, I have little left to discover what isactuallyauthentic, what my causereallyis, and where that rebelenergy can be channeled into somethingtrulyworthwhile.

And it fills my present moment with defensiveness, victim consciousness, and existential anguish.

In those triggered states, I don’t have access to the inner wisdom that allows my Gate 20 to be present and speak its truth now.

This awareness was a bitter pill to swallow. No pun intended.

I’m grateful to understand how Gate 8’s “low” frequency manifests in my life. That awareness, coupled with meeting those parts of myself with radical self-acceptance and unconditional love, has helped me transform rebellion into authentic contribution. Now, rebellion is simply a clue letting me know that a part of me believes that I must comply, and I know exactly how to handle that.

Of course, I can’t say, with any self-respect, that I am never rebellious for rebellion’s sake. That just isn’t true. Healing people pleasing is like peeling an onion. As one of the big layers is peeled off, smaller, more nuanced layers appear. The journey is about going deeper and deeper into the same shit.

It is all an opportunity to get curious, to notice how present I am, and where I might be getting caught in the victim mindset, looking for where to lay blame.

Rinse. Repeat.

If you want to understand more about the unique contribution that you are here to make, be sure to get yourHuman Design Map.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 8

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 8:

I stay true to my individual expression.

My unique style cannot be replicated because it comes from the inside.

I make a contribution by being my authentic self.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 8

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 8 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with being authentic?

Do you believe that the greatest contribution you could ever make is being yourself?

Do you ever rebel for rebellion’s sake? Why is that? How might you channel that energy into something that is worth rebelling against?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 8.

And, if you have gate 8 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 9 – Gene Key 9 – The Details Whiz
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 9 isThe Gate of Energy for Detail. But I call itThe Detailz Whizbecause its primary action is to stay focused on the details that are necessary to produce an end result.

## About Human Design Gate 9 – Gene Key 9

Archetype Name:The Details Whiz

In Action:stay focused on the details that really matter

Keywords:seeing the end result, focusing, and paying attention to details

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Energy for Detail

Human Design Definition:Potential can be fulfilled through detailed attention to all pertinent aspects.

Core Theme:Concentrating and focusing to create new patterns.

Bodygraph Center:Sacral center and connects to the Root center viahuman design gate 52.

Tropical Sign:Sagittarius

Gene Keys Shadow:Inertia

Gene Keys Gift:Determination

Gene Keys Siddhi:Invincibility

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 9

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 9 is the energy for concentration and focus. Because the 9 focuses on details and concentrates on what matters, it is empowered to take the necessary steps to achieve both individual and collective goals.

On the “negative end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 9 is the energy for concentrating on things that don’t really matter — especially when it loses sight of the big picture.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling wasteful, uncompromisable, or like a perfectionist but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 9 (Gene Key 9)

Gate 9 isundefinedin my chart. But, IamNeurodivergent (AuDHD) and have aProjector Aura, which means that I can focus like no other when something has captured my fascination and interest.

Add on my 5th line profile, definedheadandajna, andHuman Design Gate 62in my unconscious sun and you get someone who is a genius at breaking big ideas down, especially esoteric ones, into smaller, digestible, and practical concepts and tools.

You’ll get to feast on of all with theHuman Design Map + portal!

But when it comes to focusing on the important details to see a project to the end, like Gate 9, well, let’s just say I’m gathering wisdom. 😂

When I’m not mindful of it, I can easily get lost in details that don’t matter at all and completely miss details that do. I can quickly lose interest and need to consciously reconcile the big picture with the little picture.

As a business owner, that has presented some challenges!

My business and theHuman Design Mapare here to help you gain unforgettable clarity to live into your value and higher purpose. I show you – step-by-step – how to heal the emotional and spiritualshadowsthat “block” your authentic expression. When youtruly recognize and invite my guidance, I can guide you fromknowingyour Human Design design tohaving embodied experiencesof it’s highest expression and purpose.

When it comes to guiding people on their inner journey, I’m great. I can get to the heart of the matter – fast – and I blend Human Design mechanics with spiritual alchemy like no other.

But making sure thatone little checkboxis ticked in my tech stack isn’t exactly where I shine.

And, withHuman Design Gate 54in my midheaven, I’m here for it. I’ve embraced the idea that I am here to embody earth-bound prosperity as a critical part of my spiritual path.

So, the gate 9 details have becomegrist for the mill.

What I’ve come to discover is that the gate 9 kind of details are actually mirrors for healing and transformation.  Instead of pushing against them, being mad that I have to pay attention to them, or blowing them off all together, its apparent that the best path forward is to fully process feelings of shame that come up when I think I’m fucking everything up.

And probably more importantly, over time, it has become more and more obvious that I’m not supposed to do it alone.

Building a team has brought all of this into even greater clarity. I’ve had the deep honor of receiving help from some amazing people. By letting them shine in what they are genius at, I don’t have to be so focused on the parts that I’m not designed for.

I’ve even had the pleasure of having a team member with the full 9-52 channeldefined.

And holy mother of all that is. What a mirror! To see the gate 9 details revealed with such mastery is a sight to behold. It has shown me so clearly that I don’t have to be so ruggedly independent.

There really are people that can help and do what I’ve been trying to do at least 79 billion times better than I ever could. 🤯

And another person with the channel 12-22definedhas revealed so much about handling mistakes with so much grace. I really don’t have to be so hard on myself.

Just like I teach mymapclients, healing and transformation can only happen when we drop the judgment and self-criticism. Yes, being honest with ourselves is key. But we must do it with compassion, curiosity, and Grace. Those are the keys that unlock the heart of alchemical transformation.

(I deep dive on all channels AND alchemical transformation inside the Human Design Map portal.Get yours here.)

Understanding how we treat ourselves in the face of ourundefinedaspects is everything. We can be so fucking mean to ourselves about the supposedly inadequacies.

But when we lean into them and allow them topolish the mirror, they show us so much about what it means to be human. And reveal who we really are, what we need, and our best tools and resources for getting there.

How amazing it is to beundefined.

Here’s to more of Gate 9 showing me what’s up.

Title: Human Design Gate 10 – Gene Key 10 – The Self Love North Star
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 10 isThe Gate of The Behavior of the Self. But I call itThe Self Love North Starbecause its primary action is to be an example of deep self love.

## About Human Design Gate 10 – Gene Key 10

Archetype Name:The Self Love North Star

In Action:be an example of radical self love

Keywords:self love, personal empowerment, and being an example

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:The Behavior of the Self

Human Design Definition:The underlying code of behavior that ensures successful interaction despite circumstances.

Core Theme:The love of being oneself.

Bodygraph Center:G center and connects to the Sacral center viahuman design gate 34, to the Throat center viahuman design gate 20, and to the Spleen center viahuman design gate 57.

Tropical Sign:Sagittarius/Capricorn

Gene Keys Shadow:Self Obsession

Gene Keys Gift:Naturalness

Gene Keys Siddhi:Being

(Want a deep dive on the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 10

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 10 is the energy for deep self-love. Gate 10 understands and honors its needs, values, and desires and is a shining example of self-love.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 10 is the energy for people-pleasingand codependency. It ignores the wisdom of its emotions and ignores itsneeds and values.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling hateful, inner judgement or like a people pleaser but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 10 (Gene Key 10)

Self-love was a foreign concept to me until my early thirties.

When I first came across the idea, like so many, I was confused and needed clarification about what it even means to love oneself.

First and foremost, I thought that self-love was undoubtedly selfish. I’d been conditioned to believe that ignoring my own needs and taking care of others (especially emotionally) was how I earned Gold Stars from “God.”

I also thought self-love meant I was conceited, full of myself, or completely narcissistic.

And, I was at a breaking point.

I had recently started my business and naively assumed that being in charge of my schedule would somehow magically make my life a land of fairy tales.

And, don’t get me wrong, there is no part of me that wants to go back to working for other people. I’m unemployable, at this point.

But, just like so many of the people who are drawn to my work with themap, I still believed that the answers were outside of me. I was convinced that a change in outer circumstances would fix everything that seemed broken.

I woke up to the realization that the answers are – and always have been – inside of me. And learning to love and accept myself was the way.

I knew that if I were to grow into my authenticity and step into my higher purpose, self-love was my next step. There was no other way around it. The way I was living was not working.

Let’s be honest.

You don’t end up addicted to drugs, alcohol, and sex with strangers because you love yourself, right?

No. You don’t.

So, I decided to believe all those inspirational quotes about putting on my oxygen mask first and decided that I would learn to love myself.

But that was when the “real block” to self-love showed up.

I thought that deciding to love myself would be like waving a magic wand; in a flash, my self-hatred, unhealthy habits (human design gate 5), and shitty boundaries (human design gate 37) would disappear into thin air.

And, I assure you, if I had such a wand, I’d sell it on the internet for millions of dollars. LOL.

However, it doesn’t work like that. And it isn’t supposed to.

In this game of Divine Hide and Seek, we are being called into ourselves. And anytime we areseekingoutside of ourselves for answers, the answers will keephiding.

In reality, self-love is about devotion to your inner knowing. It’s a practice that gets really messy and requires the tenacity to keep choosing self-love, even when all of the odds are stacked against you.

Self-love is a path of understanding yourself, your needs, your values, and your heartfelt desires and healing the “blocks” that prevent you from prioritizing those things in your life.

As you likely already know, yourHuman Design chartis a beautiful doorway into discovering what it means to love yourself. I would even go so far as to say Human Design is a shortcut!

(You’re in luck. I’m a literal master at teaching you how to “heal your blocks.” In theHuman Design Map, I’ll explain the most important parts of your design and teach you how to love yourself, even when life is handing you a shit sandwich inside the Human Design Map + Portal.Get your access here.)

Whether you use your Human Design as part of your journey into self-love, rest assured that it takes forgiveness, acceptance, patience, and radical honesty with yourself and others.

More importantly, it means you have to let people think whatever they want about you. Even if they think you are selfish, conceited, or full of yourself.

🤯🤯🤯

What other people think about you is none of your business.

As we move into the era of individual empowerment and the embodiment of spirit (2027 – 2438), it is essential to remember that other people’s thoughts, feelings, and actions are their own. And that their judgments of you areprojectionsof their own disintegratedshadows.

Your fear of other people thinking “negative” things about you, and judging the shit out of yourself because of it, are the “blocks” to unshakable self love.

The energy you need to move forward with self-love is bound up in those fears. And reclaiming those lost parts of yourself is where you find your freedom.

Every single time.

When you do what is right for you, no matter what other people think…

… Self-hatred transforms into self-respect…

…Unhealthy habits alchemize into conscious and higher alignment choices…

…Shitty boundaries transform into honesty and integrity.

This magical combination of energy allows self-love to permeate the essence of your being, and you become a lighthouse that empowers others to do the same. It is gate 10 in action.

I’ll teach you “how” inside theHuman Design Map + Portal.

On my own path, for which there are still plenty of miles to go, I’ve discovered that the more I practice self-love, the more I say yes to myself, and the more I create the space necessary for self-understanding, the more fun and meaningful my life is.

And ironically enough, the more I love myself, the easier it is for me to show up for others. By giving from the overflow of my full cup, I can be in genuine service without the bitterness and resentment that filled my earlier years.

I now trust that the more I give myself, the more I have to give to others. And that what other people think about my path is about them.

It can only be that way.

Title: Human Design Gate 11 – Gene Key 11 – The Idea Factory
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 11 isThe Gate of Ideas. But I call itThe Idea Factorybecause its primary action is to revel in the process of pondering life’s greatest questions without attachment to finding answers.

## About Human Design Gate 11 – Gene Key 11

Archetype Name:The Idea Factory
