### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 11

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 11 is the energy forinner contemplation through visualization.Gate 11 initiates itself and others into self-reflection with it’s ideas. But also knows that ideas are only as powerful as the timing in which they are delivered.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 11 is the energy forhaving an overactive imagination that leads to anxiety and fear. It also has a tendency to burn out from trying to act on every idea.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling hard headed, in denial or out of touch but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 11 (Gene Key 11)

Gate 11 is especially interesting to me.

It isundefinedin my chart, but I haveHuman Design Gate 56hanging in mydefinedthroat. And, probably more importantly, I have a small split between my ajna and throat; gates17,23, or 11 will bridge that split.

I talk about splits inside the Nine Centers Guide, which is inside theHuman Design Mapportal. But, essentially, a small split means that you only have one gate that will transform your chart from split definition to single definition. That means that gate 11 is a highly electromagnetic gate for me and, as with anyundefined places in our charts, is a place where I’ve been gathering wisdom my whole life. It has shown me a lot about how our imagination plays such an important role in the stories we tell (56).

Often, we think that our imagination (11) and stories (56) are “the truth.”

And with my defined head and ajna (via the channel of awareness61–24), I’ve been wrestling with the concept of Truth my whole life. “Truth” is a deeply subjective part of this mystery called life.

Recognizing that Truth is subjective brings me the most peace of mind. No oneknowshow we got here, why we came, and what happens when we die.

The only thing we ever really have is our inner wisdom and sense of resonance, and choosing to trust leads us to our growth edge.

We can choose to believe in our inner Truth. Or we can choose to believe in our conditioning.

While it can hurt to realize it initially, it’s all a choice.

Your thoughts, beliefs, ideas, opinions, and yes, even your “Truth” is 100% optional. The sentences in your mind aren’t set in stone – they are malleable like clay.

And when we are caught up in our stories (gate 56), especially the “negative” ones, it clouds our ability to make peace with other people having a different Truth. And this can destroy our relationships.

(Inside theHuman Design MapPortal, I have a quick and dirty guide on decoding Human Design relationship charts. If you are a map customer, the guide is in the section called “Quick and Dirty Guides”.)

For most of my life, I held a story (gate 56) that belonging was dependent on shared beliefs and values. I used to believe that to “get along” with people, we had to think and believe the same things. And that if we disagreed, then it was a recipe for trouble in the relationship.

Anytime there was even a semblance of disagreement, I would whip up far-out scenarios in my imagination. I would visualize the worst possible outcome and weave doom and gloom stories.

A self fulfilling prophecy.

What I’ve come to understand, though, is that differences are NOT the problem. It is the attachment to “Truth” that is the real troublemaker.

When we are attached to something, we depend on it to create our feelings and emotions. And when that thing isn’t there, we spiral into hopelessness, despair, fear, and shame.

When we need other people to agree with us, we depend on their agreement to feel safe, secure, whole, or worthy.

That attachment is a 100% faulty foundation for relationships. If your feelings depend on how other people think, feel, and align with your beliefs and ideals, you are truly up shit’s creek.

Attachment cannot build growth and expansion – it will crumble.

We are moving into the era of individual empowerment (2027 – 2438), it is time for our foundations to be built upon “the truth” of  inner wisdom and resonance. And in letting go of the attachment to how our individual “truth” lands with others.

To begin using our imagination (11) to weave up stories (gate 56) about empowered relationships that thrive when each individual is empowered.

No doubt, life will invite you, time and time again, to make peace with not reallyknowing. And, in doing so, we make space for a new vision beyond our wildest imagination.

“Spillin’ out like waterLike a mountain gave a daughterSurrender never felt so goodI grew it strong like a sacred woodAnd now the roots are running deeperAll illusion getting weakerYou see, the wisdom it don’t come from readingIt comes from believingWhat I know, is that I don’t knowAnd now I dance and I sing and I live fullI give it all to the call of the unknownAho”

Trevor Hall, The Fruitful Darkness, What I Know (on SpotifyORlive in concert on youtube)

The growth edge is in exploring the attachments and letting them go, piece by piece, and building a foundation of belief and faith simply because you trust yourself.

In that space, the mind becomes a fun playground of imagination, curiosity, and awe rather than a boulder weighing you down.

Magick.

If you want to learn “the how”, grab yourmapand go on the journey inside themapportal.

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 11 are available to you, whether you have it in your chart or not…

Right now, in this moment, what is your Truth?

When you think about the possibility of your Truth being wrong, what feelings come up for you?

In what ways do you need others to agree with you?

In what ways are you attached to your beliefs, thoughts, and ideas?

How can you create those feelings for yourself without being dependent on external sources?

My hope is that you will make some space to really reflect on these questions and let your Truth rise to the surface. And in that, you will find healing, strength, and power to live your Truth.

Title: Human Design Gate 12 – Gene Key 12 – The Fine Artist
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 12 isThe Gate of Caution. But I call it TheArtisan of Life because its primary action is to make your life your work of art.

## About Human Design Gate 12 – Gene Key 12

Archetype Name:The Artisan of Life

In Action:express emotion through poetry and the Art of Life

Keywords:being poetic, artistic expression, and discernment

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Caution

Human Design Definition:The quality of restraint and the importance of meditation and inaction in confronting temptation.

Core Theme:Discriminating taste.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the Solar Plexus center viahuman design gate 22.

Tropical Sign:Gemini

Gene Keys Shadow:Vanity

Gene Keys Gift:Discrimination

Gene Keys Siddhi:Purity

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Map & Portalis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 12

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 12 is the energy for expressing emotions through art, especially the art of language, in a highly refined way. Gate 12 wants nothing more than to pour everything it has into art and share it with the world. It has “good taste” and idealistic visions of beauty, art, andGrace.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 12 is the energy for holding people, organizations, and art to impossible standards of perfection. It can easily push other people’s buttons with its words and can even have a bit of a superiority complex because of its highly refined “palate” in life.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are using words as weapons but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 12 (Gene Key 12)

Gate 12 is undefined in my chart, but it’s one of the ones I find myself contemplating again and again. Like all of Human Design, what keeps me coming back isn’t just the mechanics — it’s the golden threads between the correspondences that create the puzzle we call the bodygraph.

Some of the correspondences for Gate 12 are that it’s in Gemini, which is ruled by Mercury and is mutable. It’s in the throat center in the Human Design chart. And because it connects to a motor center, the solar plexus, via Gate 22, it’s a “manifesting” gate.

Let’s break that down.

### Gemini, Ruled By Mercury

I’ve talked before about how most of the throat gates are in Gemini. And it tracks, right?

Gemini is Mercury’s domain. Mercury was the God of Commerce. He loaded up his metaphorical cart and brought valuable goods to the market. But more than simply delivering them, hecommunicatedtheir value. He shaped perception. He told the story of why they mattered.

And even deeper than that, he was a shapeshifter. A trickster. A poet. A magician. He moved between worlds, translated meaning, and cloaked deep truths in metaphor so they could be received by the hearts that needed them.

Language was more than expression. It was his tool of transmission. It was how he manifested.

### The Throat Center & Manifesting in Human Design

In Human Design, the throat is where manifestation happens. But, true to the mercurial roots of the throat, manifesting isn’t about vision boards and good vibes.

When we are talking about manifesting in Human Design, we are talking about how energy moves from the head, ajna, will, spleen, G, heart, sacral, root, and solar plexus. The energy on the inside of the body is moving out into the world.

A very, very (probably over simplified example) is crying.

Crying is sadness made visible. You can now touch the sadness with your hands. It becomes more than a sensation in the body, it becomes the sound of sobs, the taste of salt, and ruins your mascara.

That energy expressing itself in the “real” world is manifestation in Human design.

(✨Side note: If you’re a Manifestor or Manifesting Generator, I talk more about this in yourHuman Design Map.)

Whether through words, actions, deeds, or “art,” most of the energy manifesting through the throat communicates to the world who you are and what you are about. It’s Mercury’s way of loading up your metaphorical cart and “marketing” it to the world.

### What Does That Have To Do With Gate 12?

In case you didn’t know, Gate 12 has gone through a few name changes in theHuman Design Map. It started asThe Poet. ThenThe Fine Artist. The most recent change wasThe Artisan of Life.

But that evolution wasn’t about me changing my mind.

It was me listening to what Mercury was telling me, straight out of the mouths of mymapclients.

People with Gate 12 defined — even in their incarnation cross — would say things like:

But I’m not a poet.

I don’t make art. I don’t even really like it.

I’m terrible with words. I actually don’t talk much.

And my Gemini Moon (in Gate 16, naturally)was nothaving that. Because I knew that it meant my words – my communication – weren’t landing.

They were putting people in unnecessary boxes. Perhaps even perpetuating the very people pleasing, pretending, and putting words in their mouths. And when that happens, your energy gets misdirected and cannot “manifest” in its most potent, purposeful form.

And that is the last thing I want to contribute to.

I’m all about liberating you from all the ways in which you sacrifice your integrity for the fruitless venture of “making” other people happy. And teaching you the skills necessary to leverage and channel your energy in ways that leave you satisfied, successful, peaceful, and delightfully surprised by the magick of life.

(That’s the deeper work we do in theMap and Portal— not just naming energies, but helping you direct them toward what’s actually authentic to you.)

So, when the words don’t land, and you don’t feel seen, it’s time for me to listen even more deeply. And to put my ego aside to make the chart even more applicable in the lives of people living real-world lives everyday.

And as Mercury spoke, I heard:

Gate 12 is movement.And movement is art.And art is life, made manifest.

Yes, sometimes it will look literal — painting, poetry, dance, whatever. Things you can touch, taste, smell, and see.

But maybe it is more about making your life your greatest work of art. It’s about being discerning in how you move and letting it be true to what is actually inside of you — instead of moving in ways that others have conditioned you to move.

Maybe, just maybe, it’s Mercury doing what Mercury does best.

As he shape-shifts, he tells us that it doesn’t matter what we say or do on the outside. Because energy does not lie.

What matters is the inner energy that drives the expression—the energy being communicated, the value being exchanged, and the transformative lesson wrapped in the metaphor of being human.

Only time will tell ifThe Artisan of Lifewill be the archetypal name that sticks.

But what I know for sure is that Mercury has his ways. And that, even when it doesn’t seem like it on the outside, life always moves us towards expanding our capacity for authenticity, purpose, Grace, and expression.

This life, the one we are living here and now, is our Masterpiece.

Message received, Mercury. Message received.

And if you’re ready to hear the call of your soul so loud and clear that you cannot unsee its wisdom and truth,invite me here.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 12

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 12:

I transform my emotions into poetry and art.

My life is my art.

I have impeccable taste.

In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 12

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 12 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

How might you begin to make space to express your emotions with Grace?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 12.

Title: Human Design Gate 13 – Gene Key 13 – The Sounding Board

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 13

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 13 is the energy for listening to others’ secrets while holding the frequency of forgiveness. The 13 believes everyone needs someone who can listen with empathy, compassion, and grace. It feels deeply connected to others by listening to their stories, experiences, and challenges.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 13 is the energy for being a dumping ground for people’s secrets, challenges, and darkness. And it can struggle with an unwillingness to forgive and hold onto anger, blame, and resentment.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling angry, gossipy or loose lipped but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 13 (Gene Key 13)

Gate 13 undefined in my chart, but interestingly enough, it is connected to recognizing my gifts with theHuman Design system.

As a5/2 profile, I’m in the “double projection field,” which essentially means that people don’t see me – they see the projection of their hopes, dreams, and expectations. And an essential part of mykarmic roleis to be able to “call myself out” on my natural gifts and use them accordingly. Otherwise, I waste all of my energy on trying to live up to othersprojections.

And, depending on how long you’ve been in my orbit, you may not know that I came to Human Design kicking and screaming. I didn’t plan on Human Design being a part of my energy healing business and definitely had no idea that it would eventually become the “face” of my business. It took me a minute to see that I have something unique to say in the Human Design space.

In hindsight, I realize that, like so many otherprojector types, I was deeply resistant to being seen, recognized, and invited in natural and easy ways. Due to decades of conditioning, I was deeply attached to the story that it was hard and complicated to be successful.

Many synchronicities helped medeconditionresistance to ease, but one of them was connected to gate 13. (Be sure to also read my post onHuman Design gate 15, which tells the story the started it all.)

I was listening to some music on Spotify and felt the heavy weight of the lyrics. I could sense the burden of being a keeper of the secrets and not knowing what to do with the betrayal, lies, and shame.

The thought popped into my head:

This song sounds like gate 13.

That may not be surprising if you’ve come to know me because of my depth of knowledge (and sheer fascination) with thehuman design gates. Today, I can rattle off endless information about every gate in the chart. I can tell you all of its mechanical details, wax poetic about the beauty of its full spectrum, and tell you what it means in different placements.

(Inside theHuman Design Mapportal, there are all sorts of fun ways we work with gates and channels, including business, relationships, and transits.)

But, at that time, I couldn’t tell you much about them – not even the ones in my own chart.

So, being the Human Design stalker I am, I looked up the artists’ birth information, ran their chart, and saw gate 13 in their conscious sun.

Looking at that chart, I had a moment of calling myself out. Through the mystery of Grace, the gates were seemingly hard coded into my cells. I could hear them speak.

Until then, I’d had multiple moments when looking at charts where I could see that I had a unique understanding of energy. And that Human Design gives me a shortcut because now I have language for expressing what I always intuitively knew.

But, this moment was different because of its precision (shout out togate 62in my unconscious sun ;)).

It was crystal clear that I have a special connection with Human Design, and gate 13 was working its magick on me.

It was like I’d whispered into the ears of the Universe and told it that I was ready. I would no longer hold shame about the “woo-woo” nature of my gifts, the illogical way that I know things, and, most importantly, I began forgiving myself for waiting this long to claim my genius.

From there, I’ve gone on to create wild, wild success.

Every day, with theHuman Design Map + Portal, my blog,substack, and emails, I help others understand and own their genius. I help them stand boldly in who they are and to clear the “blocks” that get in the way of their higher purpose. It blows my mind constantly.

But that is the beauty of…

….having your secrets held with unconditional love and forgiveness.

…being able to stand vulnerable before a listening ear and knowing it will all be OK.

…giving voice to your deepest, most intimate parts and trusting that it will be met with empathy and Grace.

That is what happened for me that day. And I will never forget it.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 13

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 13:

I listen deeply with empathy.

I trust that forgiveness is possible.

I let go of the things that do not serve me or the collective.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate13

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 13 are available to you, (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Are you able to hold space for other people’s stories with forgiveness?

Are you able to hold space for your own stories with forgiveness?

What are your boundaries around listening? How are you honoring those boundaries?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate13.

And, if you have gate 13 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check outThe Human Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 14 – Gene Key 14 – The Prosperity Lumen
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 14 isThe Gate of Power Skills. But I call itThe Prosperity Lumenbecause its primary action is to create prosperity by doing work you love and inspiring others to do the same.

## About Human Design Gate 14 – Gene Key 14

Archetypal Name:The Prosperity Lumen

In Action:follow your dreams to create true prosperity

Keywords:prosperity, dream work, and inspiration

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Power Skills

Human Design Definition:The accumulation and retention of power through skilled interaction, coupling grace with control.

Core Theme:Generating resources to empower direction in life.

Bodygraph Center:Sacral center and connects to the G center viahuman design gate 2.

Tropical Sign:Scorpio/Sagittarius

Gene Keys Shadow:Compromise

Gene Keys Gift:Competence

Gene Keys Siddhi:Bounteousness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 14

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 14 is the energy for prosperity, dream work, and inspiration. It shows you the path for making money by following your dreams.

On the “negative” spectrum, Human Design Gate 14 is the energy for getting stuck in the fear that you won’t be able to make your dreams come true. This can create a life where you feel stuck doing things you hate for the sake of making money.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling incapable, helpless or enslaved but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 14 (Gene Key 14)

Gate 14 isundefinedin my chart and as aProjector aura type, so is mysacral center.

When I am unconscious of my energy boundaries, I can easily get caught up in the sacral energy of the people around me and amplify it. And, let me tell you, when someone is on the “high” end of thespectrum, that experience is amazing. But when they are on the “low” end, not so much.

My experience is that, as a society, most people are on the low end of the gate 14 spectrum. There is so, so, so much bound up in our relationship to money. Money, while originally intended as an easy way to exchange value, has become synonymous with safety, security, and sustenance.

Which means that, collectively, in an attempt to stay safe, secure, and fed, we have tucked our purpose away and are exchanging the precious moments of our lives for money. And, on the flip side of that, we are also told that money can’t buy happiness or that it isn’t “spiritual” to want money.

I get messages to those effects in theHuman Design Mapportal all the time.

Money seems to be a huge point of contention when learning to trust ourselves and becoming more authentic in our lives. We “need” the money and we deeply believe that staying where we are is the safest thing to do. And we beat ourselves up – feeling selfish, guilty, and unevolved – for even caring about it

It’s tricky. Nuanced. And feels incredibly complex. Maybe even hopeless.

I get it.

I was raised in poverty, scarcity, and lack. It’s like the stress of it is encoded into my cells. And, yet, I was also raised to believe that money was the root of all evil and that wanting more money proved I was a “bad” person (in the eyes of God).

And I’ve felt those same conflicted feelings. I’ve desperately needed more money to pay my bills. While simultaneously feeling shameful for believing that money would solve all my problems.

I’ve heard similar stories inside themapportal as well. People tell me things like:

- There isn’t a way to make money doing what I love.

- I have to be responsible. If I did what I love, I’d be broke.

- I don’t want to prioritize making money over my authenticity but I do. And I hate it.

Some people are even drawn into Human Design from the false promise that “living your design” will make you rich. Which is so ironic because Ra Uru Hu, the original channeler of theHuman Design System, taught that the we make money through our not self.

Personally, I don’t subscribe to either of those beliefs. The whole concept of “living your design” is marketing. Period. And the idea that we can only make money through thenot selfis simplya projectionof the spiritual idea that money is evil.

Like I said before, it’s complicated. There are markers in theHuman Design chartthat can help us explore our relationship to money. And it also offers us insights and tools for becoming more authentic.

But, ultimately, creating prosperity begins with being radically honest with ourselves about our internal patterns with money and work. It’s about looking at our:

- values and how aligned our financial habits of earning, spending, and investing are with those values

- sense of self worth and owning the value we bring to “the market.”

- capacity for expansion and receiving. Does it feel safe to experience true abundance?

- resourcefulness and trusting ourselves to tap into it, no matter the bottom line.

- level of responsibility for our outcomes and willingness to let go of blame.

- relationship with pressure and how discerning we are in leveraging it correctly.

- where we have unconscious internalized oppression and our relationship with power

- codependency and hanging our hopes on a savior.

- faith, trust, and belief.

And, probably some things I’m not even aware of. But, what i know for sure is that as we explore and find Truth, making a change is necessary. Even if it is teeny tiny.

You don’t need to burn your whole life down. In fact, in the MAP Method for Deconditioning (which is included with theHuman Design Map), I recommend micro changes and deliberate expansion of your capacity to make uncomfortable changes. A plane that shifts 1° ends up in an entirely different place.

As we do that internal work, the outer world will change. It can only be that way.

As above, so below.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 14

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 14:

I am prosperous.

My life is abundant.

I make money doing what I love.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 14

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 14 are available to you, (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What does prosperity mean to you? What does it look like? What does feel like? What values does it honor?

If money were not in the equation, what would you do with your life? What beliefs and shadows are standing in your way of making that your reality?

What do you LOVE doing more than anything else?

What shadows do you need to own in order to allow prosperity in your life?

What choice can you make – TODAY – to start moving closer and closer to a prosperous future? One that is steeped in satisfaction, success, peace, and delight?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 14.

And, if you have gate 14 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 15 – Gene Key 15 – The Wild Heart
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 15 isThe Gate of Extremes. But I call itThe Wild Heartbecause its primary action is to march to the beat of your own drum.

## About Human Design Gate 15 – Gene Key 15

Archetypal Name:The Wild Heart

In Action:to march to the beat of your own drum

Keywords:wild, personal rhythm, radical authenticity

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Extremes

Human Design Definition:The quality of behavior which expresses the proper balance between extremes.

Core Theme:Loving humanity, embracing different rhythms, and extremes of behavior.

Bodygraph Center:G center and connects to the Sacral center viahuman design gate 5.

Tropical Sign:Gemini/Cancer

Gene Keys Shadow:Dullness

Gene Keys Gift:Magnetism

Gene Keys Siddhi:Florescence

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 15

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 15 is the energy for wildness, marching to the beat of your own drum. Gate 15 believes every living being on the planet is worthy of love and acceptance and has the remarkable ability to unconditionally love humans’ diverse natures.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 15 is the energy for seeking extremes to avoid the dullness of life. It is unable to slow down and find a consistent rhythm. It may also shut down due to conventional rules or societal pressure to be like everyone else.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are being inauthentic or not finding your flow but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 15 (Gene Key 15)

As a writer who tells many personal stories, I aim to balance sharing what is true for me and the truth that all stories aren’t mine to tell.

Finding this balance seems the trickiest when I’ve had a profound revelation involving someone who either cannot speak for themselves or who, for various reasons, doesn’t want their side of the story told.

This particular story is a combination of all of those things.

It’s a story that symbolizes one of the most healing insights I’ve ever been blessed to receive. It is a story that I know must be told.

Let’s start at the beginning.

WithHuman Design Gate 28in my chart 4 times, my life has been riddled with the existential fear that my life has no meaning or purpose, and healing that story is one of the key drivers in what I do inside the​Human Design Map & Portal​.

A therapist once told me that people with stories like mine jump off of bridges. An astrologer told me she’d need a stiff drink to read my chart. A Human Design “intuitive” once told me I should give up on making money, file for unemployment, and play video games for the rest of my life.

So, to say that I’ve experienced a lot of trauma would be an understatement. I’ve been shocked and shaken to my core more times than I can count (Human Design Gate 51 in my Conscious Earth). And I’ve wallowed in seemingly needless suffering for as long as I can remember.

I often look back on my life and cannot believe it’s only been one lifetime. And I’m no stranger to wondering how I will ever keep going.

All along the way, I’ve searched for my purpose and deeply doubted my ability to make a difference in the world.

​Even after over a decade of receiving mind-blowing praise — clients who’ve said I’m a miracle worker, or that I’ve made lifetimes of self-doubt disappear into thin air, or that they finally know what it feels like to experience their innate wholeness — I never really believed that I had anything to offer.

​And then, at the end of April 2020, I got one of the covetedProjector Invitations.

At that point, I was deep into my personal experiment with Human Design. I had been having many behind-the-scenes conversations with my colleagues, friends, and private clients, but I had zero intentions of doing anything “official” with it in my business. And I definitely had no idea of the wild success I’d experience with the​Human Design Map & Portal​.

At that time, I did private coaching for creatives who struggled with shame, self-worth, and feeling “not good enough.”

But, true to myprojector aura, people started asking me if they could pay me to interpret their Human Design.

And I kept saying no.

At that time, a part of me still believed that making money had to be much harder. That part of me thought that because Human Design came so naturally and easily to me—to the point that it seemed like “everyone understands this already”—it had no value in the real world.

But on that fateful Thursday, April 30, 2020, someone I love and deeply respect metaphorically knocked me upside the head and insisted that I let her give me money to make the first​Human Design Map​.

I sent her an invoice, she paid it instantly, and on Saturday, May 2, I got to work on her​map​.

As I sat there, surrounded by myHuman Design and Gene Keys books, highlighters, pencils, and my dot grid notebook, I began writing about her incarnation cross, and tears were streaming down my face.

I translated Human Design’s harsh and often disempowering language into pure, empowering magic.

I had no idea how I was doing it. It was just burning through me like aHoly Fire.

Something inside me came alive – something I had never known was there.

With no exaggeration, I say that for the first time in my life, I KNEW I had something to offer the world.

With every fiber of my being, I knew what I was doing meant something. And I knew that everyone on the planet deserved to see themselves in the light of Grace and that, by the great mystery of all that is, that light was shining through me.

A fire was lit inside of me. And I could not wait for Monday to come. This profound sense of purpose changed everything for me.

And then, my world flipped upside down.

The next morning, May 3, 2020, withbooksand pens still strewn across my desk, I woke up to missed calls from my sister and a text message saying to call her ASAP.

My heart sank.

She picked up the phone, and she said:

Bryan passed away last night.

I said:

Wait, is this really happening?

It was not computing in my brain.

See, Bryan was one of my younger brothers. And my other younger brother, Ronnie, had also tragically died many years before. And my brain did not want to accept that I’d lost not just one younger brother but two.

But, it was true. I wasn’t dreaming. Under more tragic circumstances, Bryan was gone.

He was 37 years old and left behind a wife and two daughters.

I immediately began packing my things and headed to North Carolina to be with my family.

Just over a week later, we held Bryan’s funeral right next to Ronnie’s grave.

A couple of hundred people were there, many of whom I had never met.

I listened closely as so many of them honored him by sharing the impact that he’d made on their lives.

Time and time again, they said the same thing about him. They said:

Bryan was full of heart.

And he was.

I didn’t know it then, but Bryan had gate 15 in his conscious sun.

His energy was big. And bold. And you could hear him coming from a mile away.

He gave zero fucks about what other people thought he should do with his life, and he loved hard.

On that day, it was palpable. He was a Vessel of Love, and he’d left exactly that mark on the world.

But this story doesn’t end there.

There was also a sharp contrast between what was being said in those mini-eulogies and the whispers among the crowd.

Just as people shared that Bryan had had a profound and healing impact on their lives, many well-meaning people wondered if Bryan was in Hell—as in, burning for eternity with the “devil.”

On the outside, Bryan lived the kind of life many people would not (and did not) approve of. Those parts of the story are not mine to tell. But, I will say that he was often seen as doing life wrong.

And while I don’t believe in Hell or eternal damnation, I, too, had been guilty of judging the way that Bryan lived his life. Until his funeral, I would have never looked at his life and said that he was someone who was living his purpose. A big part of me absolutely believed that he should be doing things differently.

But I also knew that those people who shared about his big heart were right. His life was a mess, AND he was Love walking.

Man, I miss his hugs.

In the contrast, I could see that he was the embodiment of the BOTH/AND.

When I returned home, I ran his Human Design chart for the first time; it truly stunned me.

In his chart, his G center and Will center are defined, which combined are the heart chakra in the Hindu chakra system.

And with Gate 15 in his conscious sun, his incarnation cross was the Vessel of Love.

Bryan was, in fact, full of heart.

Looking at that chart, a deep peace washed over me.

The part of me that had longed for purpose and meaning my whole life surrendered to this knowing:

Bryan was living his purpose.

Maybe it didn’t look like it on the outside.

But he was. And he always was. There was never a time he wasn’t.

Even when he was doing things we often believed he shouldn’t.

Bryan was living his purpose.

Everything I’d believed about purpose shattered. In a flash, the story was completely rewritten.

Purpose isn’t something that we find. It isn’t something that happens to a select few. It isn’t something we have to strive for, achieve, or prove in an attempt to earn worthiness on this Earth. It isn’t even about what we are doing for other people.

Our purpose is to live life — as ourselves with our conscious sun as our north star — and our real work is to recognize it; to accept the Divine Invitation. It is to open our hearts and minds and to expand our capacity to receive the bounty of who we really are. It is to allow ourselves to revel in the magic that flows through each and every one of us. To know that there is nothing to prove, earn, or be to be worthy of Love and Grace.

We are LOVE walking already.

​As my heart cracked open, I knew I needed to tell everyone who would listen that you could end your quest to “find” your life purpose with a decision.

You must decide that your purpose is already alive and well. You must decide that you’ll allow yourself to experience it. You must decide to recognize it and receive it.

You must decide that living your life — as yourself — is the purpose. You must decide to love yourself through the times you forget how beautifully powerful and purposeful you are.

These decisions will free you from the despair of purposelessness.

They will empower you to alchemize your darkest moments into a rare jewel encased in 24K Gold.

On that day, I made that decision for myself. I decided that who I am is enough. I decided I was no longer available for the story of brokenness, unworthiness, or purposelessness. I decided to surrender to my gifts.

And, in time, I returned to working on that very firstHuman Design Mapwith more devotion than I ever knew was possible.

I have zero doubt that people need this work, and they need it in a way that only I can deliver.

Because everyone deserves to see, feel, and experience the purpose simmering under the surface in every thought, feeling, and action in their world.

The features of the​map​have changed a lot since then. It went from a simple PDF to a 100+ page written guide, a robust portal with plenty of follow-up support, and the MAP Method for Deconditioning course, which teaches you my three-step process for getting in tune with your inner wisdom, healing the shit that blocks you, and how to make aligned choices, even in the face of adversity. It is the “how” of overcoming people-pleasing and living on purpose.​Check it out here​.

Bryan has been by my side the whole time. HisWild Heartis cheering me. And he is proud of the legacy he left behind, which was this:

We are all Love. We are all the stuff of stars. We are all under the blanket of Grace.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 15

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 15:

I march to the beat of my own drum.

I choose radical authenticity.

I am wild and will not be tamed.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 15

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 15 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Are you willing to march to the beat of your own drum?

Have you opened your heart to love everyone, especially people who aren’t like you? Why or why not?

What does your wild heart want?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 15.

And, if you have gate 15 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 16 – Gene Key 16 – The Mastery Maven
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 16 isThe Gate of Skills. But I call itThe Mastery Mavenbecause its primary action is to be devoted to the mastery of your craft.

## About Human Design Gate 16 – Gene Key 16

Archetype Name:The Mastery Maven

In Action:to be devoted to the master of your craft

Keywords:talent, skill, enthusiasm, and your commitment to mastery

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Skills

Human Design Definition:The great art of enriching life by the harmonic channeling of energy.

Core Theme:To skillfully master something.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the Splenic center viahuman design gate 48.

Tropical Sign:Gemini

Gene Keys Shadow:Indifference

Gene Keys Gift:Versatility

Gene Keys Siddhi:Mastery

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 16

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 16 is the energy for talent, skill, enthusiasm and the commitment to mastery. Gates 16 believes that practice does not make perfect – it makes mastery and the grit of mastery is infinitely more rewarding than perfection. With this attitude firmly in place, its make it’s mark in the world with the mastery of it’s craft.

On the other end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 16 is the energy for perfectionism or hiding who you are as a result of unhealed shame. It can easily become obsessed with the “right” way to do things or waiting to “be ready” before starting things.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are holding yourself back in shame but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 16 (Gene Key 16)

BothHuman Design Gate 48and Gate 16 are defined on the conscious side of my chart, creating the full channel of the wavelength.

The 16, in particular, is defined in my conscious moon in line 6.

Anytime we have a gate in line 6, we will go through three distinct phases with that energy in our lives. (You canread about the Human Design Profiles and Lines here.)

The first phase, from birth to the first Saturn Return (around age 28), looks more like a 3rd line. There are lots of mistakes and failed experiments. But, unlike the 3rd line, the 6th line mostly learns the emotional resilience skills necessary to“bounce back” from failure in the second phase.

Note:Inside the​Human Design Map Portal​, you will find a course called Transits & Returns, where I explain how those are interpreted in Human Design in a bit more detail.

The second phase begins at the first Saturn Return and lasts through the Chiron Return (around age 50). During this time, the 6th line goes “on the roof” to gain perspective, heal from the wounds of the first phase, and develop wisdom about their experiences.

By the third phase, after the Chiron Return, the sixth line steps into its role-model energy and becomes an embodiment of the wisdom it developed while on the roof.

These are the same phases anyone with a 6 in their profile will go through. If you have a 6 in your profile (3/6, 4/6, 6/2, 6/3), I will explain them in my post onprofiles and linesand even more thoroughly in the​Human Design Map​.

These phases are not hard and fast rules, of course.

Because we are more than our Human Design, things like trauma, social structures,our capacity, and environment play huge roles in moving through life.

The sixth line, in particular, is very sensitive to social influence. In our current culture, we aren’t encouraged to step back from life to gather perspective. We are encouraged to go, do, be, and have all the things all the time.

Living by that conditioning can prolong the healing that needs to happen for any of the 6th line energies in our chart.

When I originally wrote this contemplation, I was 47 and still “on the roof” with all the line 6 energy in my chart. I am not a 6th-line profile; my profile is 5/2. But as I approach my Chiron Return, I can definitely feel the places in my chart where the 6th line is defined.

In gate 16, it has only been in the last few years that I’ve gained some perspective on old patterns of perfectionism and my obsession with getting things right.

Gate 48plays perfectly into this. Its “lower” expression can become paralyzed because you believe that you don’t know enough.

So, when you combine the belief that you don’t know enough with the belief that you need to make everything perfect, you have the perfect storm of not creating much.

You end up going in circles, often reinventing the wheel, and never “feeling ready” to move forward.

This pattern became clear to me once I started my business in 2009.

I would literally obsess about everything I put out into the world.

One of the first coaching programs I ever developed was calledAbundant Self Care, which included videos.

I had no experience filming or editing videos, and my inner perfectionist was running the show.

I genuinely believed I should be able to sit down, turn on the camera, say everything perfectly from memory, and upload the video without a single edit…on the first try.

And I was so mad and ashamed because that wasn’t how it went. Ever.

I remember talking to my business coach about it; she told me it was OK for it not to be perfect.

God rest her soul, she said something that changed my life:

“Done” is better than “perfect.”

She told me that it was more important to start helping people by just putting something out than never producing anything.

I will be forever grateful for her perspective and for how it started mydeconditioning processaround perfectionism.

I wish I could say I never struggle with perfectionism anymore, but that would be a straight-up lie.

I can still become obsessed over tiny details (Human Design Gate 9) and throw the baby out with the bathwater when things aren’t “just right.” True to gate 16 being defined in my moon, it is deeply intertwined with how I relate to my inner world.

I can’t even tell you how many times my inner perfectionist has told me that the​Human Design Map​is shit and that I should burn it all down to the ground. Thankfully, I am surrounded by people who recognize me and can remind me as many times as it takes that my work is incredibly valuable to the world. And that perfection isn’t required, or even preferred, to be of deep service to others.

As I have gotten older, gained more perspective, and learned how to self-recognize, it is much easier to catch myself in those patterns and stop them in their tracks.

And I have even started to enjoy the process of practice and repetition (aka mastery).

I’ve come to embrace the idea of “b minus work,” letting others see me as not being perfect and putting things out into the world because they will help people rather than fluff up my ego.

At the end of the day, I can see that perfectionism is actually an epic waste of energy.

Perfectionism does nothing for the people I am here to help. It gets me all up in my head, bypassing the wisdom of my body and soul. And it completely blocks my ability to master anything.

And that is so good to know.

If you struggle with perfectionism, you’ll love the process I teach inside theHuman Design Map & Portal. It will help you learn how to leverage your energy and get out of your own way.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 16

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 16:

I am making marks by mastering my craft.

Ready is a state of mind.

I transcend the status quo through mastery.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 16

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 16 are always available to you(whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Do you struggle with perfectionism?

Are you willing to do things over and over again without shaming yourself for it?

What have you mastered and how did you do it? (Don’t get all perfectionistic and think that only huge accomplishments counts, everything counts.)

What do the things you’ve mastered tell you about the process of mastery? And how can you remind yourself of those things when you get stuck in perfectionism?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 16.

And, if you have gate 16 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 17 – Gene Key 17 – The Powerful Opinion
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 17 isThe Gate of Opinion. But I call it ThePowerful Opinionbecause its primary action is to find logical solutions, answers, and ideas that will create collective harmony.

## About Human Design Gate 17 – Gene Key 17

Archetype Name:The Powerful Opinion

In Action:create solutions with well-informed opinions

Keywords:your opinions, creating harmonious solutions, and logic

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Opinion

Human Design Definition:The ancient law that those who wish to rule must know how to serve.

Core Theme:Fear of Challenge.

Bodygraph Center:Ajna center and connects to the Throat center viahuman design gate 62.

Tropical Sign:Aries

Gene Keys Shadow:Opinion

Gene Keys Gift:Far-Sightedness

Gene Keys Siddhi:Omniscience

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 17

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 17 is the energy for finding logical solutions, answers, and ideas. Gate 17 is aware that everyone thrives when everyone thrives, and tends to be fair, unbiased, and committed to finding win-wins with it’s solutions.

On the other end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 17 is the energy for being dogmatic, authoritarian, or mentally inflexible. It can create disorder or disharmony by being narrow-minded can easily get trapped in black and white thinking.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling authoritative, unfair or dogmatic but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 17 (Gene Key 17)

Gate 17 is undefined in my chart, but it is one of the most significant undefined gates.

First, gate 62, the other side of the channel of acceptance, is defined in the unconscious sun of myincarnation cross.

I also have a small split definition between my throat and ajna, which can be bridged by gates 17, 23, or 11.

Those two things combined make gate 17 the most electromagnetically attractive gate.

Good thing I married a man with a hanging gate 17. 🤣

It’s been an interesting experience to get to know this gate.

What I’ve discovered is that I was holding a lot of “not-self” themes around gate 17.

I always thought that I needed to have an opinion about EVERYTHING. I wanted to be asked about my opinions, even when I didn’t have one. And I often felt bitter and resentful towards others who seemed to know and express their views easily.

Deconditioninggate 17 hasn’t been a matter of never having an opinion. I still have plenty to go around. (Readthis,this, andthis.)

The highest potential of our undefined places is becoming wise about how, when, and why we use that energy—and practicing non-attachment when we don’t consistently experience that energy.

With gate 17, I discovered that I only need strong opinions sometimes – when it matters. I can have opinions without making other people’s opinions wrong. And it’s beneficial for me to take in all sides before forming opinions instead of just looking at one side.

Gate 61 in my unconscious earth also plays a role here.

What I know is that I don’t know.

Truth isn’t objective- it is subjective.

Everyone is weaving their personal fabric of reality.

Embodying this is freedom.

And it has given me so much energy back– especially regarding my work with Human Design andthe map.

Like every other topic on the planet, the Human Design space is FULL of opinions and people ready to tell you that you are doing it wrong. And I’ve had my fair share of people “coming at me” about how I approach the system.

There is no way I’d be able to handle the criticism if I was attached to my opinion being “right.”

Instead, I can take full ownership that I’m not trying to be right. I always tell my map clients to take what they can use and leave the rest.

As a 5/2, I aim to make Human Design practical, simple and empowering.

My ultimate intention is to help others trust themselves and embody their personal truth – even when it doesn’t match their chart.

I don’t believe that Human Design is the answer to all of life’s problems. It is a tool that helps us focus our attention inward – and that’s it.

Other people have different opinions.

And it isn’t up to me to decide whether that is right or wrong. It is up to me to trust myself and the path before me.

I pray that I continue to deepen into non-attachment around my opinions. And to let myself off the hook for managing the opinions of others.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 17

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 17:

My opinions are trustworthy and they stand the test of time.

I develop informed opinions by understanding all sides of an argument.

The answers are rarely black and white and are found in the shades of grey.

In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate17

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of the 17 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Are you attached to your opinions?

Do you ever find yourself trapped in black and white thinking?

In what ways do you benefit when you believe that you are right and others are wrong?

What if you let go of the idea that opinions are either right or wrong?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate17.

And, if you have gate 17 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 18 – Gene Key 18 – The Wholeness Doctor
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 18 isThe Gate of Correction. But I call itThe Wholeness Doctorbecause its primary action is seeing the wholeness in all things.

## About Human Design Gate 18 – Gene Key 18

Archetype Name:The Wholeness Doctor

In Action:see wholeness and healing potential in all things

Keywords:healing, wholeness, and clearly seeing

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Correction

Human Design Definition:The vigilance and determination to uphold and defend basic and fundamental human rights.

Core Theme:Fear of authority.

Bodygraph Center:Spleen center and connects to the Root center viahuman design gate 58.

Tropical Sign:Libra

Gene Keys Shadow:Judgement

Gene Keys Gift:Integrity

Gene Keys Siddhi:Perfection

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 18

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 18 is the energy for seeing the wholeness in all things. Gate 18 understands that the only thing that needs to be “fixed” is the stories we tell ourselves about ourselves and about others. It easily sees the stories of brokenness that are playing out in the collective and helps others to transform those stories into wholeness.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 18 is the energy for beating yourself up with negative self-talk or being hyper-focused on the flaws and mistakes of others. It drives complaining, gossiping, worrying, and needing to be right. This, of course, only perpetuates stories of brokenness.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling judgmental, critical or mean but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 18 (Gene Key 18)

My unconscious Pluto is in gate 18.6. My conscious Pluto is in gate 48 (the gate of depth) and is conjunct with my conscious sun (human design gate 57).

On the conscious side, Pluto is the place where we go through a rebirth in our lives. It takes us into the deepest shadows of our psyche and brings us out the other side with a new sense of integrity and wholeness.

When Pluto conjunct the sun, it brings a whole new level of intensity to the (astrology) chart. It creates a drive for “truth”, depth, inner transformation, and self-realization that is unrelenting.

The unconscious side of our chart represents the “wound”, trauma pattern, or shadow that “blocks” the full expression of the conscious side.

The potent combination I have brings my absolute obsession with shadow integration work and self-realization into sharp focus.

(I teach shadow integration as an essential part of deconditioning once you have yourHuman Design Map.)

And helps me to see more deeply how gate 18 in line 6 has played its part.

When I was around 30, I was in my very first training as a coach. Debbie Ford (may she rest in power) was a guest lecturer and I became enraptured with her work.

My copy of her bookThe Dark Side of the Light Chasersis well worn with highlights, underlines, and notes.

Her work is what brought my conscious awareness ofwhat the shadow is. It opened my eyes to the idea that we are already whole and that the whole word lives inside of us.

The part that I was most enamored with was her thoughts about judging others. In the book she writes:

“Once we accept the fact that each of us embodies all the traits in the universe, we can stop pretending that we are not everything…

We adopt prejudices from our families and friends. “You’re different because you are fat and I am skinny. I am smart and you are stupid. I am timid and you are brave. I am passive and you are aggressive. I am loud and you are soft spoken.”

These beliefs maintain the illusion that we are separate. They create internal as well as external barriers that keep us from embracing the totality of our being. They keep us pointing fingers at others.

The key is to understand that there is nothing we can see or perceive that we are not.

If we did not possess a certain quality, we could not recognize it in another.

If you are inspired by someone’s courage, it is a reflection of the courage in you. If you think someone’s selfish, you can be sure that you are capable of demonstrating the same amount of selfishness.

Although these qualities will not be expressed all the time, we each have the ability to act out any quality we see.” ~ Debbie Ford

In hindsight, I can see that this was the beginning of “being on the roof” with gate 18 in line 6. I was at the end of my first Saturn Return; it was a pivotal time when I began to unwind my inner and outer critic.

(I cover how to interpret planetary seasons, such as the Saturn Return, inside theHumanDesign Mapportal. If you are already a client,you can dig in here.)

I began taking full ownership of the parts in others that I judged harshly and the ongoing inner work of stepping into a sense of wholeness.

As I have done that work, it has opened me up to the depth of my gate 48. You really can’t go very deep into anything if you aren’t willing to confront the inner critic.

And, I don’t just mean that on the “understanding yourself” level. I also mean it very practically (says my 5th line profile!).

There is no person, no system, no lineage, no leader, no bloodline who is without “fault.”  And when we allow that to hold us back, in our search for perfection, we get stopped dead in our tracks. We write them off before we even have a chance to understand on any kind of real level.

Ra Uru Hu, the original channeler of Human Design, immediately comes to mind. He wasn’t exactly the most stand up guy and did some pretty questionable things; things that today would have had him “canceled” in a heartbeat.

But, the beauty that he brought into this world with Human Design is unmistakable to me. All along the way, in the depths of my studies, I’ve had to remind myself of Debbie Ford’s words:

“The key is to understand that there is nothing we can see or perceive that we are not. If we did not possess a certain quality, we could not recognize it in another.”

I’ve reminded myself that he was a human being, just like me, and that he was perfectly flawed, fallible and whole.

And when I look at it that way, on purpose, it allows me to reclaim my own shadows and move deeper into this system that I love so much.

What a beautiful dance of shadow and light.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 18

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 18:

Healing is always possible.

All humans, including myself, are already whole and complete.

My spidey senses are on point.

In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplateGate 18

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 18 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with your inner critic? Do you use it to perpetuate harm to yourself? Or do you use it as a gateway into wholeness?

What about the part of you that criticizes and judges others? What would it be like to use every one of those moments as an opportunity for compassion, healing, and wholeness?

What inner or outer judgment can you transform today?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Title: Human Design Gate 19 – Gene Key 19 – The Sensitive Soul
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 19 isThe Gate of Wanting. But I call itThe Sensitive Soulbecause its primary action is to be sensitive to the needs of others while maintaining proper self-care.

## About Human Design Gate 19 – Gene Key 19

Archetype Name:The Sensitive Soul

In Action:be sensitive to the needs of others (without sacrificing yourself)

Keywords:sensitivity, being attuned to needs, and community empowerment

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Wanting

Human Design Definition:That all things are interrelated is apparent and manifested through the action of approach.

Core Theme:The pressure to be sensitive to basic needs.

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Solar Plexus center viahuman design gate 49.

Tropical Sign:Aquarius

Gene Keys Shadow:Co-Dependence

Gene Keys Gift:Sensitivity

Gene Keys Siddhi:Sacrifice

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate19

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 19 is the energy for being sensitive to the needs of others while maintaining proper self-care. Gate 19 believes individuals, communities, and the collective thrive when basic needs are met. It loves being around emotionally healthy people and thrives when those around it are thriving.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 19 is the energy for not understanding your own needs and putting your needs last. When gate 19 isn’t taking time for its own needs, it can easily become overwhelmed by the energetic input of others.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling closed off, dishonest or selfish but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 19 (Gene Key 19)

Gate 19 isundefinedin my chart. Nonetheless, for most of my life, I was called “too sensitive.” For many years, I even identified as an “empath” and as an “HSP.”

I’ve long shed those identities.

First and foremost, I now understand that I am a late-discovered neurodivergent, AuDHD.

And despite the common misconception about Autism, many autistic people are highly sensitive and struggle with “over empathy” rather than not enough. That is a whole other ball of wax.

But, even just looking at it from a Human Design perspective, I see those themes, as well.

I have an undefined solar plexus and that means that when I have shitty energetic boundaries, I can take on and amplify the emotional wave of thedefinedsolar plexus’ around me.

I used to be hyper-vigilant about the needs of others – especially their emotional needs. I often walked on eggshells because it felt SO terrible to be around people who were feeling uncomfortable emotions.

I would cry at the drop of a hat. And, as I talked about in myhuman design gate 49post, I was quick to cut people out of my life.

I didn’t know that there were other options. That isn’t to say that I tolerate bullshit now. I don’t.

But, understanding my undefined root and solar plexus has been critical in transforming my relationship with the pressures of emotional sensitivity.

(In theHuman Design Mapportal, you will find a guide on the nine centers to help you understand how you might be in the “not self” with your centers.)

My energetic boundaries are much stronger now and I can easily discern which emotions belong to me and which ones don’t. I am also getting pretty good at discerning “incorrect” root pressure.

One of the key tools for developing that kind of discernment is plenty ofPure Aura Time. Pure Aura Time is now one of my top priorities in life.

And between that, and my alchemical skills ( I teach these in themapportal, too), I’ve discovered that there is a massive difference betweenbeing sensitive to other people’s emotional needsandtaking responsibility for them.

In our deeply codependent culture, most of us don’t know the difference. But, once you see the distinction, it will be one of those things you can’t unsee.

When gate 19 is at its highest frequency, being sensitive to the emotional needs of others is actually about understanding other people’s emotional needs but not necessarilydoingsomething about them. It can hold space without taking it on as something to fix.

And, when we are really honest with ourselves about what belongs to us and what doesn’t, our capacity, our boundaries, and our values, it is easy to know when to hold space and when to try to meet their needs.

For me, when my capacity is abundant and it wouldn’t cause me harm to meet their needs, I 100% will. If not, I can just hold space, or in some cases, decline the invitation all together.

Either way, I don’t need to save anyone from themselves. I can be considerate of people’s emotions while holding my boundaries. I can trust that they have what it takes to handle whatever they think and feel.

And, probably most importantly, I can stand firmly in the knowledge that I cannot control how they take it. That is their karma, after all.

If they are one of mymapclients, I can teach them the emotional skills and show them how it’s done. (If you are one of mymapclients, check out the MAP Method for Deconditioning in your map dashboard.)

If it is someone in my personal life, I can tell them the truth and I can sometimes offer guidance about where to get support. And, in the most wild cases, like with random strangers in the grocery store, I can just walk away.

There is nothing I “have to” do for the sake of someone else’s emotional needs. I can be sensitive to their needs and let them have the responsibility.

I will not light myself on fire to keep others warm.

Nowadays, I am much less afraid of other people’s emotions and am much more discerning about who I am in relationship with.

I surround myself with people whowantto understand me, who recognize me, and where mutual respect is abundant.

My peoplewantto take responsibility for their emotions because they know the alchemical magick that comes from owning your authentic feelings; they want to be their own hero.

The people I surround myself with appreciate my candor, my boundaries, and my clarity. Because it means that when I show up for them, it is because it is from an overflow of love, rather than from obligation. It is the only kind of love that sticks.

Today, other people’s emotional needs don’t determine my next steps. Going within and discerning what is true for me does.

And what I know for sure is that I don’t have to choose between having solid boundaries and being sensitive.

It gets to be both, and that is wonderful news.

If you are ready to step into full responsibility for your needs (emotional or otherwise), grab yourmapand take the journey in the portal.

Every action is an attempt to meet a need.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate19

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 19 are available to you, (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship to being sensitive?

Are you attuned to the needs, especially the emotional needs, of others?

How are your boundaries around that?

Have you experienced the beauty of having your needs and emotions deeply seen by others?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate19.

Title: Human Design Gate 20 – Gene Key 20 – The Voice of Alchemy
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 20 isThe Gate of Now. But I call itThe Voice of Alchemybecause its primary action is to contemplate life, without attachment, and speak the truth in right timing.

## About Human Design Gate 20 – Gene Key 20

Archetype Name:The Voice of Alchemy

In Action:be present and speak truth in the now

Keywords:contemplation, alchemy, and the present moment

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Now

Human Design Definition:Recognition and awareness in the now which transforms understanding into right action.

Core Theme:Instantaneous clarity and action.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the Splenic center viahuman design gate 57, connects to the G center viahuman design gate 10, and to the sacral center viahuman design gate 34.

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 20

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 20 is the energy for being present and speaking the truth in the now. Gate 20 knows that everything we need to know exists in the present moment and trusts that the highest potential will be revealed in Divine Timing.

On the other end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 20 is the energy for making choices according to the mind instead of your inner wisdom and an inability to be still in the present moment. It can also easily give into the pressure and give unsolicited or incorrect advice.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are not speaking your truth but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 20 (Gene Key 20)

Gate 20 is defined in my conscious Jupiter. I talked briefly about how Gate 20 plays out in Jupiter in my contemplation ofHuman Design Gate 8.

In this contemplation, though, I wanted to reflect on my experience with the 57-20 channel (called the brainwave).

(I cover all of the channels inside theHuman Design Mapportal.)

Gate 57 is defined in the conscious sun ofincarnation crossand the 57-20 has been super interesting to me. It is actually one of the (many) reasons that Human Design clicked with me instantly.

I’ve often had the experience of what I call “pops of clarity.”

Pops of clarity are sort of like sitting at a train crossing before the train arrives. You can hear the train coming, but you have no control over when it will actually show up. It shows up when it does.

With the 57-20, I can intuitively sense information “coming through” and have to wait for clarity.

Then, in a flash, I get a “download” that feels like it needs to be expressed….right now!

This happens a lot with mymapcustomers. They will have a question, and when I first read it, I won’t know what to say. But, I will have a deep sense inside of me that something is “coming through.”

I’ve come to understand that, most often, the mechanics of the person’s chart are “speaking to me” and that I just need to keep listening. Sometimes, that means I ask more questions. Other times, it means I walk away in full trust that an answer is coming.

And, not quite like clockwork 😉, I’ll know exactly what to say and write a thousand words in a couple of minutes flat.

This is just one example of how it plays out. But let me tell you, for most of my life, it was frustrating AF.

I hated the feeling of “knowing” something was “on the way” and having no control over when it showed up.

But after many years ofdeconditioning, that is shifting, and I am deepening my surrender to Divine Timing.

I can see that my mind goes into a tailspin and starts trying to use logic or reason to put language to the inner knowing.

And it literally never works.

When I try to force my intuition out, it gets muddy and never “lands” in a very powerful way.

I have learned that the best thing I can do is….be present.

Be here now.

Every day, I trust that if something needs to be said, I’ll know it when the time is right.

I don’t need to be attached to knowing how, when, where, or why. Or knowing at all.

This shift in thinking allows me to be more present; I actually have space to breathe and just live my life.

Probably even more importantly, my intuition is becoming even stronger every single day. It is sharper and clearer. And when the words do come, they are more powerful than ever.

When I surrender, my words are a healing force in the world; they heal me and the people who encounter me.

It isn’t always easy, but clearly, it is part of my life’s work. I’m literally living for it.If you want to understand more about how your energy works and your life’s purpose,  be sure to get yourHuman Design Map.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 20

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 20:

I speak truth in the now.

I am self assured.
