In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate30

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 30 are available to you, whether it is defined in your chart or not…

What is your relationship to your emotions?

How connected are you to your desire?

What would you do differently if you knew that your soul incarnated to experience the full emotional spectrum of being human?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 30.

And, if you have gate 30 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I gosuper deep into each cross gate.

Title: Human Design Gate 31 – Gene Key 31 – The Natural Leader
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 31 isThe Gate of Leading. I call itThe Natural Leaderbecause its primary action is to be a highly influential force of nature and express the possibilities and potentials of a brighter future.

## About Human Design Gate 31 – Gene Key 31

Archetype Name:The Natural Leader

In Action:to reverently lead others into a fair and just vision

Keywords:leadership, collective vision, influence, equanimity

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Leading

Human Design Definition:The law of friction, whether active or passive, that engenders transference and thus influence.

Core Theme:Influential leadership.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the G center viahuman design gate 7.

Tropical Sign:Leo

Gene Keys Shadow:Arrogance

Gene Keys Gift:Leadership

Gene Keys Siddhi:Humility

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 31

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 31 is the energy for influential leadership. Gate 31 knows deep in its bones that empowered people empower others. Disempowered people disempower others. With this as its baseline, it is able to be a highly influential force of nature by expressing the possibilities and potentials for a brighter future for everyone.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 31 is the energy for being afraid to step into the role of leader or believing that you are unworthy of being a leader. It can easily use its influence and authority to manipulate others for its own personal gain. Or try to force its vision on others.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

The most important thing to raise the frequency of gate 31 is to lead with integrity by knowing your leadership niche. Your Human Design will offer clues in this, especially your conscious sun and yourGene Keys prosperity sequence(unconscious mars, conscious Jupiter, unconscious Jupiter).

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 31 (Gene Key 31)

The channel of the Alpha (31-7) is defined in my chart.

Gate 31 is defined in my unconscious Saturn.

And, in an interesting twist of fate, Human Design Gate 7 is defined in my conscious Saturn.

How fun?!?!

Eh. Not so much.

Saturn is often a challenge in our charts.

If Santa Claus were divided into two parts of our chart, he would be Jupiter and Saturn.

Jupiter is the benevolent, jolly, grandfather-like energy bringing all the gifts. Saturn is the one checking the list twice.

In other words, Saturn is where we have to check ourselves.

It is a place where we have abundant potential for mastery and transcendence. But only through conscious self-discipline.

And, if you are anything like me, even the mere concept of discipline feels triggering. (Rage?!?!)

I am a free spirit who wants to do what I want whenever I want to do it. Discipline tastes bitter and doesn’t go down smoothly.

But Saturn gives no fucks about how it tastes going down, and if we want the bounty of Jupiter, we must heed his call.

During my first Saturn return, I was just getting clean from drugs, one of my brothers died, and I fell head over heels in love with a narcissistic asshole.

It was a time of great trials, and when my heart began to crack open and see that I have so much more potential than abuse, addiction, and people-pleasing. I can see Leo’s threads running through it. (Both gates 31 and 7 are in the sign of Leo.)

At the time of this writing, my second Saturn return is a handful of years away. With each passing day, I’m checking myself, becoming clearer and clearer about what I need to master to receive my bounty. And it has everything to do with being an Alpha.

Truth be told, I love talking about my other defined channels:

The channel of the Wavelength (48-16) gives me the energy to empower the collective by diving deep into the things I am interested in and bringing them out into the world masterfully.

The channel of the Brain Wave (57-20) gives me the energy to empower myself and others by trusting my intuitive wisdom and giving voice to Truth.The channel of Awareness (61-24) gives me the energy to empower myself and others by asking the big questions in life, like why we are here and allowing the magick of silence to reveal the answers.

Love. Love. Love.

But it’s a whole other story when we get to the channel of the Alpha (7-31). This channel gives me the energy to empower the collective by being a leader rooted in a higher vision of equity, empowerment, and self-awareness.

And, while it has never been a secret to me that others see me as a leader, I’ve mostly not wanted anything to do with it.

Perhaps it has been my 5/2 profile + innocence motivation +gate 7on the conscious side, but I’d rather stay out of the spotlight.

But, in early 2022, something shifted, and I’ll never forget it. I checked myself in the best kind of ways.

I was taking a class for Human Design Projectors, and the energy around leadership kept coming up. In the class, I felt incredibly vulnerable and seen in a way I had never before.

I cannot even describe what it was like to have 13 Projectors looking deeply into my soul simultaneously.

In that space, I was called on to be a leader on numerous occasions. I was asked to speak about this or that topic, and with each invitation, I had zero doubt that I had some magic to bring to the conversation.

In hindsight, this was how I felt when I started writing the very firstmapI ever made. I felt my natural leadership come alive.

Yes, it was a remarkably vulnerable feeling. I felt exposed and raw.

But there was also a quality of integrity and synchronicity—beautiful timing and just oh so right.

The highest potential vibration of the 31-7 was so deeply activated within me that I could no longer push it away. I had to see it. It wasn’t just theoretical anymore.

It was trustworthy.

I AM an Alpha.

The key for me was therecognitionof leading from a space of deep integrity, of that inner knowing that I was the one to guide the ship.

In the past, I’ve often been nominated to lead things that didn’t land right with me.

My spleen would scream no, and, again, maybe my 5/2 was playing a big part here, but I believed that my job was to do whatever people expected of me. And if that meant leading in ways that didn’t feel right for me but helped others, I would just do it anyway.

And true to what Human Design (and theGene Keys) teaches us about gate 31, stepping into the role of the leader has to be a two-way street.

(Just like theprojector recognition and invitation!)

When I am trying to lead shit that doesn’t need or want my leadership, it doesn’t end well. And vice versa, when others want me to lead, and my body says no, it also doesn’t end well.

Since the sacred container of that class, I have been able to step into the role of a win-win leader on many occasions.

I often feel this way in interactions inside theHuman DesignMap portal,in situations where my expertise and insight perfectly match the path ahead.

I even had a dream about someone I care about. From the dream, I knew that I needed to take the lead on a real-life situation we were going through.

It was crystalline clear.  So, I did.

The results were stunning. I lead the situation into more profound harmony and alignment for everyone.

And, because it’s Saturn, I know I’ll be checking myself for years to come. I’ll revisit the 31 and the 7 until I take off the tight shoe called life.

But I have developed an awareness of what this energy looks and feels like on “both sides” of the spectrum.

I know what it’s like to try to lead when I’m not recognized and invited.

I know what it’s like to lead even when I don’t want to.

And, through the diligence of Saturn, I also know what it’s like to lead when it’s win-win.

So, now, I practice. And, perhaps one day, will truly master.

If you are ready to surrender to the bounty in your chart, you will love theHuman Design Map & Portal.It’s a two-part experience in which you’ll learn the most important parts of your Human Design and be expertly guided on an awakening journey of overcoming people-pleasing, making radically authentic decisions, and, above all, trusting yourself.Get yours here.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 31

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 31:

I am a force of nature.

I empower myself and others.

My leadership is valuable.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 31

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of the 31 are always available to you, (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with leadership? Do you like to lead? Why or why not?

What experiences have you had with disempowered leaders? What about empowered ones?

What qualities of leadership do you have and how do you foster them?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 31.And, if you have gate 31 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 32 – Gene Key 32 – The Success Oracle
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 32 isThe Gate of Continuity. But I call itThe Success Oraclebecause its primary action is to know what needs to be done to ensure the success of yourself and your community.

## About Human Design Gate 32 – Gene Key 32

Archetype Name:The Success Oracle

In Action:sense and lead successful community change

Keywords:change, success and failure, and foresight

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Continuity

Human Design Definition:The only thing which endures is change.

Core Theme:Fear of failure.

Bodygraph Center:Spleen center and connects to the Root center viahuman design gate 54.

Tropical Sign:Libra

Gene Keys Shadow:Failure

Gene Keys Gift:Preservation

Gene Keys Siddhi:Veneration

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 32

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 32 is the energy for guiding one’s community into its highest potential. Gate 32 sees the big picture, can sense what needs to change, and is in a healthy relationship with both success and failure. With this perspective, it is able to lead its family, friends, and community into a state of well-being without getting thrown off by the “failures” along the way.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 32 is the energy for using fear as fuel for unhealthy relationships and community dynamics such as codependency, hierarchy, and pressuring others to conform. It can isolate itself from its family, friends, or community due to a belief that you must go through life alone. Or become immersed in groupthink, cults, or fundamentalist systems that reject the outer or natural world.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling OCD, cultish or like a know it all but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 32 (Gene Key 32)

Like most of the tribalhuman design circuitry, Gate 32 is undefined in my chart. In fact, relative to my individual and collective circuitry, I have very little tribal definition in my chart.

After many years of deconditioning, through Human Design and otherwise, I’ve come to understand that I’ve never really valued being part of a group. My attachment to being liked was more about who I thought I should be, rather than what actually feels true for me.

I would even go so far as to say that groups are hard for me. I thrive 1:1 but become easily overwhelmed when in a group environment.

Other than mymapportal community, where I am the “leader”, I mostly find myself “on the edge” groups and rarely feel “part” of them.

That is especially true in groups where the “leaders” are put on pedestals and worshiped or where you “have to” believe and value the same things to be accepted. That kind of thinking has never really made sense to me. My autonomy has always been more important than group think.

For a long time, I made that mean that something was wrong with me, that I was unlikable, or that I was a “bad” person.

And I can see the threads of Gate 32 running all through it.

When we were cavepeople, we lived in small, close knit communities, often of only around 100 people.

Everyone played a role in the survival of its tribe. If you couldn’t play your given role, you were banished and left to die alone.

In other words, success was dependent on the group structure and failure meant imminent death.

This has created a deep lineage of fear around belonging and a world where groupthink is revered.

But, the world is changing; we are moving into a new aeon.

We are headed into a time where true success is dependent on individual empowerment rather than blind adherence. And it is why I am so honored to do the work I do with theHuman Design Map.

We, you and me, are the leading edge of this change. And I am here for it.

Now, of course, doesn’t mean that groups, families, or communities are dying all together. In fact, I think we are seeing them begin to take shape in whole new ways.

The old structures that have been held up by dogma, echo chambers, and authoritarian leadership are crumbling.

They are being rebuilt with the well-being of individuals in mind. We are moving into the awareness that a group of empowered individuals is actually stronger than ones made of disempowered people.

When I look at my experience with the group structures in my life, I can see that my definition of success was always rooted in individual empowerment.

And, on some level, I’ve always trusted that empowered individuals create empowered groups, and empowered groups create an empowered collective.

I don’t have the energy to surrender to groupthink, fundamentalism, or “leader” worship. And, if that means staying on the edges, so be it. I’d rather be inside themapportal blazing a new trail of empowered individuals, anyway. That is what success means to me.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 32

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 32:

I know what it takes to succeed.

I love how life is always changing.

Success is when everyone in the community is thriving.

In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 32

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 32 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with success? What about failure? How are they working for you?

Do you surrender your own empowerment for others? Why or why not?

What does success look like inside the groups and communities that you are a part of?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Title: Human Design Gate 33 – Gene Key 33 – The Contemplative Witness
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 33 isThe Gate of Privacy. But I call itThe Contemplative Witnessbecause its primary action is to know that everything that has ever happened holds the seed of collective healing and transformation.

## About Human Design Gate 33 – Gene Key 33

Archetype Name:The Contemplative Witness

In Action:to contemplate and share lessons from the past

Keywords:contemplation, privacy, memories, and being wise

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Privacy

Human Design Definition:Active withdrawal and the transformation of a weak position into a strength.

Core Theme:Sharing lessons of the past.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the G center viahuman design gate 13.

Tropical Sign:Leo

Gene Keys Shadow:Forgetting

Gene Keys Gift:Mindfulness

Gene Keys Siddhi:Revelation

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 33

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 33 is the energy for making ample space for reflection. Gate 33 believes that there is beauty in all things, including painful memories from the past. If you are only willing to see it, and will allow it, experiences and memories of the past can be alchemized into wisdom.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 33 is the energy for isolation or hiding from the world, especially when the wisdom of harmful collective events has not revealed itself yet. It can act out of fear or anger in an attempt to force wisdom onto others or throw the past into the faces of others.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

The most important thing to raise the frequency of gate 33 is to learn how to hold space for the discomfort that comes from waiting for the wisdom of the past to reveal itself.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 33 (Gene Key 33)

Gate 33 is in the throat center of the Human Design chart. When we are looking at the throat center, we are always looking at how the energy that swirls around inside of us (thoughts, memories, visions, feelings, emotions, intuition, instincts) manifest in the outer world; it’s the impact our words and actions have on the people, places, and things around us.

And while “impact” and the throat center are often associated with Manifestor types in Human Design, the throat center actually reveals a different story.

Most of the gates in the throat are, in fact,projected energy.Human Design Gate 20is a bit of an oddball because while inprojector typesit is projected, it is also one part of the only manifesting generating channel, the 34-20.

To me, as a Projector type with a heavily defined throat, that tells us something important about the throat andhowit impacts the world.

All types of energy – projected, manifested, and generated (via mani gen) – reveal themselves to the world through the throat.  And, at its core, all throat energy is about transformation, which is distinct from evolution.

Evolution happens in the root center of the Human Design chart. It’s about how our genes – the blueprint of our bodies – change over long periods of time. It is the adaptations that ensure our survival in the sometimes very harsh climates of Earth.

Transformation, on the other hand, is more rapid and is about the spiritual structures that underpin how we show up in the world.

To take this even a bit further, if we look at the throat center in the context of its correspondences to the Kabbalah Tree of Life, we see that it corresponds to the invisible sphere on the tree known as Daath.

In High Magick circles, when our consciousness rises to the level of Daath, it is called crossing the abyss.

Crossing the abyss isthe momentwe become aware that we are one with the Divine. Not just theoretically aware, either. It is an awareness that you can no longer forget. And itrequiresyou to walk very differently in the world when you know thateverything is you.

Spiritually speaking, it is the “final frontier” on the way to embodying unity consciousness (aka enlightenment) the way masters like Jesus, Buddha, Krishna, etc did.

Enlightenment occurs in Kether, which corresponds to the head center in Human Design. The space between Daath and Kether removes the miniscule specks of dust off the mirror of your consciousness and makes it pristinely clean.

And, that brings me back to gate 33 and its pivotal role in our spiritual transformation.

Gate 33 is undefined in my chart, which means it is a place of amplifying patterns, learning, and letting go of attachment. It is (hopefully!) a place wherewise usewill become the norm.

Whether that happens for me in this lifetime or not, what I can say for sure is that it is crystal clear to me that the world desperately needs the brilliance of Gate 33.

We, as a collective, are starting to become aware of how trauma from the past holds us back in the present. Unhealed trauma not only puts a halt on our evolution as a species, but also our transformation as souls.

It is obvious to me that if we don’t have the capacity to process the wild and twisted shit that happens in this world, we stay stuck. And here is the critical part – we cannot do that alone. We need others to hold space for us in the processing.

And most of the people alive right now never had that. The high frequencies of gate 33 have been sorely missing.

We’ve been so stuck in survival most that our culture pushes “getting over it”, moving on, and candy-coated forgiveness. And that just makes things worse.

We need safe space to breathe, reflect, and process. We must rebuild trust with our body, nervous system, and authentic emotions.

We need to feel seen, heard, and understood in our vulnerability. We need support and people who are willing to hold healing space, rather than to try to jump in and “fix” things.

And that is what gate 33 does.

I am grateful for the people in my life that can hold that kind of space for me. I absolutely would not be where I am today without them. And, it is my intention to hold that kind of space inside theHuman Design Map portal, too.

At its core, Human Design is a path of transformation. And we have to confront some big truths when we make the holy decision to trust ourselves and our inner wisdom as the north star of our lives.And whether our journey involves Human Design or not, it is not about just moving on from the past. It’s about moving through. It is about being present with yourself, and being witnessed, as you peel the layers and let go of the fear, the anger, and the shame.

It takes courage. And compassion. And an immense capacity to feel all of the things.

My deepest prayer is that, as a society, we aren’t just evolving, but also transforming. I hope that we will come to undoubtedly understand that traumatized people cannot expand into the most aligned version of themselves. And that what the world needs most is more people who are walking the path of surrendered alignment.

I can see it happening. In some circles, it’s even cool to talk about trauma and healing wounds from the past.

In the meantime, I’ll be over here healing my shit, leaning on the people who know how to hold space, and doing the same for others (here).You can’t rush your healingDarkness has its teachingLove is never leavingYou can’t rush your healingTrevor Hall, You Can’t Rush Your Healing, Kala

Title: Human Design Gate 34 – Gene Key 34 – The Sovereign

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 34

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 34 is the energy for sovereignty, empowerment, and steady vision. The 34 empowers you to cultivate inner strength, faith, and flow to make your visions a reality.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 34 is the energy for pushing or forcing your dreams into reality. A lack of clear vision can make the 34 feel drained of time, energy, and resources.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling shy, busy or visionless but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 34 (Gene Key 34)

Gate 34, located in thesacral center, isundefinedin my chart; that means it’s an archetype that reveals a lot of wisdom in my life. And due to the specificmechanicsof my design, it is a place where I get a lot of opportunities to become wiser. 😂

In my chart provided above, you’ll notice the 57-20 channel of the Brainwave is defined and the way that interacts with gate 34 has a few layers.

I won’t get into all of them here. For now, the place I want to point out is thathuman design Gate 57is the gate defined in the conscious sun of myincarnation cross.

Being 70% of your energy, the conscious sun is the most important gate in your chart; it’s the key archetype you are here to become adept in. Your conscious sunpolishes the mirrorof your soul like nothing else.

So, with gate 57 in my conscious sun, an important part of my incarnation is to become adept in trusting my intuition and creating a life that fosters intuitive clarity. And, as a projector type, soak in the recognition I receive when others benefit from my clarity.

But despite what you may have been taught by new-age or religious rhetoric, becoming adept is never about bypassing the “low” or “negative” side of thespectrum.

Your conscious sun is not supposed to be all rainbows and butterflies. Because everything going perfectly isn’t how you become adept at something.

Prowess with any energy, not just thehuman design gates, is about integration of all its parts (not just the “good” parts) and integrations naturally leads to the ability to consciously direct energy in an aligned way.

This is one of the many reasons why I love Human Design and what I do inside theHuman Design Mapportal. The Human Design system gives you amapthat points you in the direction of your natural prowess.

When you are looking at your design in an objective and empowered way, you will clearly see where you are bypassing instead of integrating your most potent sources of energy.

In themapportal, I show you “how” to integrate and reclaim all of that energy in a skillful and conscious way. (Hint: it happens through radical self acceptance, self-worth, and valuing yourself!)

Anyway, back to my experience with the electromagnetics of gate 34 and the 57 in my conscious sun.

What I’ve learned through experience is that becoming wise with gate 34’s energy is an important part of being adept at trusting my intuition and making space for intuitive clarity.

Whether I am encountering someone with gate 34 defined, or it’s active in the transits, learning how to be powerful and sovereign seems to be a key for fostering intuitive clarity.

Like I talk about in the 36 channels course (inside theHuman Design Mapportal), each end of a channel offers balance to the other side.

Channels are kind of like peanut butter and jelly. Peanut butter and jelly are both delicious on their own. But bring them together and the balance of salty, sweet, earthy, and light is why kids all over the US have them in their lunch boxes.

The 34 and 57 balance and harmonize one another.

If I am giving my sovereignty away, there is no way I will make the space in my life that is necessary to be a clear channel for Divine Clarity.

If I don’t have a deep understanding of my vision, I won’t be able to hear what it’s telling me.

And if I believe I am powerless in places where I am actually full of power (aka capacity to do something), I will never trust myself and the voice of my intuition.

What beautiful wisdom, indeed.

I am grateful to say that I’ve known some amazing people with the 34definedin their charts. And with every encounter, I am learning more and more about what it means to be powerful in my intuitive clarity.

How does it get any better than that?

Title: Human Design Gate 35 – Gene Key 35 – The Hungry Heart
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 35 isThe Gate of Changebut I call itThe Hungry Heartbecause of its insatiability. Its primary action is to live life as a great adventure of the emotional heart.

## About Human Design Gate 35 – Gene Key 35

Archetype Name:The Hungry Heart

In Action:seek adventure and emotional experiences

Keywords:adventure, emotional experiences, and learning

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Gene Keys Shadow:Hunger

Gene Keys Gift:Adventure

Gene Keys Siddhi:Boundlessness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 35

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 35 is the energy for adventure, emotional experiences, and learning. Gate 35 knows that curiosity is magic and life is meant to be an adventure. It lives life with great courage and eagerly waits for life’s lessons to reveal themselves through adventure.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 35 is the energy for becoming bored and impatient with life. The unsatisfied hunger for adventure can lead to overdoing things like filling sex, food, drugs, alcohol, scroll holes, information seeking, etc. With those emotional buffers in place, Gate 35 struggles to learn from life.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are overindulging in food, drink, drugs, sex, etc. but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 35 (Gene Key 35)

Gate 35 is undefined in my chart, but I had a private client for many years who has the full 35-36 channel of transitoriness. (Side note: because I always get asked — I no longer see clients privately. As of now, I only offer theHuman Design Map & Portal.)

She originally came to my work when I was doing body image-focused coaching, and what an adventure it was.

The most important work we ever did together was giving her the tools and creating the space for her to become present with her emotions and take responsibility for them. As time passed, she developed a level of emotional maturity that I will forever be in awe of.

Through the same tools I teach inHuman Design Map & Portaltoday, she learned how to:

🔥 process her emotions🔥 access the wisdom inside of them🔥 heal the “blocks” to honoring that wisdom.

With that solid emotional foundation, I had the honor and pleasure of witnessing her Gate 35 come to life.

The longer we worked together, the deeper and richer our conversations became. We navigated intense emotional situations with immense Grace and worked through things she didn’t believe were possible.

The thing that I loved most was her insatiable hunger for more.

She was always ready to go on an adventure of the mind, emotions, and soul. Her curiosity was delightfully endless. She genuinely wanted the adventure of the experience and had little attachment to where we ended up.

When I originally wrote this gate 35 contemplation, the full circle of our time together hit me like a ton of bricks.

Ironically, one of the first programs I guided her through wasHungry For More.

At the time, I knew nothing about Human Design. I didn’t know that my intuitive understanding of energy had numbers, keynotes, and archetypal names.

But I did understand Alchemy. And that our so-called “bad” habits are often the result of a deeper hunger. A hunger that cannot be filled by food, drugs, sex, or scroll holes.

I knew that the more willing we are to own and honor those true hungers, the more satisfied, successful, peaceful, and delighted we feel.

And I knew that our emotions are messengers that show up along the way. (This is true no matter your solar plexus definition — emotion (energy in motion) happens all over the chart.)

When we lean into our emotions and trust the wisdom inside of them, we unlock the adventures we long for. We have the fuel necessary to go out there and live life to the fullest—whatever that means for us. We begin to understand that we are spiritual beings having a human experience and that it is meant to be a game, not a torture chamber.

As I’ve often discussed with my ​Human Design Map​ people, emotions are a source of energy (in motion)—one of the things that makes life do what it does. The adventure unfolds when we allow that to happen.

What a beautiful lesson for me to learn and witness. She taught me so much, and I am so much wiser because of it.

I’m still in touch with her today. I am grateful to have watched her step into such a beautiful expression of the 35-36. She will go down in history as one of my life’s most significant client relationships.

Here’s to the adventure of life.

Title: Human Design Gate 36 – Gene Key 36 – The Compassionate Sage
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 36 isThe Gate of Crisis. But I call itThe Compassionate Sagebecause its primary action is to be compassionate with yourself and others.

## About Human Design Gate 36 – Gene Key 36

Archetype Name:The Compassionate Sage

In Action:cultivate compassion for yourself and others

Keywords:compassion, being HUMAN, gentleness, and emotional wisdom

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Crisis

Human Design Definition:The rule of cycles in which decline is a natural but not enduring stage.

Core Theme:Fear of inadequacy.

Bodygraph Center:Emotional Solar Plexus center and connects to the Throat center viahuman design gate 35.

Tropical Sign:Pisces

Gene Keys Shadow:Turbulence

Gene Keys Gift:Humanity

Gene Keys Siddhi:Compassion

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 36

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 36 is the energy for being compassionate with yourself and others. For gate 36, compassion is the key to overcoming suffering; there is a willingness to see the humanity in yourself and others. From this empowered place, Gate 36 can harness empathy during emotional crises and sooth unnecessary suffering.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 36 is the energy for lacking compassion for yourself or others. It can lead to beating yourself up, holding yourself to impossible (emotional or sexual) standards, and feelings of inadequacy. There can be an inability to relax and a tendency to create emotional drama.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling heartless, cold or cruel but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 36 (Gene Key 36)

Gate 36 is undefined in my chart. As such, learning to be compassionate, with myself and others, has been a key source of life lessons.

About 15 years ago, I’d been clean (from drugs) for a few years. But I was starting to see that I had simply traded drugs for food.

I was binging almost every single day and hated myself to the core. I deeply believed that I was inherently flawed and broken beyond repair.

Thankfully, through several synchronicities, I found myself in a group treatment program (outpatient) for eating disorders.

We were often given homework; the first assignment was to start noticing how we spoke to ourselves.

At that point, I hadn’t done any training in coaching or energy healing. I didn’t know how the brain worked, I assumed that thoughts and feelings were the same things, and I was in deep denial of my intuition.

I thought my emotions were “the truth” of who I really was.

To say that I was in for a rude awakening would be the understatement of the century.

When I started actually paying attention to what I was thinking about myself, I noticed that I’d regularly call myself a fat pig, lazy, and good-for-nothing.

That was illuminating. I had no idea how mean I’d been to myself for so long.

But the real awakening was realizing I had a choice in how I thought about myself—my thoughts are my free will.

And while I understand that traditional Human Design doesn’t “believe in” free will, there is absolutely no denying that we can choose and change how we think about anything. That is just a scientific fact.

(Showing you what to actually do to change the way you think of yourself is at the heart of what I do inside theHuman Design Map portal.)

For me, realizing that my thoughts were a choice was a pivotal moment in my life. And the idea that I could infuse my thoughts with compassion for myself was nothing short of a miracle.

But, like most people who are steeped in the self-hatred tea, I didn’t really know what it meant to “be” compassionate.

And I honestly spent years trying to figure it out.

I can’t say that I have it 100% figured out. Because, well, the game of life is no fun without contrast.

But it is one of my key practices.

I’ve learned that compassion, whether for ourselves or others, is about having anembodiedunderstanding that we are human beings.

We are all a mix of shadow and light, high frequencies and low frequencies, conscious and unconscious.

And we can choose that perspective for anyone at any time and in any situation – yourself and your darkest secrets included.

To be clear – choosing compassion isn’t about spiritual bypassing.

It is about embracing all your parts, being present with your humanity, and honoring who you must become to find the compassion that already dwells within you.

This involves a lot of shadow work (something I teach to myHuman Design Mapclients) and pulling out the roots of your compassionless stories.

And the ripple effects of that practice really are a miracle.

It automatically flows into the other side as we practice compassion for ourselves or others.

When I can be compassionate for your humanity, I surrender to mine. When I can be compassionate for my humanity, I surrender to yours.

It can only work that way.

And if you’ve read this far, I’m sure that you can agree that the world needs a little more of that.

I offer myself and other compassion.

I am good in a crisis.

I am patient with my emotions.

Title: Human Design Gate 37 – Gene Key 37 – The Boundaries Master
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 37 isThe Gate of Friendship. But I call itThe Boundaries Masterbecause its primary action is healthy communication and maintaining strong boundaries.

## About Human Design Gate 37 – Gene Key 37

Archetype Name:The Boundaries Master

In Action:healthy communication and maintaining strong boundaries

Keywords:holding people together, family, equality, and emotional resources

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Friendship

Human Design Definition:The manifestation macro- and micro-cosmically of the organic nature of communities.

Core Theme:Fear of tradition.

Bodygraph Center:Emotional Solar Plexus center and connects to the Will center viahuman design gate 40.

Tropical Sign:Pisces

Gene Keys Shadow:Weakness

Gene Keys Gift:Equality

Gene Keys Siddhi:Tenderness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 37

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 37 is the energy for having strong family bonds through strong communication and healthy boundaries. Gate 37 believes that all people are worthy of respect and treats everyone as a valuable part of the family, community, or friend circle.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 37 is the energy for sacrificing yourself to make sure that the family stays together or hiding behind it’s emotions . When gate 37 doesn’t take responsibility for its emotions, it often projects its emotions onto others by being cruel or mean on purpose.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling unfair, mean or cruel but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 37 (Gene Key 37)

Gate 37 is undefined in my chart, but I have a wild number of significant relationships with people with the 37-40 channel defined.

Because I have been exposed to it, often daily, I have come to understand thefull spectrumof its expression and am heading its wisdom.

Gate 37 is part ofthe tribal circuit, which focuses on what is “right” for the family, community, or group. I only have hanging gates in the tribal circuit; all of my channels are a mix ofindividualandcollective circuitry(two in each).

(I do a deep dive into channels and circuits inside the portal of theHuman Design Map.)

I’ve never felt like it was my job to ensure a family, community, or group stays together. In fact, the majority of my adult life has been in estrangement from most of my family.

But, I have developed relationships with people who are my “chosen family.” And what I have learned over time is that the full spectrum of gate 37 is truly magnificent energy.

Yes, gate 37 can be hella controlling and codependent AF on one side of the spectrum.

But, it also has the capacity for deep empathy, mutual respect, and understanding that empowered individuals actually are what make an empowered family or group.

The higher purpose of gate 37 is to embody healthy boundaries, communicate clearly, and have an attitude of cooperation instead of codependence. I’ve seen that it can find a win-win in even the most challenging family dynamics. And will set firmer boundaries when necessary.

In recent years, numerous people have told me they admire my boundaries and how I communicate during challenges. They have even said that I’m graceful with my boundaries and willingness to communicate; hearing that shocks me every time.

Because, uh, it rarely feels graceful on the inside.

I vividly remember one of the first firm boundaries I ever set.

I literally yelled at a family member to get the fuck out of my house.

I swam in shame for days after that.

I eventually apologized for yelling but made it clear that the boundary stands. Their behavior was not, and will never be, welcome in my home.

I learned so much from that experience.

First of all, the boundary nor the shame killed me.

That sounds like a joke, but when we hold such deep conditioning, the nervous system interprets stepping outside the norm as a literal threat to survival. Understanding that is an essential part ofdeconditioning.

In that experience, I also learned to love the part of me that can be an asshole sometimes. It’s the part of me that stands for what I believe in, is clear about my values, and has no problem saying what is true for me. (Gate 49!)

And just like I teach myHuman Design Mapclients, the key is learning to love and value those taboo parts of ourselves. We can channel those parts consciously instead of letting them leak out sideways and causing all manner of chaos in our lives.

As I’ve become more in touch with my boundaries and have stopped being so afraid of being seen as an asshole or bitch for having them, I have become a bit more graceful with them.

I can be clear and do so in a way that honors what is true without being unnecessarily unkind. And, when the situation calls for it, I can also go into straight-up bitch mode without shame.

It still feels uncomfortable sometimes. And, from time to time, I need to be reminded that boundaries are a beautiful thing.

But I have it deep in my bones that healthy boundaries and communication are possible in relationships. I’ve had too many positive experiences with my boundaries to believe otherwise.

These days, because I have shored up so many of the blatantly apparent boundaries, the work is more subtle. There is more nuance and a requirement to go deeper under the surface than my initial anger or defensiveness.

But it is worth doing, and I’m grateful to bear witness to the people who’ve embodied the highest frequency of gate 37. Even if it means becoming BFFs with my inner bitch.

If you want to become BFFs with your inner bitch so that you can set healthy boundaries, too, I’ll show you how inside theHuman Design Map + Portal.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 37

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 37:

I value family, community, and togetherness.

I am a relational magician.

I maintain clear and strong boundaries.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate37

When you stand in the truth that you can embody the gifts of gate 37 whether it is defined in your chart or not…

Do you have a tendency to sacrifice yourself for the needs of your family?

In what ways can you foster deeper communication and better boundaries with your family?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate37.

And, if you have gate 37 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 38 is the energy for fighting for the sake of fighting and can have a tendency to believe that life is meant to be an unhealthy struggle.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling stressed, reactive or like a coward but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 38 (Gene Key 38)

Gate 38 isundefinedin my chart but my husband has it defined in his conscious earth, which means it’s the energy that grounds him. And sinceHuman Design Gate 28is defined in my chart (4 times!), we create the whole channel of struggle together.

And I can confidently say that my husband has both practically and energetically taught me so much about suffering and struggling. Not because he is so much better or worse at it than I am, but because it has been such a potent mirror for how I show up in the face of struggle.

(That’s the way all “attraction” channels work in Human Design, the other person because a mirror for how we handle the undefined side in our own design. And through that, we become wiser in that specific energy.)

In my relationship with him, I’ve very clearly seen the conditioning that leads me to believe that suffering and struggle are noble.

In our current culture, we worship at the altar of suffering and struggle.

We often coalesce around the fires of complaining, one-upping our problems, and making sure everyone knows what a victim we are to the shit sandwiches of life.

We use complaining as a shitty substitute for connection and true intimacy. Sometimes, venting our woe-is-me stories is the backbone of our closest relationships.

Suffering and struggle have become a badge of honor.

My suffering badge of honor took the form of believing that I was meant to be a dumping ground for bullshit.

As a5/2 profile, people often saw me as someone who could save them, and I believed them. And I thought that, somehow, this made me a good and worthy human.

But, in walks my husband, and everything changes.

With definedintegration channelsin his design, he operates differently than anyone I’ve ever known.

(I teach a deep dive on all 36 channels inside theHuman Design Mapportal.Get yours here.)

Our relationship has challenges, of course, but he has never been one to assume that I’ll clean up any metaphorical messes he has made with his life. In fact, the opposite has been true.

And that provided a potent mirror for my healing.

His way of being, combined with understanding myhuman design profile, showed me how deeply I was creating unnecessary suffering by trying to swoop in to save a day that didn’t need saving.

As I peeled back those layers, I started to see the beauty of gate 38. It is truly magical and has taught me so much.

Some say that we “must” struggle – that life is a struggle. Others say that suffering is optional or simply a state of mind.

And while there is at least a little truth in every cliche, it isn’t so black and white. There is nuance and many shades of gray.

Gate 38 invites us to look under the surface of our struggles, suffering, and victim mindset.

(I’m not talking about actual victims of crimes, etc. I’m talking about the mindset that you are a victim of life itself.)

Suffering doesn’t mean we are doing life right or wrong. It isn’t that we should or shouldn’t struggle. And being honest and vulnerable about where we actually are in our lives is a beautiful thing.

It isn’t about judging ourselves (or others) at all.

(Removing judgment and replacing it with curiosity is a huge part of deconditioning and is the foundation of what I teach you in theHuman Design MapPortal.)

Instead, when we are deep in the throes of struggle, with no end in sight, it’s a sign that we are putting unnecessary pressure on ourselves to be a certain way.

Usually, that pressure comes in the form of automatically making our situation mean something terrible about ourselves or life (gate 28) and fighting for something that isn’t real or doesn’t actually matter.

And in that state of stress, we forget the magick of who we really are.

But when we go within and become present with any sense of struggle, suffering, and victimhood, our bodies will show us what is worth fighting for and what isn’t.

And, in my book, knowing your Divinity is worth fighting for.

The right amount of pressure isn’t a built-in recipe for struggle.

When it’s the right amount for you, it won’t weigh you down; it will move you deeper into recognizing your Divine Nature. It can help you find yourself in the Divine game of hide-and-seek.

And finding that just right amount of pressure is all part of the fun.

I’ll teach you the “how” inside theHuman Design Mapportal.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 38

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 38:

I have a warrior’s spirit.

I love a good challenge.

I fight for the things that are worth fighting for.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 38

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 38 are available to you, whether you have it in your chart or not…

What is your relationship with persevering, meaning, struggle, and discernment in your life?

What have your experiences of “fighting” shown you about what matters to you?

What are your life complaints showing you about what is worth fighting for and what isn’t?

What is your “just right” amount of struggle?

Are you willing to let go of “too much” struggle and suffering? Why or why not?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 38.

And, if you have gate 38 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 39 – Gene Key 39 – The Sacred Provocateur￼
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 39 isThe Gate of Provocation. But I call itThe Sacred Provocateurbecause its primary action is to provoke heightened states of emotional and spiritual awareness.

## About Human Design Gate 39 – Gene Key 39

Archetype Name:The Sacred Provocateur

In Action:to provoke others to step into self-responsibility

Keywords:being provocative, clarity, and being a force of transformation

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Provocation

Human Design Definition:The value of obstruction in provoking analysis, assessment, and reevaluation.

Core Theme:Pressure to find passion and spirit in life and to emote. In this context, pressure is not necessarily a problem. It’s really about acting from the amount of pressure that is correct for you.

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Solar Plexus center viahuman design gate 55.

Tropical Sign:Cancer

Gene Keys Shadow:Provocation

Gene Keys Gift:Dynamism

Gene Keys Siddhi:Liberation

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 39

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On one end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 39 is the energy for using pressure to find passion and spirit in life. When gate 39 takes full responsibility for its emotions and allows others to do the same, it transforms emotional energy into clarity. Its most sacred gift is provoking heightened states of emotional and spiritual awareness.

On the other end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 39 is the energy for taking responsibility for other people’s emotions and being a people pleaser. It can intentionally push other people’s buttons in revenge or as an attempt to hurt people.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling heartless, evil or offensive but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 39 (Gene Key 39)

With the full57/20, I often sit with things for a while before fully expressing them. And that is exactly what happened when I was contemplating this gate.

Gate 39 is undefined in my chart, but my husband has it in his conscious sun.

So, when I first started writing this post, I thought the words would just flow out of me.

But by the mystery of Grace, that isn’t what happened. I was provoked into something deeper and more clarifying.

I had an intuitive knowing that something was “coming through” the 57/20 and that I just needed to be present until the words popped in.

Then, shortly after the witching hour on the day of the original writing, I was struck by the etymology of the word:

Provocation.

Prois a word element that meansforward, forth, toward the front.

Vocationhas a couple of different meanings but the roots of it arecall or calling.

In the Gene Keys, there is a placement in thePearl Sequencecalled vocation which is also the core wound in theVenus Sequence.

(If you are in business, you’ll learn how this placement relates to your audience and marketing inside theHuman Design Mapportal.)

The Gene Keys “vocation” and “core wound” correspond to the unconscious Mars placement in the Human Design chart. When we heal the core relational wound, it awakens our life calling and becomes our vocation.

My unconscious Mars placement is gate 59 line 5. Human Design Gate 59 is the gate of “dispersion” and is all about breaking down the walls to intimacy and vulnerability.

Mars is where we “must” express energy outward like an arrow. It can be aggressive and passionate. And if we don’t express the energy effectively, those arrows turn in and cause harm in our inner world.

And while none of that might seem related to the 39, all of these connections went off like a clarity bomb in my brain.

In that clarity, I could see so clearly the role that my husband has played in bringing forth my vocation.

I’d been married to him for just over 14 years when I wrote this post, and I already knew that he is provoking. There has always been something about him that has felt like it calls me out – even when he isn’t saying a word.

I think part of it is my 5/2 profile, for sure, but with him, I have to own my shit in a way that is more subtle, under the surface, and mostly unspoken.

It has challenged me to open up, to be vulnerable, and break down walls that I didn’t even know existed before I met him.

And, as discussed inthe Gene Keys Pearl Sequence, it has absolutely unlocked so much for me in the realm of prosperity and the work I do in the world.

Before now, I had never thought of gate 39 in quite this way. It’s a strong connection to vocation and what we express in the world.

It seems pretty obvious now. Gate 39 pokes the bears. And it seems only natural that the best ones to poke are the sorest spots.

And while my husband isn’t a Projector (he is a mani gen), gate 39 is a projected energy. Which means that it cuts deep. All projected energy does.

As a Projector myself, I know how important it is to wait for recognition and invitation. It is completely exhausting to try to guide someone that isn’t open to it. And I’ve learned not to waste my energy on someone who doesn’t want to be provoked. Because if they aren’t ready to wake up the bears, nothing will help them see it.

And my M.O. is usually quite blunt and direct. I don’t tend to sugar coat and I call ‘em like I see ‘em. The people that need that, love it. It is what they most crave. (Sound like you?Grab your map and meet me in the portal.)

But, what my husband and this contemplation has shown me is that projected energy isn’t always about a grand display of ugly crying. It can also cut deep very quietly and it sneaks up on you.

No matter how it gets expressed, provocation is always directing us back to authenticity, integrity, and the most valuable contribution we can make in the world. So good to know, right?

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 39

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 39:

I am provocative AF.

I love to be mischievous.

I push buttons in those that are ready for transformation.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 39

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 39 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Do you take full ownership of your emotions? Do you let others do the same?

What provokes you? Why? (Perhaps it’s related to your core wound/unconscious mars?)

In what ways do you provoke others? Why?

Are you open to greater and greater levels of emotional and spiritual awareness?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 39.

And, if you have gate 39 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 40 – Gene Key 40 – The Liberated Altruist￼
Content:

## About Human Design Gate 40 – Gene Key 40

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Gene Keys Siddhi:Divine Will

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 40

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 40 is the energy for balancing your heart of service with your need for alone time, rest and relaxation. To gate 40 boundaries are beautiful. With its proper boundaries in place, it is empowered to dedicate vast amounts of energy in service to its community.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 40 is the energy for using force, rather than natural energy, to get things done — especially for others. It may believe that “serving others” is how one proves its worth in society and therefore, have weak or porous boundaries. This can quickly lead to becoming burn-out from over-giving.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling burned out, heartless or too generous but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 40 (Gene Key 40)

In the bookChants of Lifetime by Krishna Das, he starts the book by sharing the story of Neem Karoli Baba (his Guru and my Baba) sending him back to America to work through attachments.

Krishna Das didn’t want to go back to America; he had planned to live out the remainder of his life in India.

As he leaves the ashram, he shouts to Baba,

“How can I serve you in America?”

Baba shouts back:

“If you have to ask how to serve, it isn’t service.”

True to form, this one sentence struck me like a lightning bolt (human design gate 51).

With my undefined will, undefined gate 40, and surrounded by an astounding number of people with the full 40/37, I have held deep conditioning around being of service and worthiness.

I spent most of my life trying to figure out what exactly I needed to do to be good enough and worthy of love.

But what this story, and Baba, have shown me, time and time again is that worthiness is a construct of the mind. In the eyes of the Divine, it isn’t a real thing.

“True” service is just a natural process for a healthy will center.

But when we “serve” others to prove that we are enough, good, or worthy, we only serve a limited identity of the ego.

With this awareness, I have made it a conscious practice to notice when I’m giving in an attempt to be seen as good and when it is a natural expression of authenticity.

When I am doing something for others because I believe I have to, it is exhausting. It depletes everything I have to keep that up.

But when service comes from an authentic place, it is a completely different experience for everyone. It expands rather than collapses.

When it is authentic, rather than performative, I have this deep knowing that my next step is one of service. It is the natural state of receiving and the final stage of alchemy.

(You’ll learn all of the stages of alchemical transformation inside theHuman Design Mapportal.)

When we have gone through our alchemical process and fully stepped into a “higher” state of consciousness, the service to others literally just pours out.

When we are showing up for ourselves, honoring our boundaries, and expanding our consciousness, it can only work that way. You literally cannot stop that kind of flow. And there is no questioning whatsoever.

And, while I can’t know for sure, I think this is exactly what Baba was getting at in that conversation with Krishna Das.

Service isn’t something we have to try to do. It isn’t something that is expected from some mysterious bearded dude in the sky. It isn’t a performance for egoic eyes.

Service isexpansive. It creates a ripple effect of expanded consciousness all around it.

The form doesn’t matter. There is no right or wrong way.

And when we are questioning whether or not we are doing it the right, that is a signal that we’ve lost the plot. We’ve become wrapped up in the story that we need to prove ourselves to be worthy of love.

Those moments are not a time to double down, grit your teeth, and push through. They are moments to reconnect with yourself and to ask yourself what you would be doing if you weren’t trying to prove your goodness.

The real trick is letting that be enough.

My boundaries are beautiful.

Title: Human Design Gate 41 – Gene Key 41 – The Patient Dreamer
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 41 isThe Gate of Contraction. But I call itThePatient Dreamerbecause its primary action is to seek experiences and evolve your dreams through fulfillment.

## About Human Design Gate 41 – Gene Key 41

Archetype Name:The Patient Dreamer

In Action:honor your hopes and dreams

Keywords:hopes and dreams, felt experiences, transformation, and Divine Timing

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Contraction

Human Design Definition:The limitation of resources which maximizes development of potential.

Core Theme:Pressure to feel and the desire for new experience. In this context, pressure is not necessarily a problem. It’s really about acting from the amount of pressure that is correct for you.

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Solar Plexus center viahuman design gate 30.

Tropical Sign:Aquarius

Gene Keys Shadow:Fantasy

Gene Keys Gift:Anticipation

Gene Keys Siddhi:Emanation

Note:Gate 41 is the beginning of the Rave New Year

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 41

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 41 is the energy to honor one’s hopes and dreams and watch them evolve through fulfillment. The 41 sees visions of a brighter future as a trustworthy source of transformation and can use the mind as a playground of creativity, big dreams, and visions of a brighter future.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 41 is the energy for never taking steps towards your dreams or staying stuck in fantasies. If the 41 ignores divine timing due to fear, it can feel too nervous about taking action and stoppingits dreams in itstracks.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling nervous, worried or stressed but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 41 (Gene Key 41)

In Western culture, we think of the new year January 1st.

But, in Human Design, the new year begins when the sun enters gate 41. And in the Gene Keys, gate (key) 41 is known as the “start codon,” which initiates the sequencing of our literal genes.

All that to say, the energy of gate 41 is essential when it comes to new beginnings. And while I love new beginnings, gate 41 isundefinedin my chart.

I’ve always had a love-hate relationship with goal setting, resolutions, and making big proclamations about what I wanted to do during the year.

With my undefined root, it feels like more pressure than I can consistently regulate in a healthy way. And, with heavily defined splenic authority, making decisions and committing to what I’ll be doing a year from now has yet to work.

The spleen is all about the present moment; it does not decide or commit the way the will center or sacral center do. As long as there is no immediate threat or it isn’t stuck in fight or flight, the spleen doesn’t really “care” about the future.

Intentions, on the other hand, feel much better in my body and despite a common misconception in the Human Design space intentions are not just “the mind.” And as I talk about in my post onhow to make affirmations work, aligning your intentions with the truths of your Human Design is potent magick.

Intentions are a key alchemical tool that arise from the depths of our G center, where the magnetic monopole (aka soul) resides. They ripple out through thenine energy centersand draw us towards our next plane of consciousness.

And that is happening whether our mind is conscious of the intention, or not. The real magick happens when we bring our intentions into the light and start walking the path of alignment.

Another key thing to note about intentions is that, unlike goals, they are not “check-off-able.” When you set a goal – say painting the bedroom – once it is done, it is done. That isn’t to say that you’ll never have to paint the bedroom again but there is a finish line.

Intentions don’t work like that. Intentions are focused on cultivatinga vibein the present moment – no matter the circumstances. They focus on who you arebeing, the energy you bring to your life, and how aligned your everyday choices are with the truth of who you are.

Intentions initiate the alchemical process, leading to the accomplishment of The Great Work (aka enlightenment), and reveal the path of alignment with each passing moment.

I teach a step-by-step process for using intentions with your Human Design in theHuman Design Mapportal. If you are an existingmapclient, log into your dashboard and start at the beginning of the deconditioning toolbox.

When you are working with your intentions, it is important to not get them mixed up with your conditioning. You want them to arise from that deeper, soulful place (of the G center) and resonate with the sound of Truth.

If they are coming from a place of needing to prove yourself, keep up with the Jones’, or sacrifice yourself for the sake of others, listen deeper. Make some space for plenty ofPure Aura Timeand remember the magick of the conscious sun in yourincarnation cross.

(You’ll get an explanation of all four gates in your cross in yourHuman Design Map.)

And that is where harnessing the energy of gate 41 comes in for me.

Gate 41 is dreamy and fantastical, and connecting withhuman design gate 30in the solar plexus, inspires a deeper relationship with how lifefeels. It helps us to tap into the desires and dreams that are hidden under the surface.

Soft. Generous. And forgiving of being human.

Most importantly, though, it shows us how fulfillment happens, whether we are looking at goals or intentions.

Evolution happens through fulfillment. And fulfillment happens through aligned action.

Whether we thrive with concrete goals or prefer more soulful intentions, we must move in the direction we want. We have to take the next aligned step, trust in the timing of life, and be open to having our deepest desires come true.

Sometimes, the next aligned step is going to be a nap. Or waiting. Or connecting with the people who can help you.

Other times, it will be ass-in-chair, doing the work.

Either way, what I’ve come to understand is that beingopento fulfillment, rather than forceful, is where the most opportunity for alchemical expansion is.

When we are under unhealthy amounts of pressure, striving, and trying to force shit, we close ourselves off from the more profound satisfaction, success, peace, and delight we seek.

But when we soften and surrender to the natural impulses of growth of evolution, fulfillment is a sure thing. Growth and evolution are a natural by-product of alignment with our deeper seeds of truth.

Because remember – the magnetic monopole (aka soul) only attracts; it cannot push things away. Much like Jupiter, it is benevolent and expansive.

There is no force required, even when doing the ass-in-chair hard work.

It is only our misaligned conditioning that keeps us small, tight, and striving for less than our full potential.

Our seeds of Truth want to flourish, blossom, and express themselves. And when we open and allow, it can only be that way.

If you are ready to let go of striving and sacrificing your true desires for socially acceptable goals, you’ll love theHuman Design Map + Portal. I’ll explain the most important parts of your Human Design and teach you what you need to know to choose your truth.Get yours here.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 41

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 41:

I am a lighthouse of possibility.

I evolve my dreams through fulfillment.

I am attuned to Divine Timing and easily take aligned action.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate41

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 41 are available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Have you given yourself true permission to have your dreams come true?

Do you have the capacity to have the fulfillment of your dreams? (Hint: If your dreams aren’t coming true, the answer is no.;))
