### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 51

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 51 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

How has life shocked you?

Are you willing to feel the pain of those shocks? Are you willing to love yourself and life through it all?

What if you believed it was all happening FOR your awakening?

Are you willing to transmute the pain of life into Gold?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate51.

And, if you have gate 51 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 52 – Gene Key 52 – The Still Mountain
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 52 isThe Gate of Stillness. But I call itThe Still Mountainbecause its primary action is to tune into divine timing and trust that when it’s time to act- you will.

## About Human Design Gate 52 – Gene Key 52

Archetype Name:The Still Mountain

In Action:wait to take action until the time is right

Keywords:stillness, concentration, ebbing, and flowing

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Stillness

Human Design Definition:Temporary and self-imposed inaction for the benefit of assessment.

Core Theme:Pressure to focus and concentrate. In this context, pressure is not necessarily a problem. It’s really about acting from the amount of pressure that is correct for you.

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Sacral center viahuman design gate 9.

Tropical Sign:Cancer

Gene Keys Shadow:Stress

Gene Keys Gift:Restraint

Gene Keys Siddhi:Stillness

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 52

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 52 is the energy for having faith in divine timing and trusting yourself to act when the time is right. Gate 52 believes that patience really is a virtue and it understands that there is a time and season for everything. With this mindset, it can sit still, concentrate on the things that capture its interest, and trust in the right timing.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 52 is the energy for staying still when it’s time to move and moving when it’s time to stay still. It can also try to force things to work according to its mind’s timing rather than trusting in Divine timing, which can lead to things not working as the mind hopes.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you aren’t trusting Divine Timing but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 52 (Gene Key 52)

Gate 52 is in the root center, a pressure center and home to the adrenal glands. The bodygraph has two pressure centers: the head and the root.

Simply put, the head center creates the pressure to think by asking big questions, and the root center creates pressure to take or guide the actions that evolve humanity. The gates that are pressured to take action are Gate 52,Gate 60, andGate 53. The gates that are pressured to guide action areGate 58,Gate 38,Gate 54,Gate 19,Gate 39, andGate 41.​In traditional Human Design, the pressure of the root center is often described as a pulse; it turns on and off mysteriously – it cannot be predicted or controlled. This uncontrollable pulse is often called Divine Timing.

In the case of the 52, since it is part of a generated channel and is also a format channel, the pressure is to take action in Divine Timing. Divine timing is an essential part of how humans evolve—it is literally one of the formats of the changes and transformations that humanity will go through.

(If you are aHuman Design Map & Portalcustomer, you can find more information on format channels in the Channels course in your portal dashboard. My team and I would love to answer any questions you have in the discussions there.)

While I have a defined head center, and am all too familiar with the pressure the head creates, my root center is undefined. And, without a doubt, I can say that any wisdom I have about root pressure is hard-won. True to my root being undefined, so much of my life has been about trying to escape pressure and stress by taking action.

And, as they say, the body keeps the score. I’ve completely burnt out my adrenals a couple of times and have pulled myself off the brink of it more times than I can count.

On the other hand, my husband has channel 9-52 defined, and therefore, a defined root center.

And while it is natural and easy for me to regulate the pressure in the head, he is a true natural at the pressure of the root.

He works in a high-pressure job with constant deadlines and it takes A LOT to stress him out. If he is stressed, you know some shit is going down.

What I’ve noticed about him that is so different from me is his pace in general. His energy is very “steady mountain” and he rarely, if ever, rushes. He has his own inner sense of timing that seems to work for him.

Even when I LOUDLY roll my eyes, he won’t hurry out the door. It is like he doesn’t even know how. In contrast, you will find me rushing, rushing, rushing to get to the next thing; I have to consciously slow myself down.

For example, when we go to Target, he is always many steps behind me, and it’s easy for me to lose him. I speed walk like my life depends on getting to the toilet paper aisle the fastest, and he is on a leisurely Sunday stroll.

It’s a constant reminder for me to slow the fuck down.

I don’t always have to take action right now. I don’t have to rush to get toilet paper. I don’t have to live every single minute like I’m on a super-secret mission.

I can slow down. I can trust myself, life, and that thing that some call God.

Life is not as urgent as we often make it out to be. When we lean into Divine Timing, combined with our own inner wisdom, things really do have a way of working themselves.

We don’t have to rush to the next thing, and we don’t even have to pressure ourselves to grow and evolve.

As the bodygraph shows us, that isn’t in our control, and it happens naturally as we lean into our authentic energy.

There really is an ebb and flow to this crazy experience called Life As Human. It is just a matter of choosing which game we want to play. Do we trust the Divine? Or do we try to control the flow? You choose.

If you want to trust Divine Timing and harness the power of your authentic energy, you will love theHuman Design Map & Portal. It will help you understand your design, make authentic decisions, overcome people-pleasing, and believe in the value you bring to the world.Get yours here.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 52

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 52:

I easily concentrate on the things that are interesting to me.

I am patient.

I live in the ebb and flow of life.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 52

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 52 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Do you trust in Divine Timing? Why or why not?

How do you deal with the pressure to go? Is that way working for you?

Do you trust yourself to take action when the time is right? And be still when it’s not? Why or why not?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 52.

And, if you have gate 52 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Map, where I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 53 – Gene Key 53 – The Spark of Alchemy
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 53 isThe Gate of Development. But I call itThe Spark of Alchemybecause its primary action is to see all of life as an opportunity to grow.

## About Human Design Gate 53 – Gene Key 53

Archetype Name:The Spark of Alchemy

In Action:to see all of life as an opportunity to grow

Keywords:initiating, navigating new beginnings, and seeing opportunities

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official GateName:Development

Human Design Definition:Development as a structured progression that is both steadfast and enduring.

Core Theme:pressure to start new things. In this context, pressure is not necessarily a problem. It’s really about acting from the amount of pressure that is correct for you.

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Sacral center viahuman design gate 42.

Tropical Sign:Cancer

Gene Keys Shadow:Immaturity

Gene Keys Gift:Expansion

Gene Keys Siddhi:Superabundance

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 53

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 53 is the energy for seeing all of life as an opportunity to grow. To gate 53, all of life holds infinite potential for evolution and growth. It trusts that when you begin new things based on the guidance of your inner wisdom, magick swoops in to help you see it through to the end.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 53 is the energy for having too many open loops (projects, goals, ideas, tasks) and no energy to see them through. It can lead to always staying in your comfort zone and quitting too soon. If fear is running the show, it can also contribute to excessive spending or beginning things out of scarcity.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling lazy, or antagonistic but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 53 (Gene Key 53)

Gate 53, line 6, is defined in my unconscious Mercury.

I am quite obsessed with Mercury and his role in our Human Design chart.

Mercury, in Greek mythology, was Hermes. He was the God of travel, translation, commerce, financial gain, wealth, and communication. He loaded up his cart and brought valuable gifts to the people in the village.The distance between the conscious (personality) and unconscious (design) sides of the chart is 88°, the exact time it takes Mercury to make a complete orbit (aka all 64Human Design gates) around the sun.

This, to me, means that Mercury infused ourincarnation cross(aka purpose) with everything we could possibly need to bring our cart of highly valuable gifts to the metaphorical market.

Our Mercury placement specifically tells us what we communicate to the world when we show up to be seen by others.

If you are one of myHuman Design Mapclients and have checked out the quick and dirty business guide in the portal, you already know that our Mercury isn’t something we conjure or need to “try” to communicate.You’ve heard the adage that energy doesn’t lie. Humans can sense the frequency we vibrate no matter what we say or do. That’s Mercury.

The value we bring to others is the frequency of our Mercury placement. And it can’t be faked.

To take this even further, if the conscious side Mercury is what we communicate (no matter what we are doing), our unconscious Mercury is the primary “block” that prevents expansion into higher frequencies on the conscious side.

So, if we communicate a “low vibe,” a shadow on the unconscious side of the chart needs integration.

To be clear, “low vibe” is not a moral judgment, even though new-age rhetoric often turns it into one. That is why I put it in quotes.Every single human being on the planet is a mix of shadow (unconscious) and light (conscious). Our consciousness expands by bringing our shadows (unconscious parts) into the light (conscious awareness).

In other words, shadow integration is “how” we come to know our Divinity. The great spiritual masters – Jesus, Buddha, Krishna, etc. – showed us what that looks like.

When it comes to what our lives say to the world, our unconscious Mercury gate is the primaryshadowthat “blocks” higher-frequency communication.

For me, that “block” is gate 53, the Spark of Alchemy.

I havegate 46, line 6, in my conscious mercury. This means that — no matter what I am doing — I  communicate about the magick of synchronicity, the embodiment of bhakti, and the love of being alive in a human body.

That is probably why I strongly advocate for knowing your human design AND using it as a doorway into self-discovery, experimentation, and intentional living. It’s why I offer so much follow-up support and additional resources with theHuman Design Map & Portal.

I know that experimenting leads to the embodiment of the soul; it is how we can revel in being alive. And fall madly in love with who we truly are. That magick has absolutely nothing to do with information.

Without experimenting, Human Design falls 100% flat.

When I first started sharing about Human Design though, I was holding back a lot.

I came into Human Design with a background in energy healing, alchemy, High Magick, and Western Kabbalahistic pathworking.

And I saw how others had their names dragged through the mud when they had even a tiny deviation from “source material” in theirinterpretation of Human Design.

True to gate 53 in my unconscious Mercury, integrating magick and alchemy into my work with Human Design felt terrifying.

But as I worked through my fears and brought those parts to the metaphorical village, I could see that magick, alchemy, and understanding how transformation actually works are essential for me to communicate about embodiment.

It isn’t optional. It is what draws people to me.

And I don’t just mean to teach it. I do. The entireMAPMethod for Deconditioning inside theHuman Design Map & Portalis based on the seven phases of spiritual alchemy.

I mean, I must live it, too.

If I’m not doing my inner healing work to decondition the shit that gets in the way of my authentic embodiment, that will be loud and clear.

If I am not making choices aligned with my inner wisdom, that is the message that will come across.

If I am choosing people pleasing over authenticity, that is the vibe people will pick up.

No matter what I say.

And here is what I know for sure about embodiment and alchemy:

You can only heal what you can see.

Our intention to live in alignment with the highest potential of our purpose is the beginning. It is the match that lights the fires of our seeing. It is thespark of alchemy.

Your intention is like a message to your soul that says:

Please show me all the “reasons” why I don’t do what I say I want to do. Make it so fucking clear that I can’t deny it anymore. Write it so big and bold that I can get out of my way.

And, uh, that shit is messy.

But, the bullshit new age rhetoric often tells us that all we have to do is put some shit on a vision board, and it will manifest into reality.

So, you expect rainbows, butterflies, and pop culture magic. And when it doesn’t go like that, you will give up and fall into a hole of shame. You will think you are broken and not worthy of your heartfelt desires.

Ask me how I know.

Because I have fallen into those same traps, afraid of how others will see me, I’ve held back and pretended not to be the force of nature I AM.

Those traps are a firehose on the spark.

The promise of alchemy allows us to be seen in our fullness, our wholeness, and our true magick.

But it isn’t supposed to go perfectly. Becoming a person of high-frequency purpose and contribution doesn’t bypass your humanity.

It is your doorway into it.

And when you expect (and celebrate) the shit to hit the fan instead of a fairy tale, you can navigate it with Grace instead of self-hatred.

You can meet the parts of yourself that are terrified of being seen and create the love, belonging, and safety they need to shine. You can be the very love that you crave.

That alchemy is where the potential for embodied purpose lives.

I would even be so bold as to say that your intentions are inevitable when you know how to navigate the natural flow of alchemy.

(You’ll learn “how” in theHuman Design Map & Portal.)

At the end of the day, I can’t approach Human Design without bringing all of that in. Mercury won’t let me.

Because it would mean denying authentic parts of myself, which would defeat the purpose entirely.

Today, I am boldly vocal and upfront about my alchemical approach to Human Design. When you come into my world, I will not pretend that knowing this or that about your design is the secret sauce. And I will not hide the necessity of inner healing work from you.

No matter whichhuman design gatesare in yourincarnation crossor mercury gates, expanding your consciousness and making your most valuable contribution in the world requires the spark of alchemy.

You literally can’t have one without the other. Mercury will be sure of that. If you want to master the inner alchemy required to overcome people-pleasing and embody the highest frequency of your purpose, you will love theHuman Design Map & Portal. I made it just for people who know that human design information is not the magick. Showing up, getting out of your own way, and learning how to make authentic decisions is.Get yours here.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 53

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 53:

I see all of life as an opportunity to grow.

My inner wisdom is a fire starter.

I hold the spark of magic.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 53

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 53 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with starting things?

Do you trust that magic will swoop in to help you see the right things through? Why or why not?

What new intentions do you want to bring to life?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 53.

Title: Human Design Gate 54 – Gene Key 54 – The Prosperity Seeker
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 54 isThe Gate of Drive. But I call itThe Prosperity Seekerbecause its primary action is to master the material plane (time, money, resources) as a path to spiritual growth.

## About Human Design Gate 54 – Gene Key 54

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Splenic center viahuman design gate 32.

Gene Keys Shadow:Greed

Gene Keys Gift:Aspiration

Gene Keys Siddhi:Ascension

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 54

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 54 is the energy for ambition and drive. And because the 54 has a deep inner knowing that all paths lead to the Divine, it is empowered to master the material plane (time, money, resources) as a path to spiritual growth.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 54 is the energy for having blind ambition that takes you nowhere and leaves you feeling bitter. The 54 can be prone to giving up too quickly when results aren’t instant.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling passive, obsessed or self-absorbed but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 54 (Gene Key 54)

I must tell you that gate 54 holds a near and dear place in my heart.

Technically, Gate 54 isundefinedin my bodygraph. But, when you look at my astrological chart through the lens of theHuman Design gates, it is the gate in my Midheaven.

In astrology, our Midheaven holds important clues about our career, reputation, and the legacy that we will leave in the world.

As a Projector, I am hardwired to crave wild success – the kind that blows your mind with possibility. And I’m also a contemplative mystic.

Myincarnation cross,the Left Angle Cross of the Clarion 2 (57/51, 62/61) speaks to my life’s work and purpose being of a spiritual nature.

(I’ll explain how the four gates of your incarnation cross work together inside yourHuman Design Map.)

As long as I can remember, I’ve been deeply connected to the unseen realms. It has always been clear to me that pulling a thread over here impacts the one over there. And, of course, I am deeply fascinated by the golden thread that some call God.

Like many mystics before me, I’ve understood that we didn’t incarnate on earth to “be spiritual” or to “transcend” the human experience. And that “God” isn’t the angry, vengeful, codependent beast that many find in the Bible.

We are incarnated tobeHuman. To play hide and seek with our Divinity in the game called life.

AsRam Dasswould say,being here nowis the whole point.

In the east, they have a concept about householders versus renunciants, and have the wisdom to understand that most of us are incarnate to be householders. Meaning, we are “meant” to have mouths to feed, bills to pay, a body to keep safe, and a life immersed in “the real world.”

And while giving up those “worldly” needs may be just the right thing for some, for most of us, we don’t need to give up living in the real world to be “worthy” in the eyes of “God.”

First of all, because worthiness is not real; it’s a made up construct by the ego. But, somewhere along the way, I bought into the lie that “spiritual people” shouldn’t have earthbound ambitions.

And, long before theHuman Design Mapbecame a thing, or I knew anything about astrology, being in business showed me that an important part of my spiritual path is material mastery.

In the beginning, I was shocked to discover that “wanting to help people” doesn’t make my grocery bill or mortgage disappear. And running a business requires so much more than offering value to other people. (Want unbelievable value?Get your map here!)

In addition to providing goods or services, running a business requires “real world” skills like sales, marketing, administration, managing people, delegation, wise decision making, and a deep grasp on the cold, hard numbers.

The reality is that if you keep your head in the sand about all that, you will quickly be applying for a j-o-b.

And let’s be honest: I’m unemployable with my sassy mouth. 🤣

As all of that started to sink in, I saw that to create true success and prosperity, Icouldn’tchoose between my spiritual life and my worldly ambition. It had to be both.

I started to wonder if maybe my wild success would come when I used my desire for prosperity and material mastery as the way to grow and expand my definition of “God.”

That perhaps success wouldn’t happen in spite of being a contemplative mystic butbecause of it.

Maybe, just maybe, my business could become a playground where I faced myself in the deepest of ways. Becoming seen, recognized, and highly valued would be the ultimate invitation toconfront my stories, process my emotions, and face my shadows.

(You will learn those skills inside theHuman Design Mapportal!)

Come to find out…All those people who say that you have to choose between success and spiritual devotion are wrong (for me).

Surrendering to the mastery of business without sacrificing my body, mind, or spirit has led me to levels of spiritual growth that I could have never imagined.  And the more success I see in my business, the more and more true that becomes.

I’ve come to understand – and what I hope my legacy will be – is that mastering the material plane is a beautiful path to spiritual expansion and growth.

Your definition of that thing that some call God can actually become BIGGER when you embrace your ambitious parts. And, I for one, am so grateful to have come to this understanding.

Today, my business is a wild success and keeps growing.

TheHuman Design Maphas blown my mind repeatedly with possibilities. It is filled to the brim with a community of people who are healed by my words and transformed by the alchemical tools that I teach them to wield.

And, more and more, I soften into the knowing that there is no need to sacrifice what is true for me, as a human being, along the way. The more I lean into what is true for me, the more successful I become.

I easily provide for our financial needs, give to causes I deeply care about, and am devoted to my spiritual path. I am connected to my higher purpose and becoming clearer about what that means with each passing day.

And hey, if that is what I become known for in this world, I’m perfectly OK with that. Here’s to both/and.

Mastering the material plane is my spiritual path.

I am ambitious AF.

I love to create prosperity for myself and others.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 54

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 54 are available to you, whether you have it in your chart or not…

Do you believe that being spiritual or helping people means you shouldn’t care about money? If so, where did you pick up that idea, and are you willing to put it down now?

What might life look like if you surrendered to being here, fully incarnate on Earth?

Title: Human Design Gate 55 – Gene Key 55 – The Abundant Spirit
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 55 isThe Gate of Spirit. But I call itThe Abundant Spiritbecause its primary action is to emotionally embody your faith in the spirit of abundance.

## About Human Design Gate 55 – Gene Key 55

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 55

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate55is theenergy for embodying faith in the spirit of abundance. For the 55, abundance is the very nature of life. I can feel that God is Everything and that Earth is simply a place for the Divine to play in infinite expressions.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 55 is the energy for rejecting your “low” emotional experiences and using them as evidence for lack, victim consciousness, and punishment. When the 55 doesn’t use it’s emotions as creative fuel, it loses faith.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling emotional, silly or depressed but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 55 (Gene Key 55)

One of my favorite people on the planet,Leah Badertscher, has gate 55 in her conscious sun.

She has been a long-time friend and was one of my clients when I did private coaching. She was even one of the first to get aHuman Design Map.

And though she was my client, she taught me so much about what faith in abundance actuallyfeelslike.

Through her, the concept of abundance moved from being theoretical to something tangible I could experience in my body. In witnessing her, I saw what abundance looks like in human form.

She has this tenacious AF spirit that is like riding on a wing and a prayer.

She has shown me that faith is everything. And not religious faith.

Sure, that may be the path for some. But as we head into the 2027 transition, cultivating faith in the Divine that dwells within is how we will thrive.

Faith in your own spirit. Faith that if you can dream it, it is already yours. Faith that life is a table and we are here to feast.

What has become clear to me is that faith doesn’t look like sitting around and hoping for some mystical savior to come along.

Yes, there are guides in both the natural and spirit realms.

But those guides are always a mirror of your own inner wisdom. YOU are the guru.

And faith is showing up and working with what you’ve got.

It’s Creative, with a capital C, as Leah says, and it is about cultivating an intentional relationship with the part of you that already knows and trusts in the abundance of life.

Faith is trusting that when you ask, it is given.

Faith knows that we aren’t given dreams as a torture tactic – they are for our becoming.

The things we most desire out of life are catalysts for knowing our spiritual essence and aligning with our higher purpose.

(This is one of the bazillion reasons I love Human Design. It gives context to the things we’ve always wanted and is the clearestmap for aligning with your higher purpose.)

Faith is allowing the spirit to dance through your every move. It is surrendering to the whole experience of being human.

It is being here now, feeling it all the way through, and finding the abundance in all of it.

Content:

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 56

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 56 is the energy for telling stories from its many adventures. Gate 56 finds humor, amusement, and delight in all things, even in places others might consider to be dark or cold. It has an inner knowing when it is time to step outside of its comfort zone and when it’s time to tell a better story about life.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 56 is the energy for becoming easily distracted with shiny object syndrome, overstimulation, or boredom from insufficient stimulation. It can easily slip into playing the role of victim in life and or being unable to let go of outdated mental stories because it is emotionally attached to them.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

The most important thing to raise the frequency of gate 56 is to foster great stories with travel, play, and enriching environments.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 56 (Gene Key 56)

Gate 56.3 is defined, in detriment, in my unconscious Venus. Let me break the mechanics of that down a bit:

Venus shows us where we find beauty in life, literally and metaphorically.It connects us to our values, deepens our relationships, and creates a sense of awe, wonder, and majesty.

The unconscious placements in our chart show us the main “blocks” andrejected shadow partsthat prevent flow on the conscious side.

The third line is about making mistakes, trial and error, and a deep willingness to figure things out.

A placement in detriment shows us where we will tend to “default” tothe “low” frequency spectrumof any given energy and where we have a lot of potential for rewriting ourkarma.

(If you are aHuman Design Map & Portalcustomer, check out the “quick and dirty guide” on Gate Nuances inside your portal.)

And, holy shit, this potent combination of mechanics (Gate 56.3, in detriment, in my unconscious Venus) could not be more true for me.

My conscious Venus isHuman Design Gate 43– which is all about tuning in to the inner voice to create breakthroughs.

One of the most stunning things about life is the breakthrough that happens when we are deeply attuned to our inner wisdom.

Of course, part of this is myHuman Design Gate 57(my conscious sun/purpose) talking because we can only trust our intuition when we create the space and willingness to listen to it.

But I have endless stories (no pun intended!) of witnessing breakthroughs happen with others as a direct result of them going inside themselves. Watching these moments unfold brings tears to my eyes. The beauty of it astounds me (Venus).

(This is why I love Human Design so much. It gives usa mapfor that kind of exploration.)

When it comes to my own breakthroughs and opening up to the beauty within them, though, I have to be mindful of the stories I am telling myself. I am no stranger to making the stuff of life mean horrendous things.

(We all do that sometimes!)

When I am caught in one of those shitty stories, I shut down. My eyes close so tight that I can’t see the beauty and majesty of what is. My inner wisdom becomes quiet, and a true breakthrough is locked out of my heart and mind.

In those moments, my work is to remember that self-compassion, grace, and opening to possibility are the first steps in telling a new story. We cannot transform our stories when they are steeped in shame, self-ridicule, and victim consciousness.

As I teach in the Art of Remembering (a bonus course in theHuman Design Map & Portal), the practice is remembering to remember.

I remember by connecting with my purpose, the value I bring to the world, and separating the facts from the fiction. In that remembering, a new story is born.

Yes, by the mystery of Grace, shitties stories might be my first instinct. I will get caught in shitty stories again. And, because I am a human being, I will forget my purpose, my value, and that thoughts (stories) are not truth with a capital T.

Stories are choices; they are our free will.

So, I will keep letting go of the old stories, choosing new ones, and allowing myself to see the beauty of this life. I will stand in reverence as my breakthroughs come. And I will remember as many times as it takes.

And so it is.

If you want to learn to tell a different story about yourself, you will love theHuman Design Map & Portal, a two-part experience for transforming your life with Human Design.

First, you’ll get a 100+ page guide—made just for you—that covers your Human Design type and strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of your incarnation cross. Then, to ensure you don’t have to go the journey alone, you will get access to the portal, where we’ll answer your questions, provide exclusive Human Design content, and guide you through a step-by-step process for deconditioning.Get yours here.

Title: Human Design Gate 57 – Gene Key 57 – The Lucid Intuitive
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 57 isThe Gate of Intuitive Clarity. But I call itThe Lucid Intuitivebecause its primary action is trusting its intuitive knowing.

## About Human Design Gate 57 – Gene Key 57

Archetype Name:The Lucid Intuitive

In Action:trusting your intuitive knowing

Keywords:intuition, instinct, clarity, and inner knowing

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Bodygraph Center:Spleen center and connects to the Throat center viahuman design gate 20, connects to the sacral center viahuman design gate 57, and connects to the G center viahuman design gate 10.

Gene Keys Gift:Intuition

Gene Keys Siddhi:Clarity

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 57

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 57 is the energy for trusting your intuitive knowing above all else; it is highly intuitive, clairaudient, and quite possibly psychic. Gate 57 believes that everything you need to know is alive in the present moment and that the body is the most trustworthy source of intuition. The future is bright when you trust yourself.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 57 is the energy for not trusting your intuition or writing off your intuitive knowing because there is nothing logical to back it up. This lack of trust can lead to trusting other people’s opinions or overriding intuitive wisdom with logic, reason, and mental rationalization and creating a life that is frustrating, bitter, anger-filled, or disappointing.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling indecisive, intrusive or “too” spontaneous, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 57 (Gene Key 57)

Gate 57 is defined in the conscious sun of myincarnation cross, which means it is the most important gate in my chart. It is my “Divine Invitation” to trust my intuition and create the kind of life that sets me up for intuitive clarity.

And, well, it has been a journey.

For most of my life, I was on a path of repeatedly ignoring my intuition and regretting it later.

I would get very clear NO signals but I would discount them. My thoughts would convince me that my intuition was illogical and therefore, untrustworthy.

I had disintegratedshadowsaround being weird, crazy, or “too” suspicious. I never wanted others to judge me as odd or strange for my “illogical” decisions.

(You’ll learn the shadows of your design inside theHuman Design Mapand learn how to integrate them inside themapportal.)

That completely shifted when I had a session with a healer who focused on helping others reclaim their intuitive gifts.

I told her about an experience I’d had with a well known business coach.

My colleagues wouldn’t shut up talking about this guy. But when I visited his website,  my whole body said NO and I felt immediately suspicious.

But, in my mind, I believed that because “all the cool kids” were hiring this person, that I should too. I thought that, clearly, my body was wrong and that I should do what everyone else was doing on.

You know what they say about jumping off of bridges?

Well, I jumped. And while I won’t get into all of the details of what went down, I will say that my suspicions were 100% spot the fuck on.

As I was telling the healer that story, she stopped me and she said something that would change my life forever (Human Design Gate 23vibes!).

She said:

“Your suspicion is your intuition.”

My mind was so blown. Literally blown.

I cannot tell you how many times I’d felt suspicious in my life only to be told that I was being too sensitive (Human Design Gate 19) or ungracious (Human Design Gate 22). And, of course, only to realize later that I was right the whole time.

But, because I’d made suspicion wrong in my mind, I ignored it.

After that session with her, though, I started to pay extra close attention to sensations of suspicion, mistrust, and leeriness. If I picked up “bad vibes” at all, I started trusting them more and more.

I would walk away, no questions asked. And if people thought I was weird, strange, odd, crazy, or whatever, they could fuck right off with that noise.

I live by my intuition, not by other people’s thoughts. I embrace my weirdness. ;)

By the time I found Human Design, I was alreadydoing a ton of deconditioningaround my intuition. But, learning my design helped me take it to a whole new level.

(I’ll guide you through deconditioning inside theHuman Design Mapportal and integration course.)

My spleen is heavily defined and, according to Human Design, I have splenic authority.

That means my NO is essential to my safety and wellbeing.

So, now, my focus is all about peeling back all the ways my body says NO to things. Not just sensations like suspicion or “bad vibes” but things that don’t sound, smell, taste, look “right” are also ways my body says NO.

I’d be lying if I said that I trust those signals every time.

But, thankfully, I have compassion and Grace for myself. I know that with gate 57 in my conscious sun, my relationship with my intuition isn’t supposed to be all rainbows and butterflies.

There is “supposed to be” some grit there. And I have surrendered to the knowing that I will be on a lifelong journey of expanding my capacity to trust my intuition.

What I can say, though, with 100% certainty, is that leaning into my intuition more and more has changed the quality of my life in ways I could have never imagined.

I am truly thriving. Life isn’t perfect, of course, because it isn’t supposed to be. Earth is a place of duality.

But, my relationships are thriving. My business is booming. Themapportal conversations I get to have with people, from all over the world, blow my mind.

My body is becoming healthier and healthier.

And, more importantly, that I actually trust myself. I am way less inclined to let my mind overrule my inner knowing and I am deeply embodied in my emotional signature of success.

How does it get better than this?!?!

Title: Human Design Gate 58 – Gene Key 58 – The Joy Junkie
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 58 isThe Gate of Vitality. But I call itThe Joy Junkiebecause its primary action is to inspire others to take action that moves them beyond their limitations and into their sources of joy.

## About Human Design Gate 58 – Gene Key 58

Archetype Name:The Joy Junkie

In Action:cultivate joy and contentment

Keywords:joy, transformation, and potential

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Core Theme:Pressure to make things better. In this context, pressure is not necessarily a problem. It’s really about acting from the amount of pressure that is correct for you.

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 58

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 58 is the energy forJoy. Gate 58 knows that we must face the source of our unhappiness if we want to live that is rooted in joy. When we do that, we are empowered to experience the joy in life…just by being alive.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 58 is the energy forseeking joy from external factors rather than internal cultivation, it allows stress and pressure to override joy.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling ungrounded, high strung or stressed out, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 58 (Gene Key 58)

Let me tell you…

I am no stranger to believing that joy and happiness come from the outside — other people, stuff, food, etc.

At one time in my life, nothing “made me happier” than going to Target, grabbing a latte, and browsing the aisles for the latest and greatest thing.

I complained if people didn’t behave as I thought they should. I huffed, and I puffed. I raged all around me.

When I was unhappy at work, I’d look for a new job. When I was disappointed with my boyfriend, I broke up with him. When I “had nothing to wear,” I’d go buy more clothes.

But, no matter how much stuff I accumulated, how much food I ate, and how many boys liked me, it was never enough.

And I know I’m not alone in that. I see it all the time with my clients inside themapportal, too. Some people even use their Human Design chart as the new thing to blame when things aren’t working out the way they hoped.

To be clear, I don’t say that in a judgmental way. I say it with a deep ache in my heart because I know how painful that state of being is.

Along the way, we get glimmers of what it means to be in our full power; to abide in the kind of joy that can only come from trusting ourselves.

And we want to surrender to voice of our higher self and inner wisdom so fucking bad it hurts. But making the leap into trusting oneself, after decades of making everyone and everything responsible for your happiness, is a form of ego death. The structures that held up our victim consciousness must burn down before we can create a new way of being.

And that is because of two things:

First, Earth is a world of contrast.

We didn’t incarnate to be blissed out all the time. There are rainbows,  butterflies, and maybe even unicorns 😉. But there are also hurricanes, systems of oppression, famine, and war.

We came to expand our consciousness; to play the game of hide and seek with Divine selves. And that expansion comes through the love and acceptance of theshadow.

The contrast of life provides the grit necessary to polish and buff out the karma that keeps you trapped in the illusion of separateness.

On a practical level, that looks like owning your experience and not giving people, your clothes, your bank account, or the cute pillow at target the power to control your inner state of being.

Your thoughts, feelings, and emotions come from how your nervous system interprets the facts of life. And they are compounded by the meaning you make about yourself, the world, and that thing that some call God.

Now, for the love of all things holy, don’t mistake what I mean here.

I’m not saying that if you “just think positive,” you’ll be happy all the time, that you should stay in miserable situations because they are your fault, or that you are to blame for everything you’ve experienced.Blame and responsibility are two different things.

Blame is about looking to the past to find fault; it comes from fighting with reality and the delusion that you can change the past. Blame gives your power away and leaves you powerless.

Responsibility is looking at what is true right now, eyes wide open, and deciding what you’ll do to move forward. Responsibility is where all of your power to live authentically comes from.

The good news is that your brain and nervous system are malleable like clay and you can stop blaming life (or yourself) and you can start choosing new interpretations, expand your capacity for joy, and create new default patterns.

Your Human Design gives you amapfor that journey. And, inside the portal, you’ll learn “how” to expand your capacity for joy by no longer giving your power away and by surrendering to your inner wisdom.Get your map and portal access here.

In the meantime, know this:

Deep joy is available to you.

To experience it, you must start by taking full responsibility for your own well-being. You have to stop giving your power away to the world around you. You must remember that…

…If you need your boss to be a certain way for you to be happy, you’re in for a crapshoot.

…If you buy that cute pillow at Target, once it’s been in your living room for a little while, you aren’t even going to notice it anymore.

…If it’s raining outside, hating the weather does nothing to change it.

But when you recognize that your wellbeing is an inside job and that you have what it takes to be your own hero,  then, and only then do you have a solid foundation for expansive joy.

And it’s delightful. Go on that journey inside theHuman Design Mapportal.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 58

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 58:

I love the joy of life.

I cultivate joy in my life.

I inspire others to move into joy.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 58

When you stand in the Truth that the gifts of gate 58 are available to you, whether it’s defined in your chart or not…

How dependent on “outside things” are you to experience joy and happiness? Do you like having that attachment? What if it changes?

How can you make space in your life to experience the full range of emotions so that the joy becomes that much sweeter?

In what ways can you cultivate joy and happiness with your thoughts, beliefs, intentional feelings, and actions?

How can you begin to choose more joy today?

And be sure that you pay extra attention to your answers. Look for any places that aren’t actually in your control because those are the places where you are giving away your freedom and power.

And, if you have gate 58 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, check out theHuman Design Map, where I go super deep into each cross gate.

Title: Human Design Gate 59 – Gene Key 59 – The Intimacy Catalyst
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 59 isThe Gate of Sexuality. But I call itThe Intimacy Catalystbecause its primary action is being honest and vulnerable.

## About Human Design Gate 59 – Gene Key 59

Archetype Name:The Intimacy Catalyst

In Action:being honest and vulnerable

Keywords:vulnerability, honesty, and intimacy

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official GateName:Sexuality

Human Design Definition:The ability to break down barriers to achieve union.

Core Theme:The sexual energy to bond with a mate.

Bodygraph Center:Sacral center and connects to the Plexus center viahuman design gate 6.

Tropical Sign:Virgo

Gene Keys Shadow:Dishonesty

Gene Keys Gift:Intimacy

Gene Keys Siddhi:Transparency

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 59

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 59 is the energy for being honest and vulnerable. Gate 59 has an innate knowing that being vulnerable is the secret sauce to intimacy. It breaks down the barriers to intimacy by being vulnerable.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 59 is the energy for avoiding vulnerability with dishonesty and lying. When it is guarded or has dishonest agendas in relationships, it can foster relationships where power struggles, codependency, or poor communication are the norm.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling untrustworthy, cold, or closed off, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 59 (Gene Key 59)

Gate 59 (line 5) is defined in my unconscious mars placement. According to theGene Keys, our unconscious mars is the core wound we carry in our relationships and becomes our vocation as we heal those wounds.

(If you are one of myHuman Design Mapclients and are a business owner, go to the Human Design and Business quick and dirty guide inside the map portal for more information about how vocation relates to marketing! There is a login link at the bottom of this email. )

Understanding the symbolism of the 59 as my core wound was nothing short of a holy revelation.

I have often been called an “oversharer” because I’ve never really been afraid to share intimate details about my life.

I do have lines I don’t cross, of course, but I do tend to be more open, honest, and willing to risk emotional rejection than a lot of people. I’ll answer almost any question people ask and see great value in sharing my authentic experience.

But, holy shit, being an “over-sharer” has created so much freaking pain in my life.

It took me a long time to understand that being “too” vulnerable was such a great source of suffering.

We are so often told that we “should be more vulnerable” and I took that to the max.

But, as Brene so wisely says, we need to be discerning about our vulnerability and that we should only share with those that have earned the right to hear our story.

Perhaps it was my Projector energy that so desperately wanted to be recognized or my undefined will trying to prove something, but I often found myself sharing intimate details and having them fall on deaf ears.

Once, I shared a painful experience in my life with someone that I genuinely thought was my friend and they very plainly responded with:

“We aren’t that kind of friends.”

I can look back on that and respect her boundaries.

But at the time, it was heart-wrenching.

Sadly, it didn’t stop me. In fact, I doubled down on vulnerability and found myself in multiple situations where my vulnerability was used as a weapon against me.

With the help of Gene Keys and Brene Brown’s words, I started to wise up, though.

I started to pay more attention to who had “earned the right” to my vulnerability. Probably more importantly, I started to pay close attention to who was critical of my vulnerable nature.

Are they daring greatly, as Theodore Roosevelt said?

Are they in the arena?

Are they doing something with their lives that I admire?

Or are they just being an armchair critic?

Are they using my vulnerability for their own gain or were they willing to traverse it with me to create more connection and intimacy?

The answers to those questions really matter and help guide me as I encounter “feedback” about my level of vulnerability.

I’d love to say that it never hurts when my vulnerability isn’t received well. Because it still does sometimes. I am a human being with normal human feelings, afterall.

But, I am more discerning. And in the times I get it wrong, I’m learning to let go of attachment to how my sharing is received. True to the 5th line, I am trusting that what other people think about me is on them, and that when I share with the people who do truly love me, it sets the stage for others to do the same.

And that risk is worth it to me. Because I do want to live in a world where we can deeply understand one another and that can only happen through vulnerability, honesty, and willingness to risk other people’s opinions.

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 59:

I initiate others into the ways of healthy and sustainable relationships.

I give birth to new life.

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of gate 59 are always available to you, (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

Do you to tend to hold back or are you more of an oversharer? Why is that?

Where do you crave more intimacy in your life and how might you “go first” in being vulnerable enough to create it?

Who has earned the right to your vulnerability and who hasn’t?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 59.

Title: Human Design Gate 60 – Gene Key 60 – The Embodied Magician
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 60 isThe Gate of Acceptance. But I call it TheEmbodied Magicianbecause its primary action is to magically flow through the river of life.

## About Human Design Gate 60 – Gene Key 60

Archetypal Name:The Embodied Magician

In Action:use creativity to overcome obstacles

Keywords:magic, limitation, embodiment, and the Laws of Nature

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Acceptance

Human Design Definition:The acceptance of limitation is the first step in transcendence.

Core Theme:Pressure to transcend limitation. In this context, pressure is not necessarily a problem. It’s really about acting from the amount of pressure that is correct for you.

Bodygraph Center:Root center and connects to the Sacral center viahuman design gate 3.

Tropical Sign:Capricorn/Aquarius

Gene Keys Shadow:Limitation

Gene Keys Gift:Realism

Gene Keys Siddhi:Justice

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 60

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 60 is the energy for flowing through life by using creativity to overcome limitations. Gate 60 breaks the rules and loves to create equitable systems and structures. It thrives when it has the proper boundaries in places for magic, creativity, and transformation to flourish.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 60 is the energy forbecoming victimized by laws, rules, boundaries, and natural limits.It has a tendency to act out when boundaries aren’t clear and stay in their comfort zone instead of using their creativity to overcome challenges.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling careless, erratic or rebellious, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 60 (Gene Key 60)

Gate 60 isundefinedin my chart, but it holds a very special place in my heart. I know I say that a lot, for different reasons, but this one is deeply connected to truly understanding my gifts and the value I bring to the world.

My very firstmapcustomer has gate 60 in their conscious sun.

Back then, I didn’t know thehuman design gatesthe way that I do now. I hadn’t quite realized that the gates “speak to me” and that I had a natural affinity with them. And it was gate 60 that cracked open that door.

I can remember very clearly sitting down to study gate 60.

I was surrounded by piles ofHuman Design, Gene Keys, and IChing books. I was taking notes as fast as my hand would go.

By the end, I had tears streaming down my face because I knew how important it was to get this information out to people.

And, in a moment ofself recognition, I knew I had a unique, more empowering way of translating the system. I saw, clear as day, why people had been begging me to explain their design to them.

I understood my gifts in a whole new way. I was more than “just a writer” or walking, talking firehose of esoteric information. In those moments, I knew that my words would change the way people experience their Human Design.

Traditional Human Design is often taught in a disempowering way.

There are literally “analysts” and “readers” who tell people, based on specific gates in their chart, that they are evil, doomed to fail, or other such disempowering bullshit.

I once had an HD reader tell me that I should close my business, file for unemployment, and play video games for the rest of my life.

And that is just the beginning of what I’ve seen.

There are indeed some gates in the chart that, because of conditioning and Ra’s intention to reach people through their “not-self,” can seem intense at first glance.

But a different story unfolds when we look deeper at thefull spectrum of potential.

Gate 60 is one of the prime examples.

In traditional Human Design, gate 60 is known as the gate of limitation. It is the energy of boundaries, structure, and restriction.

Some pretty gnarly shit has gone down when gate 60 wastransitingplanets like Saturn, Uranus, Pluto, etc. And, my firstmapclient definitely didn’t have a life of skipping through fields of flowers, rainbows, and butterflies either.

All of that is true.

AND

There is a whole other side of the story.

While writing that very firstmap, with gate 60 as the conscious sun, the other side was blazingly obvious.

I didn’t see limitations, rigid structure, or smackdowns from life.

I saw potential, creativity, and ingenuity.

I saw magick.

Because here is the thing:

Creativity and magick are BORN from limits.

Your house is safe because of its walls. Rivers need banks to flow. iPhones, cars, and GPS were all created to solve a “limitation.”

Some of the most beautiful art in the world was made with leftover paint and brushes that should have long been in the trash.

As they say, necessity is the mother of invention.

Without limits, boundaries, and problems, there is no need for creativity and magick. They are fuel for our evolution and growth as a species.

Humans find a way. We make something out of nothing. We create from the (root) pressure of limits. We make magick with it.

How could it be any other way? It’s how the game is played.

And I am 100% on board with that. It is actually what I teach inside theHuman Design Mapportal. Your chart isn’t a fate written in stone; it is a tool for your creativity and deepest alchemical transformation.

The difference is in attitude and using our so-called limitations as an opportunity. It is looking for the potential inside of limitation.

It is embracing our real limitations and letting the perceived one’s go. Just like a river and its banks. Gate 60 is what makes us truly limitless.

Embrace the magick of your chart by getting yourmapand going on the journey inside the portal.

Magic and creativity flow through my boundaries.

I work with nature instead of against it.

What kind of limits enhance your flow?

What have been your most creative or magical moments and what role did limits play in them?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 60.

Title: Human Design Gate 61 – Gene Key 61 – The Divine Door
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 61 isThe Gate of Inner Truth. But I call itThe Divine Doorbecause its primary action is to discover your inner truth by reveling in the mystery of life.

## About Human Design Gate 61 – Gene Key 61

Archetype Name:The Divine Door

In Action:revel in the mystery or life

Keywords:mystery, seeking, inner Truth, and mysticism

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Inner Truth – Mystery

Human Design Definition:The awareness of universal underlying principles.

Core Theme:knowing something new, understanding the mysteries of life, and knowing the unknowable.

Bodygraph Center:Head center and connects to the Ajna center viahuman design gate 24.

Tropical Sign:Capricorn

Gene Keys Shadow:Psychosis

Gene Keys Gift:Inspiration

Gene Keys Siddhi:Sanctity

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 61

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 61 is the energy for inner truth. Gate 61 deeply understands that knowledge and wisdom are two different things. Knowledge happens in the mind. Wisdom happens when knowledge is integrated into the body. It also knows that Truth is subjectiveandcan live with an open heart and mind.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 61 is the energy for feeling pressured to answer the biggest question of all: Why am I here? It easily gets lost or overwhelmed with the question of why.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling obsessed, fanatical or disenchanted but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human Design Gate 61 (Gene Key 61)

Gate 61 has a lot of significance in my life because it is defined in the Unconscious Earth of myincarnation cross.

In the Human Design chart, I interpret the Unconscious Earth placement as your unique path to that thing that some call God.

It is a tool for feeling connected to yourself, the people in your life, the collective, and the cosmos. And it provides the spiritual foundation necessary to unlock the expanded consciousness in the other gates of yourincarnation cross.(I’ll explain all four gates of yourincarnation crossin theHuman Design Map.)

So, my path to “God” is reveling in the mystery of life; in being a contemplative mystic, looking for the golden thread in all things. In doing so, I unlock the full potential of my gifts and purpose.

And, OMG (no pun intended), what a ride it has been.

I actually have the full channel (61-24) defined in my chart.

As far back as I can remember, I have felt deeply connected with the mystery of life and the Divinity of everything.

But, I was raised in a religious context that believed there was one, and only one, path to “God.”

I’d sit in church completely confused.

I could feel the Golden Threads of Truth running through the sermons. I’d often get chills or cry.

But the hellfire, damnation, and insistence of unworthiness never resonated with me. Never mind the gossip, bold-faced hypocrisy, and isms as deep as the ocean (racism, sexism, classism, etc.).

My relationship with the “God” of my childhood unraveled very early.

I remember being 18 years old, pissed off at my parents, and yelling that I didn’t believe in God.

In hindsight (and true togate 24), I can clearly see that it had nothing to do with believing in “God.”

I just didn’t believe in the God they believed in. And I didn’t know that what I believe (about anything, including God) is a choice. I was completely unaware of the free will to select the way we think.

All of that changed when, through the mystery of Grace, I stumbled onto the work ofRichard Rohr.

The first book I read of his was calledFalling Upward. And, as they say in the East, a meeting with the Divine and the river changes course.

My interpretation of what he says is this:

When terrible things happen, we try to reconcile those things with the God that we believe in. And if we can’t do that reconciliation, we have two choices.

We can make God “small” by collapsing our definition of it. Or, we can make God “bigger” by expanding our definition of it.

“In order to see God, you have to have special eyes. Otherwise, you cannot bear the shock.” ~Neem Karoli Baba

The idea that I could make God bigger shocked me; it was the first of many spiritual awakenings.

I saw that when I told my parents that God isn’t real, it was because I had collapsed my definition of God. I hadn’t known I could make my definition of God big enough to hold the trauma I was carrying.

But, in Richard Rohr’s book, I saw I had a choice.

True to the 61-24, from that moment on, I began to revisit my definition of God repeatedly. It became my spiritual practice to make God big enough to holdallmy experiences, even the horrible ones.

Since then, I have studied spiritual traditions and beliefs from all over the world. I’ve looked for the Golden Thread that runs through them all, and I opened myself up to more powerful ways of thinking about God.

I’ve resonated most with Hermeticism (aka magick) and traditions from the East. What has been most interesting, though, is that I also really enjoy learning about the different ways people interpret the Bible and seeing those old sermons in a whole new way.

All of these things shape the way I live, the way I write, and the way I teach Human Design through themap + portal.

Most importantly, though, I’ve stopped believing that there is only one path to that thing that some call God. Instead, there are64 archetypesplaying out in a gazillion and one ways.

I’ve realized that Truth is subjective and that our inner wisdom is what guides our truth.

We tend to think of Truth as being objective. But, most of the things we believe are “the truth” are really just thoughts, beliefs, and ideas. They are inherited from our conditioning, rather than chosen on purpose.

The realgood newsis that thoughts and beliefs are always optional.

We don’t “have to” believe anything.

We are all just making it up as we go along.

No one knows for sure.

A younger version of me would have been terrified at that idea; it gives me so much freedom now.

“What I know

Is that I don’t know.

So I dance, and I sing, and I live full.

I give it all to the call of the unknown.”

Trevor Hall, The Fruitful Darkness, What I Know

I can now play, experiment, and see what resonates. If something doesn’t resonate, I can let it go. And if it does, I can hold it lightly enough to let it go if it starts to feel like I’m collapsing or if it bounds me up in attachments.

This surrender to “not knowing” is the spiritual underpinning that informs my approach to Human Design. And it is why me and my team are devoted to pointing people back to their inner knowing inside theHuman Design Map + Portal.

I’m not attached to the idea that there is only one way to use Human Design, that what Ra said was the ultimate Truth, or that you can get it wrong. That feels ways too small for me.

Instead, I choose to believe that my soul is always on the “right” path – even if it looks nothing like my chart. I choose to believe that God is everything – there is nothing that is not Divine. I trust what resonates in my body and lands with holiness. The mystery always plays out perfectly.

And so it is.

I am ready to receive Divine Inspiration.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 61

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 61 are available to you, whether it’s defined in your chart or not…

What is your relationship with trusting your inner Truth?

What is your relationship to being open-mindedand open-heartedwith others trusting their inner Truth? What if their truth doesn’t match yours?

What is the difference between knowledge and wisdom to you?

Have you surrendered to the great mystery of life? Why or why not?

If not, do you like your reasons for that?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 61.

And, if you have gate 61 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I gosuper deep into each cross gate.

Title: Human Design Gate 62 – Gene Key 62 – The Esoteric Translator
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 62 isThe Gate of Details. But I call itThe EsotericTranslatorbecause its primary action is to take complicated concepts (especially esoteric ones) and organize them into workable language, plans, and instructions.

## About Human Design Gate 62 – Gene Key 62

Archetype Name:The Esoteric Translator

In Action:communicate with clarity and precision

Keywords:piercing language, clarity, being a translator, and the organization of ideas

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Details

Human Design Definition:Caution, patience and detail produce excellence out of limitation.

Core Theme:Communicating the details and facts.

Bodygraph Center:Throat center and connects to the ajna center viahuman design gate 17.

Tropical Sign:Cancer

Gene Keys Shadow:Intellect

Gene Keys Gift:Precision

Gene Keys Siddhi:Impeccability

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 62

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 62 is the energy for taking complicated concepts (especially esoteric ones) and organizing them into workable language, plans, and instructions. For Gate 62, transformation begins by understanding the details – especially what is objective versus subjective – and transforming those details into precise and clear language. This in turn helps others to create transformation in their lives.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 62 is the energy for using its logic and knowledge to hide insecurities; it obsesses with facts, details, organizing, and planning. It can also get trapped in information seeking or become overwhelmed when ideas don’t seem “workable.”

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

The most important thing to raise the frequency of gate 62 is to get (inner) clarity about the relevant amount of facts, details, and planning necessary to create solutions. And to remember that you are not your thoughts.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 62 (Gene Key 62)

Gate 62 is defined in the unconscious sun of myincarnation cross.

Aas someone obsessed withshadowintegration and parts work, the unconscious sun is one of the most interesting gates of the whole chart.

The unconscious side of the chart reveals the wounds, the golden shadow parts, and the stories that keep us stuck and prevent the full potential of our purpose and contribution on the conscious side of the chart.

The unconscious sun in particular represents the part of ourselves that is actually our most attractive quality to the world (in a platonic way).

But, it doesn’t always feel that way on the inside because it is also where we “store” our self-doubt and “not-enoughness.” And, it is a doorway that opens our Golden Shadows. Once we recognize the magick that is our unconscious sun, we begin a journey of healing all of the shadows on the unconscious side.

(With yourHuman Design Map & Portal, you will discover the golden and taboo shadows of your type, authority, profile, and all four gates of your incarnation cross. And, the best part of all, you will learn how to heal the shadows that keep you stuck in people pleasing, indecision, and not trusting yourself.Get yours here.)

For me, with Gate 62 in my unconscious sun, it means that my way with words is highly magnetic to the people around me.

My whole life, people have commented on my ways with words, especially the way I can organize and explain esoteric concepts. They love how I break things down and make even convoluted concepts (like Human Design!) seem clear.

I’m celebrated for step-by-step guidance, clear and piercing language, and busting myths. Yourmap and portalare loaded with it.

But what most people don’t see or understand is that, while these things do come quite naturally to me, they have also been my deepest sources of inner turmoil. 😲

For most of my life, I would beat myself up about not knowing how to explain things. Or not being specific enough. Or not giving enough details.

Not enough. Not enough. Not enough.

In many ways, these insecurities have also been a source of deep bitterness because the story of “not enough” almost always leads to people-pleasing, an imbalance in giving and receiving, and wasting a lot of energy “making sure” I  have all the facts before speaking.

But, when I understood the nature of the unconscious sun, it unlocked something for me that really changed this dynamic.

I started to notice those insecurities instead of acting them out.

I felt the feelings. I did the shadow integration work. I reclaimed the fractured parts of my power. And I started making conscious choices about how I’d show up for my writing and step-by-step guidance.

(That is exactly what you will learn how to do in theHuman Design Map & Portal.)

I stopped letting those not-enough stories prevent me from showing up with integrity. I’ve become willing to refine as I gather details, facts, or information. I don’t seek perfection. And I trust the evolution of my consciousness.

I’ve also come to understand that staying on the leading edge of awareness is a huge part of why I can explain things so easily. I am deeply attuned to the words, phrases, and ways of explaining things that create confusion. I am not married to the words that cause more harm than good and am not afraid to go back to the drawing board when necessary.

And, true to the unconscious sun placement, the more I’ve done that inner healing work, the more recognition I receive about the esoteric translator that radiates from my being.

A day doesn’t go by where I don’t hear a compliment about my way with words or the way I break things down. I am honored to say that, insidethe map portal, I receive abundant praise and recognition for what I do.

And the practice of receiving that recognition encourages me to trust that my way with words is enough. And that it is safe to let go, on deeper and deeper levels, the idea that I’m saying the wrong thing or not explaining things well.

It is all unfolding perfectly. And what a beautiful expanding spiral of transformation it is.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 62

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 62:

I have a powerful way with words.

I make rocket science seem like child’s play.

I easily break down concepts into language that others can understand.
