### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate62

When you stand in the truth that the gifts of Gate 62 are always available to you (whether it’s defined in your chart or not)…

What is your relationship with organizing ideas?

What is something that is easy for you to understand that seems complicated for others?

Do you ever get lost in searching for facts, details, and information before speaking? If yes, why is that? What is holding you back?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 62.

And, if you have gate 62 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 63 – Gene Key 63 – The Discerning Questioner
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 63 isThe Gate of Doubt. But I call itTheDiscerning Questionerbecause its primary action is to use doubt to your advantage to ask bigger questions and connect with bigger possibilities.

## About Human Design Gate 63 – Gene Key 63

Archetypal Name:The Discerning Questioner

In Action:use doubt as a gateway into possibility

Keywords:doubt, discernment, patterns, and finding potential

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Doubt

Human Design Definition:In the spiral of life, all ends are beginnings.

Core Theme:Working through doubt to make sense of patterns and find a new pattern.

Bodygraph Center:Head center and connects to the Ajna center viahuman design gate 4.

Tropical Sign:Pisces

Gene Keys Shadow:Doubt

Gene Keys Gift:Inquiry

Gene Keys Siddhi:Truth

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 63

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 63 is the energy for making sense of patterns by working through doubt. Gate 63 sees distorted energy as an opportunity for truth, therefore, it asks itself and others powerful questions. And the answer to those questions shatter doubt, impossibility, and hesitation and reveal the true potential that exists in all things.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 63 is the energy of struggling with self-doubt or planting unnecessary doubt into others’ minds. It never takes action due to doubt and blames external things for the doubt and their results.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling fearful, obsessive or like a victim, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 63 (Gene Key 63)

Gate 63 is undefined in my chart, but I have a defined Head/Ajna. So, I am intimately familiar with how the head pressures the Ajna with questions.

When we don’t keep those questions in check, it can send us in all sorts of unhelpful directions.

The main question that gate 63 asks is what.

And my “flavor” of gate 63 questions has been:

What is wrong with me?

What am I missing?

What am I doing wrong?

Doubt. Doubt. Doubt.

For a long time, I thought that experiencing doubt meant that I was too broken or messed up to do much of anything with my life.

When I noticed doubt, I made it mean imminent failure and that I would never succeed.

Things started to shift in 2014 when I went to a coaching mastermind in Napa Valley.

The weather was gorgeous. I was delighted to be connecting with so many like-minded people. The deep conversations were spectacular, and I met people I am still friends with.

I was absolutely high on life. Truth be told, I was probably high on the amplification of such “positive” sacral and solar plexus energy, but whatever.

Anyway, during one of the mastermind sessions, there was a group Q + A with my mentor. She always appeared confident in her ability to create the life she wanted, and I was convinced that she never experienced doubt.

I hesitantly asked…

Do you ever feel doubt?

In her confident voice, she replied:

Of course, I just don’t let it drive my actions.

It took me some time to really sink into the meaning of her words.

I can’t say for sure what they really meant for her.

But what I have come to understand, and teach others inside theHuman Design Map, is that we are “meant” to experience it all.

It wouldn’t be in the chart if it weren’t a normal part of the human experience.

Doubt is not actually a problem. Nothing is going wrong when doubt shows up – for any reason. It only becomes a problem when we assign meaning to it and use it as fuel for actions that keep us stuck in the low frequency of our purpose.

But, even more important is that we can transform the frequency of the doubt and turn it into fuel for actions aligned with our higher purpose.

We do that by seeing doubt as a signal to explore all of the possibilities.

You turn the doubt on its head (pun intended 😉) and let it open you up instead of shutting you down.

This, as with all things, is a process. You won’t get it right on the first try. And you’ll have to remind yourself repeatedly that doubt is evidence that you are a normal human being and nothing else.

Since gate 63 is undefined in my chart, I’ll be learning more ways of working with doubt as I continue through life.

But, for now, I am really grateful for what I’ve learned so far, and I welcome more opportunities to expand my mind to what is really possible when we get out of our own way.If you want a guide on your path, invite me by getting yourHuman Design Map and reaching out to me inside the portal.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 63

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 63:

I use doubt as a sign to ask bigger questions.

I am a genius at planning and brainstorming.

I ask the right questions.

Inside yourHuman Design Map, you’ll get a full list of empowering beliefs for your type + strategy, authority, profile, and all four gates of yourincarnation crossand show you how to go from affirmation to full-on embodiment. In the meantime, be sure to also check out my post onhow to make Human Design affirmations work.

### Now it’s your turn to contemplate Gate 63

When you stand in the truth that you can embody the gifts of gate 63 whether it is defined in your chart or not…

What is your relationship with doubt?

Do you let doubt lead you into disempowering actions? Why or why not?

In what ways can you turn doubt on its head (no pun intended!) and use it to fuel empowering questions and actions?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 63.

And, if you have gate 63 in yourHuman Design Incarnation Cross, be sure to check out theHuman Design Mapwhere I go super deep into each gate of your cross.

Title: Human Design Gate 64 – Gene Key 64 – The Imagination Station
Content:
The official name for Human Design Gate 64 isThe Gate of Confusion. But I call itThe Imagination Stationbecause its primary action is to lovingly embrace the confusion inherent in illumination.

## About Human Design Gate 64 – Gene Key 64

Archetype Name:The Imagination Station

In Action:use imagination and creativity to transcend confusion

Keywords:your imagination and creativity, confusion, and Illumination

Download All 64 Human Design Gates Cheatsheet (for free!)

Official Gate Name:Confusion

Human Design Definition:Transition, like birth, requires a determined strength for the passage through.

Core Theme:Making sense of the past and resolving chaos and confusion.

Bodygraph Center:Head center and connects to the Ajna center viahuman design gate 47.

Tropical Sign:Virgo

Gene Keys Shadow:Confusion

Gene Keys Gift:Imagination

Gene Keys Siddhi:Illumination

(Want all of the correspondences and keynotes for the gates of your incarnation cross? TheHuman Design Mapis for you.)

### The Positive and Negative Sides of Human Design Gate 64

All energy in theHuman Design chart exists on a spectrum of potential.

On the “positive” of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 64 is the energy for lovingly embracing the confusion inherent in illumination. Gate 64 lives in a land of infinite possibilities and potential and is only limited by its imagination. With this understanding of reality, Gate 64 is able to keep its eye on the highest potential and possibility – even when confusion clouds everything beyond the next step.

On the “negative” end of the spectrum, Human Design Gate 64 is the energy for putting pressure on itself to figure things out the moment it feels confused.  With this approach, Gate 64 starts to shut down potential and possibilities. It can find itself worried about the “how” instead of focusing on the next step.

You’ll learn about the surprising (but most effective) way to raise your energy frequency in theHuman Design Map + Portal.

In the meantime, start noticing when you are feeling anxious, confused or pessimistic, but don’t be an asshole to yourself. Treat yourself the way you would a small child – with love, curiosity, and understanding.

### My Personal Experience with Human DesignGate 64 (Gene Key 64)

Back when I was doing one-to-one coaching, I had a client with the full 64/47 channel of abstraction. She is a business coach for artists and we met because we did life coach training from the same place.

In that circle, confusion had a really bad wrap. And it was something we talked about many, many times.

With the 64/47, confusion was an old friend and she had gotten into the habit of shaming herself for feeling confused.

But, what I helped her see is that, as with all energy, gate 64 (aka the energy of confusion) is ona spectrumand all ends of the spectrum are available to us.

None of it is right or wrong. It just is. And the key to your energetic success is knowing how to work with your energy. That is what you’ll learn how to do when you get yourHuman Design Map.

Here is an example of what that might look like in “real” life with the 64:

Imagine for a moment that you have been training to climb a mountain for 6 months straight. You go all in on your training and you have a deep inner knowing that you will make it to the top. You are clear and ready.

But, on the day you plan to start the actual climb, it is an incredibly foggy day. You cannot see the top of the mountain.

On the “negative” end of the 64 spectrum, you would turn around and go home because you can’t see, with your actual eyes, how you will get to the top. You “indulge” in not knowing the how.

But, on the “positive” side of the 64 spectrum, you would proceed, knowing that you don’t need to see the whole path. You just need to trust that you will make it to the top of the mountain by putting one foot in front of the other. You stay in the possibility instead of in the fog.

See the difference?

When we let the metaphorical fog stop us from doing what we know to do and put one foot in front of the other, we never really get anywhere. But when we remember that fog is just a reminder that there is infinite potential on this crazy green spinning rock and that all we have to ever do is take the next step.

“Confusion clouds the heart but it also points the way.”Trevor Hall, You can’t Rush Your Healing, Kala

When my client began practicing that, it changed everything for her. No more shaming herself for feeling confused and instead, alchemizing that into potent fuel for the very next step.

Clarity, via the a-ha moment of the47, is coming.

And, quite honestly, it has changed everything for me, too.

Gate 64 is undefined in my chart (though I do have a defined head) and, over the course of my life, I have learned that you really do only need to be able to see the next step.

And when you can surrender the how and just trust your knowing of the potential and possibilities, all tends to work itself out.

The right people will show up to help. The tools will become clear. The whole path will reveal itself at the end.

So, don’t let confusion stop you. And don’t let it become a weapon you use against yourself. Trust yourself. You do know what to do. Just put one foot in front of the other. And do that over and over again.

And, if you feel “blocked” along the way, that is an indicator that there is some deconditioning to do. I’ll show you the next steps inside theHuman Design Mapportal.

## Affirmations for Human Design Gate 64

Using your Human Design to create affirmations is a powerful way to activate the full potential of your chart. Here are some affirmations for Gate 64:

I use my powerful imagination to the advantage of myself and others.

I don’t need to know how – I just take the next best step.

I trust that all things become clear in Divine Timing.

Do you ever get lost in disempowering “how” questions? How (no pun intended!) might you turn them into empowering questions?

What is the next step you need to take in your life? Can you trust that it is enough?

I encourage you to take some time with these questions. Take them out into your world and let their answers reveal themselves to you. Intend for deeper levels of clarity about gate 64.
